GV06apastgcu:143: etacca sāmānyavidhānaṃ tatra tatra viśeṣavidhānenāpodyate niyamyate ca /

GV06apastgcu:152: tathā baudhāyanīye samāvartanasya caulavikāratvādeva āpūryamāṇapakṣaprāptau punastatra tadvidhi(2)

GV06apastgcu:176: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca tāni kartavyāni dakṣinaṃ pāṇiṃ pratigataṃ pradakṣiṇam /

GV06apastgcu:199: na cātra upakrāmāpavargayoḥ samānabhidaṃ niyamanaṃ kriyate-purastādupakrānte tatraiva samāpyaṃ udagārabhyaṃ ca tatraiveti /
GV06apastgcu:200: kiṃ tarhi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pravṛttiḥ tadyathā paristaraṇasya purastādupakrāntasya tatraivāpavargāsambavādudagapavargaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:209: anyathā pradakṣiṇaparibhāṣayā sāmānyaparibhāṣā bādhyate kiñciddaivāni karmāṇīti tatra viśeṣitam /
GV06apastgcu:228: idaṃ tu niyamanaṃ yāni gayāśrāddhādīni deśaviśeṣeṇa pātraviśeṣeṇa kāmyānyupadiṣṭāni asmābhiśca parigṛhītānipārvaṇe nātonyānītyatra teṣavaparapakṣaprāptyartha ca /
GV06apastgcu:229: tena pūrvapakṣe mṛtasyāparapakṣa ekoddiṣṭaṃ kartavyaṃ na tvekādaśe 'hani /
GV06apastgcu:233: ayaṃ cāparapakṣavidhiḥ kṛtsnasyodagayanāderapavādo na pūrvasmādudagvā yathāyogam /
GV06apastgcu:237: ucyate-'yajñopavītinā pradakṣiṇaṃ''tathāpavarga'ityetāḥ paribhāṣā aviśeṣeṇātra prakaraṇe paṭhitāḥ sāmānyaparibhāṣāyā bādhitatvāt pitryeṣvapi prāpnuvanti tadvādhārthamidam /
GV06apastgcu:238: atra ca yeṣāṃ pitryāṇāṃ svātantryeṇa svakole pravṛttiḥ teṣāmevāyaṃ prācīnāvītavidhiḥ natvanyatrāṅgatvena prayujyamānānām /
GV06apastgcu:239: tena daiveṣi mānuṣeṣu ca karmasu“pitaraḥ pitāmahā“ityatra yajñopavītameva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:241: . iti darśanāt“pitaraḥ pitāmahā“ityasyāpi pitryatvādeva prācīnāvītasyāprasaṅgaḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:243: abhihitaṃ prācīnāvītamaviśeṣeṇa pitrye karmāṇi sāṅge pravartate /
GV06apastgcu:244: tena pitrye ājyabhāgante karmaṇi jayādau ca prācīnāvītameva bhavati //

GV06apastgcu:293: yadi punarālasyādinotsannāgnireva cirakālaṃ varteta tadā smṛtyantaratastatkālānurūpaṃ kṛcchrādikaṃ homadravyadānaṃ ca veditavyam /

GV06apastgcu:375: uktāḥ pākayajñaparibhāṣāḥ atha teṣāṃ sādhāraṇatantraṃ vakṣyate-agnimidhveti /
GV06apastgcu:383: yatra tu psiddhau'gnirnāsti tatra śrautriyāgārādāharaṇaṃ mathanaṃ vā /
GV06apastgcu:384: “yatra kvacīgni“mityayaṃ tu deśasaṃskāraḥ sarvatra bhavati yadi syādasskṛto deśaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:385: agnimidhveti prakṛte punaragnigrahaṇaṃ yeṣu tantraṃ na pravartate tatrāpi paristaraṇaṃ yathā syāditi-agniṃ-paristṛṇāti sarvaveti /

GV06apastgcu:491: jñāpakārtha caitat jñāpayati-agniparistaraṇe vihito 'yaṃ pātraprayoge nānuvartate iti /
GV06apastgcu:494: tena pitryeṣvapi prāgagrāṇāmeva saṃstaraṇaṃ agneścottarataḥ tantrābhāve ca pātraprayogābhāvāt /
GV06apastgcu:516: na;daivāni hi karmāṇi dvividhāni-puruṣārtharūpāṇi manuṣyasaṃskārakāṇi ca /
GV06apastgcu:521: yāni manuṣyasaṃyuktāni pātrāṇi tāni sakṛdeva prayunakti,
GV06apastgcu:525: pātra bāhulyāt dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyāṃ sādanāśaktāvapyupāyena sakṛdeva sādanamiti /
GV06apastgcu:529: manuṣyasaṃyuktāni manuṣyadvārā saṃyuktāni aśmavāsomekhalādīni sakṛdeva kriyābhyāvṛttiparihāreṇa prayunakti,
GV06apastgcu:535: pitṛkarmārthāni darvyādīni svadhāpātrādīni ca ekamokaṃ prayunakti //18//
GV06apastgcu:537: pavitrayossaṃkāra āyāmataḥ parīmāṇaṃ prokṣaṇīsaṃskāraḥ pātraprokṣa iti darśapūrṇamāsavattūṣṇīm // ĀpGs_1.19 //
GV06apastgcu:540: tayorāyāmato yat parimāṇaṃ dīrghapramāṇaṃ prādeśamātrā (āpa.śrau.1-11-9.) vityetat /
GV06apastgcu:547: yathā prokṣaṇe pātrāṇāmuktā kriyā visraṃsanañcedhmasyatadantarbhāvādeva siddham /
GV06apastgcu:548: idaṃ tu vacanaṃ niyamārtham-pavitrayorevāyāmata- parimāṇaṃ yathā syāt
GV06apastgcu:552: āyāmagrahaṇamāyāmaparimāṇasyaiva pavitrayorniyamena ya vā saṃkhyāparīmāṇaṃ dārśapūrṇamāsikamevedhmasya bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:557: tṛṇaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vāntardhāya chinatti, na nakhena /
GV06apastgcu:562: yadyapi 'pavitrayossaṃskāro darśapūrṇamāsavat'iti vacanādeva tadvadāyāmataḥ parimāṇaṃ prāptam,
GV06apastgcu:563: tathāpi yadāyāmataḥ parmāmaṃ prādeśamātrāviti tadeva tadvat,
GV06apastgcu:564: na tviha pṛthutvenāpi sāmyamityevamartha 'āyāmataḥ parimāṇam'iti punarvacanam //
GV06apastgcu:566: na tvidhmasya darbhāgrayoścājye pratyasyamānayoriti niyamārtha punarvacanam /
GV06apastgcu:567: evaṃ bruvataiva sūtrakāreṇa darśapūrṇamāsavattūṣṇīmidhmasya darbhāgrayośca saṃskāra- prasiddha vadabhyanujñātaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:569: tena khādiraḥ pālāso vā śulvasannaddha idhmo visrasya triḥ prokṣitavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:573: atra ca yadyapyayamarthaḥ 'āyāmataḥ'iti vā 'parimāṇaṃ'iti vānyatareṇa siddhaḥ tathāpi niyamāntarārthamevamuktam /
GV06apastgcu:574: āyāmata eva yatparimāṇaṃ tadeva pavitrayoḥ darśapūrṇamāsavat,
GV06apastgcu:579: tathāpyetadvalāttatsthāne jayādayaḥ kalpyāḥ- ityāyuktaṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ca pūrvavyākhyānenānyathāsiddhe 'pi sūtre kalpayanti //
GV06apastgcu:581: udagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ antarhitāyāṃ vekaṅkatyāṃ snucyapa ānīya tābhyāṃ trirutpūya prokṣet /
GV06apastgcu:583: uttānāni pātrāṇi kṛtvedhmaṃ ca visrasya tābhissapavitreṇa pāṇinā triḥ prokṣet //19//
GV06apastgcu:585: apareṇāgniṃ pavitrāntarhite pātre 'pa ānīyodagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ trirutpūya samaṃ prāṇairhṛtvottareṇāgniṃ darbheṣu sādayitvā darbhaiḥ pracchādya
GV06apastgcu:587: pātraprokṣaṇānantaramapareṇāgniṃ praṇītārthepāno pavitraṃ nidhāya tasminnudagagre pavitre antardhāyāpa ānīyya pavitrābhyāṃ udagagrābhyāṃ trirutpunāti prāgapavargam /
GV06apastgcu:596: agneradūreṇa paścāt pavitrāntarhite kasmiṃścit pātre 'pa ānīyodagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ trirutpunāti /
GV06apastgcu:597: atra prakṛtayorapi pavitrayoḥ punargrahaṇāt pāṇyoḥ prāgagratvamācārasiddhaṃ 'āṅguṣṭhopakaniśṭhikābhyāmuttānābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām'(āśva.gṛ.1-3-3.)
GV06apastgcu:599: tatastā apassamaṃ prāṇairhṛtvā prāmasthānabhyāṃ mukanāsikābhyāṃ samamudūdhṛtya uttareṇāgniṃ punastīrṇeṣu darbheṣu sādayati,
GV06apastgcu:612: tramuttarāsaṅgaṃ kamaṇḍaluṃ vā tatra kṛtvādhānyat kuryā (khā0sū01-1-26.)
GV06apastgcu:623: pitṛbhūtartvikpakṣe 'pi yaḥ piturbrahmā sa evātra niṣādyata iti niyamo nāsti //
GV06apastgcu:624: anye tu-śraute brahmā dakṣiṇenāgniṃ darbeṣu niviṣṭo dṛṣṭa- /
GV06apastgcu:625: tatheva bahvṛcānāṃ chandogānāṃ ca gṛhye brahmetyeva coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:630: na ca dakṣiṇato niṣaditasya brāhmamamātrasya brahmatvaṃ sūtrakārasyeṣṭam /
GV06apastgcu:634: na punastriguṇaiḥ 'yo dakṣiṇata āste tasmai varaṃ dadāti“(āpa.śrau.14-13-9.) iti /
GV06apastgcu:637: ityatrānuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ parisaṃkhyeyaṃ ceti vadatāṃ coktirītyā svārtaparatve sambhavati doṣatrayayuktaparisaṃkhyāśrayaṇaṃ nirhetukam //21//
GV06apastgcu:640: teṣvadhiśritya jvalatāvadyutya dve darbhāgre pratyasya triḥ paryagni kṛtvodagudvāsyāṅgārān
GV06apastgcu:641: pratyūhyodagagrābhyāṃ pavitrābhyāṃ punarāhāraṃ trirutpūya paritre anuprahṛtya // ĀpGs_1.22 //
GV06apastgcu:643: athājyasaṃskāra- tatra vilāpanamājyasya yasminkasmiṃścidagnau bhavati uttaratrājyagrahaṇāt /
GV06apastgcu:645: punarājyagrahaṇamanāghāre 'pi karmaṇi saṃskāraḥ ājyasya yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:651: tatra dve darbhāgre pavitravatsaṃskṛtyājye pratyasyati prakṣipati /
GV06apastgcu:652: dve grahaṇamekaṃ ve tyasyāgnihotradṛṣṭasya vikalpasya pratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:653: tenāgnihotrike 'pi tantre dve eva darbhāgre bhavataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:654: tatastadājyaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ paryagni karoti ājyasya sarvato 'gniṃ trirāvartayati tṛṇenolmukena vā /
GV06apastgcu:667: 'ājyaṃ vilāpya'iti prakṛte 'pi punarājyagrahaṇamājyasyaiva nirvāpādayaḥ na punaḥ 'dadhna evāñjalinā juhoti“(āpa.gṛ.22-10)
GV06apastgcu:676: dve darbhāgre aniyatāyāme tṛṇādyantardhāya chitvādbhissaṃspṛśya te yugapadājye prakṣipet 'dve'ityadhikaśabdāt, ācārācca /
GV06apastgcu:677: atholmukamādāyājye pradakṣiṇaṃ triḥ paryagni kṛtvā samantato 'gnimāvartya tadudagavatārayet /
GV06apastgcu:679: iti siddhasya punarvidhānametayornityamudagevāpavargaḥ na tu daive vikalpenāpi prāgapavargaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:686: avadeyotanaparyagnikaraṇāgnayostu yadā āyatanasthādupādānaṃ tadā tayoragnayerapavṛttakarmatvena laukikatvāt ttyāgaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:687: yadā tu nirūḍhāt tadā tadā tasminneva kṣepaḥ /

GV06apastgcu:892: ityādiṣu sarveṣu āghāradharmeṣu tanmantreṣu ca prāpteṣu 'āghārāvāghārayati'iti parisaṅkhyātham /

GV06apastgcu:963: evaṃ tarhi etat jñāpayati pākayajñavidhirayaṃ anyeṣāmapi keṣāñcit sādhāraṇa iti /

GV06apastgcu:972: idaṃ tarhi prayodanaṃ kavyāntaroktāni nityāni naimittikānikāmyāni vā yadyasmadādibhiranuṣṭhīyante tadā teṣvapi etasya tantrasya pravṛttiryathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:977: vivāhādiṣu tantravidhānaniyamārtha yasmin gṛhamedhacoditāsteṣu atrāgnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānta iti jayādipratipadyata iti vā vacanaṃ tatraiva tantrapravṛttiḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:983: śrāddhe vānupadeśanaṃ sthālīpāke ca bahirranupraharaṇaṃ sauviṣṭakṛtīmityucyate sviṣṭakṛddevateti jñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:985: yathopadeśaṃ yena havirādinā vivāhādiṣu pradhānāhutaya upadiṣṭāstena tena vidhānena tā hutvā /

GV06apastgcu:1007: aviditvā ṝṣiṃ chando daivataṃ yogameva ca /

GV06apastgcu:1241: evamapyuktagrahaṇamanarthakaṃ tat kriyate muhūrtaparigrahārtham -yāni puṇyāni nakṣatrāṇi yāni puṇyoktāni muhūrtāni tāni sarvāṇi vivāhasya yathā syuriti /

GV06apastgcu:1304: kecit-'invakābhi'rityādi 'phalgunībhyāṃ vyūhyate'ityantamuttaratrenvakāśabdasya vyākhyānāt śākhāntarīyā gātheti kalpayantaḥ,

GV06apastgcu:1309: yāṃ kāmayeta duhitaraṃ priyā syāditi tāṃ niṣṭyāyāṃ dadyāt priyaiva bhavati neva tu punarāgacchatī ti brāhmaṇāvekṣo vidhiḥ // ĀpGs_3.3 //
GV06apastgcu:1311: yāṃ duhitaraṃ pitā priyāṃkāmayetabharturiyaṃpriyāsyāditi tāṃ niṣṭhāyāṃnakṣatre dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:1313: ayaṃ cāparo 'sya nakṣatrasya guṇaḥ sā ptṛgṛhāt punararthinī nāgacchati /
GV06apastgcu:1316: brahmaṇāvekṣo vidhiriti vacanāt anye 'pi smṛtyapekṣā nakṣatyapekṣā nakṣatravidhayo bhavanti /
GV06apastgcu:1317: anyathā puṃsavane tiṣyavat vivāhe idameva nakṣatraṃ syāt //3//
GV06apastgcu:1318: iyaṃ bhartuḥpriya syāditi yāṃ duhitaraṃ pitā kāmayeta tāṃniṣṭyāyāṃ svātau varāya dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:1320: neva tu naiva ca rogadāridyādinā pīḍyamānā arthinī punaḥ pitṛgṛhamāgacchati;

GV06apastgcu:2072: śibikāmāndolikāṃ rathaṃ manuṣyaṃ vāpra vā hārayet /
GV06apastgcu:2078: nāvaśyaṃ ktvāpratyayayuktaṃ vacanaṃ pūrvakālatāṃ samānakartṛkatāṃ vā vidadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:2083: tathātrāpi 'pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvottrābhyāṃ yoktraṃ vimucya'iti pramītāmokṣaṇādermadhye kartavyatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:2084: tathā dadhigharme 'etasmin kāle śrātaṃ haviriti pratyuktvā tamādāyāhavanīyaṃ gatvā'(āpa.śrau.13-3-4) iti /
GV06apastgcu:2087: tathaivānyatrāpyaśvamedhe 'dakṣiṇāpaplāvyāhaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vṛtrahanniti brahma yajamānasya hastaṃ gṛhṇāti'(āpa.śrau.) iti /
GV06apastgcu:2088: tathaivātra 'smṛtaṃ ca ma ityetadvācayitvā gurave varaṃ datvodāyuṣetyutthāpya'(āpa.gṛ.11-17) iti //13//
GV06apastgcu:2092: etaṃ vaivāhikamagnimukhāyāṃ samopya dampatyorgacchatoranu pṛṣṭhataḥharantitadīyāḥ puraṣāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2094: evaṃ pratiṣedaṃ kurvannetaddarśayati anugato manthya ityatra śrautavadavakṣāṇebhyo manthanamiti /
GV06apastgcu:2096: etaṃ vivāhāgniṃ samopyokhāyāmanuharanti avyavāyena vadhvāḥ paścānnayanti parikarmiṇaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2097: etamitigrahaṇaṃ vivāhāgneraupāsanākhyasya saṃskāraśabdābhivyaṅgyasya prayāṇe 'pi nityaṃ pratyakṣanayanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2098: agṛhyamāṇe tvetamityāsmin adṛṣṭārtha sarvārthasya laukikākāgneranuharaṇaṃ syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2099: aupāsanasya ca gṛhyāntareṇa prayāṇe vihitaṃ samāropaṇaṃ syāt //14//
GV06apastgcu:2109: ataḥ sāṅge vivāhe samāpte 'pi 'apavṛtte karmaṇi laukikassampadyate'; (āpa.pa.4-22)
GV06apastgcu:2111: nitya iti siddhe dhārya ityārambhāt prayāṇe 'pyasya samidhyātmanyarapyorvā samāropaṇaṃ gṛhyāntaravihitaṃ vikalpenāpi na syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2122: evaṃ vidheṣu yadyapi yājñikā vikalpaṃ neccanti,
GV06apastgcu:2124: 'savarṇāpūrvaśāstravihitāyāṃ yatartu gacchataḥ putrāsteṣāṃ karmabhissambandhaḥ''dāyenāvyatikramaścobhayoḥ''pūrvavatyāmasaṃskṛtāyāṃ varṇāntare ca maithune doṣaḥ'(āpa.gha.2-13-1,2,3)
GV06apastgcu:2125: ityasavarṇadārasaṅgrahaṇaṃ pratiṣidhya svayamevāha sūtrakāraḥ- sa trayāṇāṃ varṇānām'(āpa.pa.1-2) iti /
GV06apastgcu:2126: trayāṇāmityetasya padasyārtho bhāṣyakāreṇa vyākhyātaḥ-'tisro hi tasya bhāryāssmṛtyantaravacanādapratiṣiddhāḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2146: śrutavṛttādhyayanasampanno brāhmaṇaḥśrotriyaḥtasya gṛhe yaḥ pacanāgniḥ tasmādvāhāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2159: agnāvanugate bhāryāyāḥ patyuśca ubhayorupavāso bhavati tayoranyatarasya veti /
GV06apastgcu:2167: nanvanugato manthya iti prakṛtaṃ tatkimanugata iti nimittanirdeśena ?
GV06apastgcu:2172: tathā ca 'trirātramubhayoradhaśśayyā barahmacarya'mityādīnāṃ prāsaṅgikena saṃbandho na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2174: anugate ubhayorupavāso 'nyatarasya vetyeva siddhe bhāryāyāḥ patyuśceti pṛthaṅnirdeśaḥ kathamasyāgneratyantaṃ bhāryāsaṃbandhaḥ pratijñāpitasyāditi
GV06apastgcu:2175: ata eva bhāryāyāḥ pūrvavirdeśaḥ tena yasmin karmaṇi bhāryāyāssahatvaṃ nāsti yathopākaraṇasamāpanayostasyaitasminnagnāvapravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2177: anyatarasya kālasya ahno vā rātrercā sambandhī upavāsaḥ anaśanaṃ bhāryāyāḥ patyurvā bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2179: yadyahani rātrau vā prāgbhojanādanugatistadā mathitvā'hṛtya vā 'yatrakvace'ti vidhinepasamādhāya 'yadyavijñātā sarvavyāpadvā'; iti
GV06apastgcu:2182: sarvatā tu vijñātamātra evānugamane utpādanādi kāryam,
GV06apastgcu:2191: kecit -'upavāsaścānyatarasya bhāryāyāḥ patyurvānugate'iti sūtraṃ chitvā vyavahitānvayakalpanayā vyācakṣate- anugato 'gnau bāryāyāḥ patyuścopavāso 'nyatarasya veti /
GV06apastgcu:2192: atra prakṛte 'pi punaranugata iti grahaṇamadhikayatnamantareṇaivaṃvidhānāṃ prāsaṅgikārthatā na syāt,
GV06apastgcu:2199: api veti vacanādeva vaikalpikatve siddhe upavāsapratiṣedha iyamāhutirupa vāsasyaiva pratyāmnāyā yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:2202: asyaivāgnerbuddhipūrvotsarge dvādaśāhādūrdhva vicchede ca smṛtyantare prāyaścittamuktam /
GV06apastgcu:2204: api vā agnāvanugate uttarayā'ayāścāgne'ityetayā'jyaṃ juhuyānnopa vaset /
GV06apastgcu:2230: uttarābhyāṃ 'yuñjanti bradhnaṃ''yoge yoge'iti dvābhyāṃ aśvāvanaḍvāhau vā yugadhurorābadhnāti /
GV06apastgcu:2234: atra ca uttarābhyāmiti dvandvāpavādenaikaśeṣeṇa samabhivyāhṛtayojanakriyāpekṣayetaretarayogābhihitayordvayorapi mantrayossahitayorviniyogāt 'ekamantrāṇi karmāṇi'(āpa.pa.1-41)
GV06apastgcu:2243: iha bahuvacananirdeśāt triprabhṛti aniyamaprasaṅge mantraliṅgāccatasṛbhiriti niyamaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2256: sūtre vartmanorvyavastṛṇāttyuttarayā nīlaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ lohitamuttarasyām // ĀpGs_5.24 //
GV06apastgcu:2267: sūtre yugapat gṛhītvā sakṛdeva mantrumaktavā vyavastṛṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:2270: abhiyānaṃ tu sānnāyyakumbhīvat draṣṭavyam-aprasresāya yajñasyo 'khe upadadhāmyaha miti /
GV06apastgcu:2274: rathasya bhāvinyorrvatanyoḥ nīlalohite bhavataḥ utyetayā dve sūtre vyavastṛṇātitiryakstṛṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:2288: ye vadhvaścandram iti tisṛbhirvyavastīrṇe sūtre abhiyātiuparigacchati // 25 //
GV06apastgcu:2301: tenaikātikramaṇe itarayoḥ śravaṇaṃ vyartha syāditi na codanīyaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:2326: nyāyatastu japamantro nārthaparaḥ ato nātra tīrthādayo 'śvinau vā tātparyeṇābhidhīyante /
GV06apastgcu:2328: eṣa eva nyāyo nadīnāṃ dhanvanāṃ ca vyatikrame //26//
GV06apastgcu:2333: atha yadi pathi nāvā tāryā nadī vāpī vā syāt tatranāvamuttarayarcā 'ayaṃ no mahyāḥ pāraṃ svastī'tyetayānumantrayate
GV06apastgcu:2337: yadi pathi nadī nāvā taritavyā syāt,
GV06apastgcu:2338: tadā varaḥ 'ayaṃ no mahyāḥ pāram'ityetayā nāvamanumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:2340: na ca nāvyāṃ staratī vadhūḥ paśyet // ĀpGs_6.2 //
GV06apastgcu:2343: nāvi bhavā nāvyāḥ kaivartāḥ tāntaratī tarantī taraṇakāla ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2344: strīliṅganirdeśādeva siddhe vadhūgrahaṇaṃ darśanapratiṣedho vadhvā eva yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:2349: kecit nāvā tāra āpo nāvyā iti vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:2362: yadi nadī na bhavati tadā yā oṣadhaya ityetāmapi japet /
GV06apastgcu:2364: pāraṃ prāpya 'asya pāre'ityetāṃ vara eva japet //3//
GV06apastgcu:2366: śmaśānādhivyātikrame bhāṇḍe rathe vā riṣṭe 'gnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte 'nvārabdhāyāmuttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate pariṣecanāntaṃ karoti // ĀpGs_6.4 //
GV06apastgcu:2368: śmaśānabhūmeradhyupari vyatikrame bhāṇḍe bhājanādau rathe riṣṭe naṣṭe ratha iti pradarśanamanyeṣu caivaṃprakāreṣu darnimitteṣu vakṣyamāṇahomaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2382: yadidamagnerupasamādhānādi pariṣecanāntaṃ karma tadanantaraṃ naimittikamuktaṃ tat karoti /
GV06apastgcu:2384: anantaroktānāṃ nimittānāṃ deśakālabhedenāvṛttāvapi sakṛdovānte 'yaṃ homo bhavatītyarthaḥ //6//
GV06apastgcu:2393: kṣīriṇāmanyeṣāṃ vā lakṣmaṇyānāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ dhanvanāṃ ca vyatikrama uttare yathāliṅgaṃ japet // ĀpGs_6.5 //
GV06apastgcu:2399: dhanvanāṃ nirjalānāmaraṇyānāñca vyatikrame uttareṛcau yathāliṅga yasya liṅga yasyāṃ dṛśyate tadvyatikrame tāṃ japet /
GV06apastgcu:2406: kṣīriṇaḥkṣīravantaḥ plakṣanyagrodhādayaḥ lakṣma cihnaṃ tatra bhavāḥlakṣmaṇyāḥdurgā tintriṇikā sīmākadambā ityevamādayaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2407: nadyaḥ prasiddhāḥdhanvānodīrghāṇyaraṇyāni yeṣu grāmyāḥ paśavo na nivasanti /
GV06apastgcu:2417: atha svaṃ gṛhaṃ prāpya rathādavaropya yaddhanaṃ tasyā vahatutvenāgataṃ tacca gṛhān prapādya tatastayā tānsaṅkāśayatisamyagīkṣayati
GV06apastgcu:2420: saṅkāśayāmi darśayāmi vahatuṃ vadhvāḥ pitṛkulādānītaṃ dhanaṃ brahmāṇā maitreṇa aghoreṇa cakṣuṣā na kevalamaghoreṇa,
GV06apastgcu:2421: kiṃ tarhi maitreṇa gṛhairmadīyaissārdha gṛhaṃ ca madīyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2422: asyāṃ paryāṇaddhaṃ viśvarūpākhyaṃ yadābharaṇaṃ tatparibhyaḥ ekasmin bahuvacanam /
GV06apastgcu:2438: lohitaṃ carmā'naḍuhaṃ prācīnagrīvamuttaraloma madhye 'gārasyottarayā'stīrya gṛhān prapādayannuttarāṃ vācayati dakṣiṇena padā // ĀpGs_6.8 //
GV06apastgcu:2440: vimucya vāhau varaḥ pūrva gṛhaṃ svayaṃ praviśya yatra dampatyorvāsaḥ tatrāgārasya madhye camīstṛṇāti uttarayarcā 'śarmā varme'tyetayā taccānaḍuhaṃ bhavati lohitañca varṇena /
GV06apastgcu:2444: prapādayaṃstāmuttarāmṛcaṃvācayati 'gṛhāni'ti prakṛte punargṛhānityucyate- hatarathā agārasyāpi prakṛtatvāt praveśane mantraḥ śaṃkyeta /
GV06apastgcu:2448: tato varaḥ pūrva svagṛhān praviśya 'śarma varma'ityetayā yathāsūtraṃ carmāstīrya tato vadhūṃdakṣiṇena padāgṛhānprapādayanpraveśayan';
GV06apastgcu:2455: tāṃ prapādanakāle svayaṃ sā ca nātikrāmoditayarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2457: prapadya gṛhān atha tatkālamaśanamaśnīyāt tato yasminnagāre carmātipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:2463: jayādi pratipadyate pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvottarayā carmaṇyupaviśata uttaro varaḥ // ĀpGs_6.10 //
GV06apastgcu:2465: uttarāstrayodaśapradhānāhutīḥ 'āgangoṣṭha'mityādyāḥ liṅgavirodhe satyapi vara eva juhoti,
GV06apastgcu:2469: uttaro vara ityayaṃ viśeṣaḥ sarveṣu homeṣu bhavatītyuktam /
GV06apastgcu:2483: athāsyāḥ puṃsvorjīvaputrāyāḥ putramaṅka uttarayopaveśya tasmai phalānyuttareṇa yajuṣā pradāyottare japitvā vācaṃ yacchata (ti)
GV06apastgcu:2486: ya pumāṃsameva sūte na striyaṃ sā puṃśūḥ'tasyāḥ puṃsvo jīvaputrāyā iti pāṭhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2489: jīvā eva putrā yasyā na bhṛtāḥ jīvaputrāyāḥ jīvapatyā iti ca draṣṭavyam /
GV06apastgcu:2492: aṅka upaveśya tasmai kumārāya phalānyuttareṇa yajuṣā 'prasvasthaḥ preya'mityanena
GV06apastgcu:2494: 'iha priyaṃ''simaṅgalīḥ'ityete japitvā tata ubhau tasminneva carmaṇyāsīnau vācaṃ yacchataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2497: puṃsvoḥ puṃsvāḥ ityarcapāṭhaḥ yā puṃsa eva sūte na strīrapi,
GV06apastgcu:2498: yā ca sūta eva na tu vandhyā satī krayādinā putravatī, sā puṃsūḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2499: jīvanta eva putrāḥ pumāṃso yasyāssā jīvaputrā,
GV06apastgcu:2504: evaṃ bhūtāyāḥ putraṃ 'somenādityāḥ'ityetayā vadhvā aṅka upaveśya 'pra svasthaḥ'iti yajuṣā putrāya phalāni kadalyādīni pradāya 'iha priyaṃ prajayā'iti ṛcau japitvā,
GV06apastgcu:2508: uditeṣu nakṣatreṣu prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramyottarābhyāṃ yathāliṅgaṃ dhruvamarundhatīṃ ca darśayati // ĀpGs_6.12 //
GV06apastgcu:2510: uditeṣu nakṣatreṣviti vacanāttataḥ prākū tasminneva carmaṇi vāgyatayorāsanaṃ paścādupaniṣkramaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:2514: varastu paśyan dhruvamiti nirdirśya pūrvā vācayati vascādarundhatīmittyuttarām /
GV06apastgcu:2515: tato vāgvisargaḥ mantraliṅgādeva yathāliṅgadarśane siddhe yathāliṅgavacanaṃ vikalpārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2517: tenottarasyāmṛci sarveṣāṃ saptarṣīṇāṃ kṛttikādināmarūndhatyāśca sahadarśanaṃ vadhvāḥ karma pakṣe bhavati,
GV06apastgcu:2519: uttarābhyāṃ 'dhruvakṣitirdhruvayoniḥ'ityetābhyāṃ yathāliṅgaṃ pūrvayā sapraṛṣayā dhruvamuttarayārundhatīṃ ca darśayati vadhūm /
GV06apastgcu:2520: yathāliṅgamiti ca jātakarmavaddvābhyāṃ dvābhyāmekaikaṃ mā bhūditi //
GV06apastgcu:2524: yathāliṅgaṃ vā iti bhitvā sūtraṃ sādhyāhāraṃ vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:2525: 'sapraṛṣayaḥ prathamām'ityetayā saptaṛṣīn kṛttikā arundhatīṃ ca saha darśayati /
GV06apastgcu:2543: tataśca sa eva yadi devatāvidhiḥ syāt dvidevatyamidaṃ haviḥ syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2545: yadyapi vastuto giṇabhūtaḥ sviṣṭakṛdyāgaḥ tathāpi pradhānavat tatra codyate-'agnisviṣṭakṛdvitīya'iti /
GV06apastgcu:2554: tena yadidaṃ sthālīpākariveṣaṇaṃ brīhyādidakṣiṇā ca tat vadhūdhanasyaiva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2563: tena loke vyutpattisiddhādhyāhārādibhirapi yassūtrasyārthassampādyate so 'pi vedārthonuṣṭheya ucyate-dhruvamarundhatīṃ ca darśayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:2564: anantaraṃ yatrāgneyena sthālīpākena yāgaṃ karoti tatraivaināṃ patnīṃ yājayati patnyāmanvārabdhāyāṃ juhoti,
GV06apastgcu:2574: tenāgneya eva saṅkalpitasya vrīhyāderarthākṣipto laukiko nirvāpaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2585: arundhatīdarśanānantaramagāraṃ praviśya vrīhīn yavān vā navānagnaye saṃkalpitān nirvapati yāvaddhomāya brahmaṇabhojanāya ca paryāptaṃ manyate
GV06apastgcu:2588: 'enā patyā'ityādivat sāvahantīti sarvanāmnā nirdeśe kartavye patnīgrahaṇaṃ patnīkarmedaṃ yathā vijñāyeta /
GV06apastgcu:2590: vadhūriha yajamāneti kṛtvā pārvaṇādiṣu patyuravahananaṃ prāpnoti //2//
GV06apastgcu:2597: yajamānakarmatve hi sahādhikāre pārvaṇādau patyuravahananaṃ syāt,
GV06apastgcu:2607: agrerupasamādhānādivacanaṃ tantravidhānārtha kālavidhānārtha ca pratiṣṭhatābhighāraṇānte kathaṃ tantraṃ pratipadyeta, na prāgiti /
GV06apastgcu:2619: evaṃ tarhi śailīyamācāryasya-yatrobhayaṃ havirbhavatyājya ñcauṣadhayaśca tatra pradhānāhutiviśeṣaṇaṃ karoti sthālīpākādannādapūpādājyāhutiruti
GV06apastgcu:2620: tena yatra viśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti tatraikameva haviriti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2625: vivāhe ca 'yathā sthānamupaviśye'tyatra ājyāhutiriti viśeṣaṇābhāvādājyameva tatra dharmavaddhāviḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2643: homadarvyā sruveṇa darvyantareṇa vā sakṛdupastaraṇaṃ kāryam /
GV06apastgcu:2654: agnireva devatā pūrvasya homasya yeyamāgneyeneti vihitā /
GV06apastgcu:2662: ityeva siddhe vacanamidaṃ kalpāntareṣu keṣucit mantreṇa pradānañcodita“mamuṣmai svāheti juhuyāt,
GV06apastgcu:2663: ṛcā vā taddevataye“ti 'puronuvākyāmanūcya yājyayā juhuyā'diti ca tatpratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2664: evamapi 'sthālīpākājjuhotyagnaye svāhetyeva vaktavyaṃ'sviṣṭakṛti ca sviṣṭakṛte svāheti /
GV06apastgcu:2665: idaṃ tu vacanaṃ pārvaṇātidiṣṭeṣu yathopadeśaṃ devatā ityatra mantrapratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2667: ityevamādiṣu yatra sthālīpākasya devataiva codyate tatra devatāśabdenaiva homaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:2673: nanva nvārabdhāyāmagnaye juhotī'ti vaktavye kimarthamadhikākṣaraṃ 'agnirdevatā svāhākārapradānaḥ'ityupadiśyateūucyate-śabdo devatā,
GV06apastgcu:2683: atra tu jñātakaṃ 'āgneyā iti tu sthitiḥ'(niru.8-3-7)
GV06apastgcu:2685: kecit- kalpāntareṣu 'amuṣmai svāheti juhuyāt ṛcā vā taddaivatyayā'iti vikalpaḥ coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2696: na tu pūrvavaccaturavattaṃ pañcāvattaṃ vā apūrvatvāddarvihomānām //6//
GV06apastgcu:2710: tathā ca sati 'yathopadeśaṃ pradhānāhutīḥ'ityatra sviṣṭakṛtamapi hutvā jayādītyevamādi bhavediti // 7 //
GV06apastgcu:2729: nanu tatrāpi“pūrvār dhādvitīyaṃ paścārdhāt tṛtīya“mityetayordeśaviśeṣayoḥ pratiṣedhārtha syāt /
GV06apastgcu:2738: ityavadānasthānasiddheḥ etenopaghātapakṣe catiravattadharma upastaraṇādirna pravartate iti darśayati //9//
GV06apastgcu:2742: atrāpi paugoḍāśika eva homadeśo darśito vijñeyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2760: homagrahaṇe āśriyamāṇe uttarārdhapūrvārdha ityasya lepayoḥ prastaravadittyuttareṇāpi sambandhassambhāvyeta //14//
GV06apastgcu:2764: homopastaraṇādyarthadarvīdvapalepayoḥ pātraprayogārtha saṃstīrṇasya ca varhiṣaḥ pratipattimāha--
GV06apastgcu:2768: yasmin barhiṣi pratiṣṭhitaṃ havirājyaṃ ca tasmāt kiñcidupādāya tadvarhirannasya cājyasya ca yau lepau tayoḥ prastarava ttūṣṇīmaṅtvā
GV06apastgcu:2770: ata eva pratipattividhānādapareṇāgniṃ barhiṣaḥ staraṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2779: upaghātapakṣe tūpastaraṇāṃbhighāraṇārthāyā darvyā abhāvādājyasthālyāṃ madhyasya mūlasya carusthālyām /
GV06apastgcu:2781: tathā yayā homastasyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca āgnīdhrakarma ca svayameva karoti //15//
GV06apastgcu:2782: lepayoḥdarvīdvayalagnayoḥ pātrāsādanārtha saṃstīrṇabarhiḥprastaravattūṣṇī maṅktvā tadvadevāgnau praharati /
GV06apastgcu:2793: anye tu ājyasthālīṃ dhruvāsthāne pakṣatraye 'pi kurvanti,
GV06apastgcu:2799: kecit-kalpāntarādapareṇāgniṃ yasmin barhiṣi havirājyaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitaṃ tasmādvā,
GV06apastgcu:2801: tanna; kalpāntaroktabarhiḥ pratiṣṭhāpanopasaṃhārasya pākṣikatvena nityadvaddhakramamapi pariṣecanaṃ na nivartate,
GV06apastgcu:2813: anye tu siddhamuttaraṃ pariṣecanamitye kameva yogaṃ paṭhanto vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:2814: teneha sthālīpāke pradhānahomānantaraṃ tantraśeṣasya prāptasya parṣecanameva siddhamanyadasiddhamiti /
GV06apastgcu:2837: yo dakṣiṇata āste sa iha brāhmaṇaḥ taṃ bhojayet vadhūrvaro vā //18//
GV06apastgcu:2849: svakulādānīyartvije varāya dātavyā satī dakṣiṇā jāyāpatyoḥ anyonyadānapratigrahābhāvāt tadācāryāya codyate /
GV06apastgcu:2851: dṛśyate cāyaṃ nyāyo dharmaśāstre-“na pitā yājayet putraṃ na putraḥ pitṛyājanam“ityādyuktvā ''cāryāya dakṣiṇāṃ dadyurutu //19//
GV06apastgcu:2857: tathāpi tasyā bharturapi pravāse sahādhikāreṣu karmasu madhyaga dhanatyāge 'numatidvāreṇāva kartṛtvābhyupagamāt /
GV06apastgcu:2860: tena ca ṛtvigbhūto vara ānato bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:2865: atha ubhayādhikāravivāhasidhyarthameva vadhūranena pradhānakarmaṇāpi yāgena saṃskriyate,
GV06apastgcu:2867: tasmāt śūtraṃ yathopapannaṃ syāt tathā vyākhyeyam /
GV06apastgcu:2868: atrocyate-evaṃ tarhyadhyāhāreṇa vā vipariṇāmena vā vyākhyāyate /
GV06apastgcu:2870: yadvā ye 'sya śthālīpākayāgasya karturapacitastasmā etadyāgakartā ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti,
GV06apastgcu:2874: yo 'yaṃ loke vidyābhijanādisampattyā apacitaḥ tasmā ayametatsthālīpākakartā ṛṣabhaṃ dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:2877: evamata ūrdhva dakṣiṇāvarjamupoṣitābhyāṃ parvasu kāryaḥ // ĀpGs_7.17 //
GV06apastgcu:2880: ityanena prakāreṇa kṛtopavāsābhyāṃ gṛhamedhibhyāṃparvasu paurṇamāsīṣu cāmāvāsyāsu ca evamevāgneyasthālīpākakalpena sthālīpākaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2882: tasya ca“āgneyena sthālīpākena yājayatī“tyevamādiḥ tasmā ṛṣabhaṃ dadātī'tyevamanātaḥ kalpa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2885: tatra pārvaṇe vivāhanimittā viśeṣāḥ sakṛtpātrāṇi śamyā ityādayo na kartavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2896: tena saṃveśanānte vivāhikarmaṇi niṣṭhite pañcamahāyajñādīnāṃ gṛhasthadharmāṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2903: chandogāścāmananti -amāvāsyā cet pūrvamāpadyate paurṇamāseneṣṭvātha tat kuryāt /
GV06apastgcu:2908: tasmāt parvasu cobhayorupavāsa iti prāptamupavāsaṃ prakṛtyaṃśenānūdya dvivacanena dvayoradhikāraḥ pradarśyate -upoṣitābhyāmiti /
GV06apastgcu:2915: ubhābhyāṃ parvasu kārya ityucyamāne parvasveva sthālīpākassyāt,
GV06apastgcu:2919: ityādividhinā kṛtopavāsābhyāṃ jāyāpatibhyāṃ parvasu paurṇamāsīṣvamāvāsyāsu ca dvitīyāsudakṣiṇāvarja ṛṣabhadānavarjaevamevaṃprakāra etatsthālīpākasadṛśo homaḥ kartavya iti vidhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:2939: iti nyāyena prakṛtasyaiva sthālīpākasya 'evaṃ parvasu kāryaḥ';
GV06apastgcu:2941: etadapi na;evaṃ sati 'eṣa kārya'iti sūtraṃ syāt,
GV06apastgcu:2945: dharmātideśe tu yathā nānvārambhastathoktameva 'athaināmāgneyema'iti sūtramatideśaviśeṣārthamiti vadatā bhāṣyakāreṇa /
GV06apastgcu:2946: atra ca 'ata ūrdhvam'iti vacanaṃ vivāhamadhye 'pi parvārambhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:2972: iti vacanāt dhānyamuṣṭīnāṃ aṣṭāviṃśatyādhikaṃ śataṃ pūrṇapātram /
GV06apastgcu:2977: sāyaṃ prātarata ūrdhva hastenaite āhutī taṇḍulairyavairvā juhuyāt // ĀpGs_7.19 //
GV06apastgcu:2979: asmāt sthālīpākādūrdhva yāśca eto āhutī brīhitaṇḍulairyavairvājuhuyāt /
GV06apastgcu:2983: ete āhutī ityucyate- ye agnihotrāhutī āhitāgneste ete iti pratijñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3000: asya cārabbho 'nantaraṃ rātrāveva yadi nava nāḍyo nātītāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3007: 'ete'iti viśeṣaṇādatrāpi dvitīyāhutiḥ sviṣṭakṛtsthānītyā aṅgamityarthaḥ tenetāṃ vismṛtya karmasamāptau neṣā punarhotavyā /
GV06apastgcu:3037: ityatra ca sarvaśabedona prakṛtaparāmarśinā prakṛtaśrautasarvayajñānāmeva parāmarśāt /
GV06apastgcu:3047: yo 'yaṃ pārvaṇasya kalpaḥ 'evamata ūrdhva'ityādiḥ pūrṇapātrastu dakṣiṇetyeka ityevamantaḥ sa eva sarveṣāṃ pākayajñānāṃ kalpa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3050: nanvismin vaivāhke dharmā āmnātāḥ pārvaṇasyāpi tata evātidiṣṭāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3054: tena pakvaguṇeṣveva sthālīpākeṣu paśuṣu cāyamatideśo nājyaguṇakeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:3064: ācārādyāni gṛhyanta iti vacanāt asmin śāstre a'nupadiṣṭānāmapi śāstrāntaradṛṣṭānāṃ pakvaguṇakānāmayamupadeśo bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3072: iti pārvaṇaśabdādaṇpratyaye kṛte pārvama ityevaṃ rūpaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3077: nanvevamapi śīghrāvagatasya nityasya pārvaṇasya prakṛtitye sambhavati kimiti vilambitāvagamyasya vaivāhikasya prakṛtitvamucyate ?
GV06apastgcu:3083: asya ca vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdāvācyatvaṃ dharmasāstre vyaktameva /
GV06apastgcu:3095: nanvatra kecit- 'yaccainayoḥ priyaṃ syāttadetasminnahami'ityetacchabdenaikavacanāntena 'parsu ca'iti bahivacanāntanirdiṣṭaparvāhaḥ parāmarśānupapatteḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3100: tasya ca ka4māntarasyopacāraḥ pārvaṇena nityena vyākhyāta ityāhuḥ tatkathaṃ dharmaśāstre vyaketaṃ vaivāhikasya pārvaṇaśabdavācyatvamiti /
GV06apastgcu:3104: gamyamānaṃ caitacchabdena parāmraṣṭuṃ priyabhojanādinā viśeṣayituṃ ca nārham /
GV06apastgcu:3109: ataścātra 'parvasu ca'ityuddeśyagatabahutvasyāvivakṣitatvāt śrutāvyavahitasya prakṛtasyaparvāhasyaiva parāmarśo viśeṣaṇaṃ ca yuktam /
GV06apastgcu:3113: anuvāde ca tasyopacāra iti dūrasyasya parāmarśo ghaṭate /
GV06apastgcu:3116: tathāpi yasyeme vidhīyamānā upavāsapriyabhojanādayo dharmāssambandhinastasyopacāraḥ pārvamena vyākhyāta iti sādhyāhāramevedaṃ sūtraṃ vyākhyeyam
GV06apastgcu:3123: atra ca ato 'nyānītyāha-etatsadṛśānyevauṣadhapradhānahavīṃṣi sarpabalyādīni karmāṇyanena vyākhyātāni,
GV06apastgcu:3124: na tvanena tatsadṛśāni paśuprabhavapradhānahavīṃṣi vapāhomādīnīti vaktum /
GV06apastgcu:3131: auṣadhāni havīmaṣi paśuprabhavāni ca kāni katidhā ca ?iti
GV06apastgcu:3153: .iti prakṛte 'pyatra punarvacanaṃ gṛhyapraśne 'nuktānāṃ mahārājasthālīpāka gaṇahomādīnāmetadvikṛtitvaṃ vaktapam /
GV06apastgcu:3157: ucyate-yadyapi śrautaāprayaṇe vaiśvadevādīnāṃ bhūyastvena paurṇamāsatantrāśaṅkāyāṃ aindrāgnasya mukhyatvāt 'mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavat'(jai.sū.12-2-23)
GV06apastgcu:3160: tathāpyatrānyeṣāṃ haviṣāṃ bahutve 'pyauṣadhasya mukhyatvāt pārvaṇatantrataiveti mukhyanyāyaṃ mandabuddhihitārtha darśayitumeva punaścoktaṃ 'pārvaṇavadājyabhāgānte'iti
GV06apastgcu:3161: tena māsiśrāddhe aṣṭakākarmaṇi ca pārvaṇameva tantram /
GV06apastgcu:3166: iti punarvacanamapūpamāṃsaudanapiṣṭānnahomānāṃ sthāne anukalpena vihitasyauṣadhahaviṣkasyāpi dadhihomasya pārvaṇatantraprāptiṃ jñāpayitum,
GV06apastgcu:3170: yathā 'yasya haviṣevatsā apākṛtā dhayeyustatsthāne vāyavyāṃ yavāgūṃ nirvapet'(āpa.śrau.9-1-23)
GV06apastgcu:3172: kecit-nityasya pārvaṇasya yaḥ kalpassa eva sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ kalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3175: ato 'nyānīti vacanādetatsadṛśānāṃ pakvaguṇānāmeva sthālīpākānāṃ paśūnāṃ cāyaṃ vikalpo,
GV06apastgcu:3180: ityatra paśau na patnīvattvam nāpi hṛdayasaṃsargādiṣu parvaṇo niyamaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3185: etadgṛhyopadiṣṭeṣu yatra vacanaṃ tatraiva tantraṃ, nānyatra /
GV06apastgcu:3187: yata upadiṣṭadharmakasya vaivāhikasya dharmātideśe 'pi naiva doṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3200: tathā naikasminnāgrayaṇe tantralopaphalārtha niyamārthāni bahūni sūtrāṇyārabdhavyāni /
GV06apastgcu:3209: tena pārvaṇe ye devate yasca sthālīpākaḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣu karmasu pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3210: tatra tatrepadiṣṭābhistu devatābhiḥ pārvaṇadevatayoḥ bādhe prāpte tannivṛttyartha vacanaṃ tatra coditānāṃ devatānāṃ deśavidhānārthañca-yo 'yamagniḥ pārvaṇoyaśca sviṣṭakṛt,
GV06apastgcu:3211: tāvantareṇa tayormadhye tā devatā yaṣṭavyā iti /
GV06apastgcu:3212: tatra pārvaṇasyāgneḥ pārvaṇameva haviḥ tatra tatra vihitānāṃ tatra tatra vihitam /
GV06apastgcu:3215: anye tu tatra vihitādeva haviṣaḥ pārvaṇadevatayorapījyāmicchanti /
GV06apastgcu:3216: apara īha- nātra pārdevate anūrdyate agniśca sviṣṭakṛcca /
GV06apastgcu:3217: kiṃ tarhi ?āgantuke ete anenaiva vacanena vidhīyete /
GV06apastgcu:3222: tathā ca śrauteṣu 'yena yajñenetrset kuryādeva tatrāgneyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:3224: pārvaṇavyākhyāteṣu sarveṣveva karmasu yathopadeśaṃ devatā yajati agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca yajati yoyamagnisviṣṭakṛt pārvaṇe dvitīyo devatāviśeṣaḥ taṃ ca yajati tasmādeva haviṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3227: asati samuccaye teṣu tasya pravṛttirna syāt /
GV06apastgcu:3230: antareṇa ityanena tu tasyaiva sviṣṭakṛto deśo niyamyate-pradhānāhutīṣṭopahomāṃścāntaraṇogniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3232: 'ājyāhutīruttarāḥ jayādu pratipadyata'iti ca kramaparaṃ vacanaṃ tatrāpi nityamagnisviṣṭakṛdasminnantarāle yaṣṭavyo bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3238: yathopadeśaṃ sarpavalyādiṣu yāśca yāvatyaśca yena yena prakāreṇa mantravidhānādinopadṣṭāṃ devatāstā eva bhavanti,
GV06apastgcu:3239: na pārvaṇadevatāḥ na teṣu pārvaṇaṃ pradhānaṃ samuccetavyā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3243: pārvaṇe ca sthālīpākahomayoḥ prathamo homaḥ pradhānam /
GV06apastgcu:3251: kintu gārhyakarmānuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ madhye ye mandabuddhayo 'ṅgapradhānayoratideśyānatideśyayośca anabhijñāste pārvaṇenetya viśeṣeṇātideśaprātibhāsāt
GV06apastgcu:3257: yathopadeśaṃ devatāḥ ye vikṛtāvupadiṣṭāḥ te agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ cāntareṇa āgneya sauviṣṭakṛtayorhomayormadhye bhaveyuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3261: vibhaktasya sūtrasya cāyaṃ vivakṣitor'thaḥ- sarveṣu tantravatsvauṣadhahomeṣu dadhihomeṣu
GV06apastgcu:3265: sarvatra sviṣṭakṛtaśśeṣapratipattyarthatvāt svata evāsāvante eva bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:3269: tathāgnimiti cobhayebhyaḥ pradhānāhutibhiyaḥ pūrvamevāgnimukhamityevamartha sviṣṭakṛdvanniyama iti //
GV06apastgcu:3270: kecit- 'yathopadeśaṃ devatā agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca'ityevamantamekaṃ sūtram /
GV06apastgcu:3271: tasyārthaḥ- 'agnissviṣṭakṛt dvitīyaḥ'(āpa.gṛ.7-70 ityatra sviṣṭakṛtaḥ pradhānahomatulyadharmatvajñāpanāt vikṛtiṣu ca pārvaṇapradhānalope sati tasyāpi lopassyāt,
GV06apastgcu:3273: agniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca kuryāt iti tāsu tasya samuccayo vidhīyate /
GV06apastgcu:3275: prakaraṇādvaikṛtapradhānahomānāṃ jayādīnāṃ ca madhye sarvāsvapi vikṛtiṣu sviṣṭakṛnnitya evetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3280: ityetayoḥ antareṇetyanena sambandhākāṅkṣeṇa ekavākyatve sambhavati vākyabhedasyāyuktatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:3286: svamate sviṣṭakṛtassamuccayavidhānādeva tridoṣāyāḥ parisaṅkhyāyā api nirastatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:3290: yā gauratithaya ālabhyate 'gauriti gāṃ prāheti'tadātithyaṃ nāmakarmatadavikṛtamapūrva pārvaṇadharmāstadvapāhome na kartavyā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3301: 'kṛtsnavidhānaṃ ca tasyai vapāṃ śrapayitvopastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamekonnātamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayā juhoti'(āpa.gṛ.22-4) iti /
GV06apastgcu:3306: agnau homeṣu ca āgneyasauviṣṭakṛtāvantareṇa ye homāsta eva pradhānāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3311: 'āryāḥ prayatā vaiśvadeva'iti codite vaiśvadevākhye karmaṇi devatopadeśo 'yaṃ nirvāpakāle saṅkalpārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3314: tena viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ iti saṅkalpya gṛhasthena svagṛhe pākaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3315: tathā pakvādevānnāt homā balayaśca tasyai tasyai devatāyai /
GV06apastgcu:3318: tasmāt na pṛthak pañcamahāyajñāḥ kartavyāḥ tatraiva vaiśvadevam yadagnau kriyate sa devayajñaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3322: tatra vaiśvadeve somāya svāheti dvitīyāhutiriti mantravyākhyākāreṇoktam /
GV06apastgcu:3327: ucyate-ihopadeśe tasya kalpasya sarvacaraṇārthatā na syāt, iṣyate ca /
GV06apastgcu:3329: atha taṃhi devatopadeśaḥ tatraiva kasmānna kṛtaḥ ?
GV06apastgcu:3330: ihopadeśaprayojanamasmin gṛhye tadapi vaiśvadevaṃ karmopadiṣṭaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:3331: tenāsmadīyānāṃ sa eva vaiśvadevakalpo nānyeṣu dharmaśāstreṣu coditaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3337: āgneyādayaṣṣaḍapi homāḥ baliharaṇāni cānagnideśyānyapi sarvāṇyeva pradhānāni;
GV06apastgcu:3341: kintu śeṣa eveti tarhye taccheṣalakṣaṇe tṛtīyādhyāye dṛśyeta /
GV06apastgcu:3344: kintu puṇḍapitṛyajñe tāvadāpastambena hemaḥ piṇḍadānaṃ cobhayaṃ pradhānamuktam,
GV06apastgcu:3365: 'aupāsane pacane vā ṣaḍbhirādyaiḥ pratimantraṃ hastena juhuyāt'(āpa.dha.2-3-17)
GV06apastgcu:3377: sarvaprādhānye ca prayojanam-eṣāmekataramapyakṛtvā prayoge samāpite 'pi tat prāgbhojanāt saprāyaścittaṃ sāṅgamanuṣṭheyam;
GV06apastgcu:3379: kecit-vaiśvadeve viśve devā devatā vidhīyante nirvāpakāle saṅkalpārtham,
GV06apastgcu:3381: yāstu dharmaśāstre mantraviniyogāt kalpitāstāḥ pradānakāle devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3384: idaṃ ca vaiśvadevaṃ na pañcamahāyajñebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtam /
GV06apastgcu:3392: tanna, svamate śrutyā coditān viśvān devān vacanaṃ vināpanīya,
GV06apastgcu:3393: tebhyassaṅkalpitasya haviṣo devatāntarebhyo mantravarṇāt kalpitebhyo dātumayuktatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:3397: yattu mīḍhuṣyai jayantāya cāsmāt sthālīpākāddānaṃ tadapyabhyudayeṣṭyādivat savanīyapuroḍāśavacca
GV06apastgcu:3399: iti vacanaiḥ sthālīpākāṃśadvaye pūrvadevatāpanayena devatāntara vidhānādyuktam /
GV06apastgcu:3402: naca karmabhede teṣāṃ prayogo durupapāda iti pramitabhedāpahnavo yuktaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3403: yato bhāṣye vaiśvadevasya teṣāṃ ca prayogaḥ pṛthagevopapāditaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:3404: atha prayogabhāṣyamīṣadbhedaṃ sikhyate-vaiśvadevasya karmocyate'prasaṅgāt pañcamahāyajñānāṃ ca /
GV06apastgcu:3407: ityādi tatsvāmitvāviśeṣāt sapatnīkaścaritvā praśaste '- hanyārabhya 'āryāḥ prayatā
GV06apastgcu:3411: tato yadi prayāṇe gṛhevā vaiśvadevasya homasya sthāne 'gnirupasamādhātavyaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3414: atha gṛhamedhino yadaśanīyamannaṃ tato homārtha haviṣyamannaṃ pātre kalpayati /
GV06apastgcu:3418: sarvata eva samavadāya manuṣyayajñārya pañcame yadi brāhmaṇatarpaṇaṃ nāvakalpate /
GV06apastgcu:3421: tataḥ pariṣecanaṃ kṛtvā prathamakalpitādannādyathāhutimātraṃ aṅguṣṭhaparvamātraṃ 'agnaye svāhe'tyādibhiḥ ṣaḍaihutīrhutvā uttaraṃ pariṣecanam
GV06apastgcu:3422: atha udīcīnamuṣṇaṃ bhasmāpohya tasmin ahaviṣyaṃ svāhākāreṇa juhoti;
GV06apastgcu:3423: 'yasyāgnau na kriyate yasyacāgraṃ na dāyate na tadbhoktavyam (āpa.dha.2-15-13)
GV06apastgcu:3425: atha ṣaḍāhutihomaśeṣamahaviṣyahomaśeṣeṇa saṃsṛjyānnena sūpa saṃsṛṣṭena dharmaśāstroktena vidhinā raudrāntaṃ baliṃ hṛtvāgraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā,
GV06apastgcu:3426: brāhmaṇoktatvā dapārvaṇa vyākhyātaṃ sannipātītikartavyatākaṃ devayajñaṃ kurvīta /
GV06apastgcu:3437: atha prācīnāvītī pitṛyajñena yakṣye ityuktvā vidyudāsi /
GV06apastgcu:3438: śucaubhūmau kalpitādodanāt hastena aṅguṣṭhapradeśinyāvantareṇa pitṛbhyaḥ svadhāstu,
GV06apastgcu:3442: atha baliharaṇasya homatulyatvāt yajñopavītī bhūtayajñena yakṣya ityuktvā, vudyut /
GV06apastgcu:3446: atha dānasya homatulyatvāt yajñopavītī manuṣyayajñena yakṣya ityuktvā, vidhyuta /
GV06apastgcu:3451: brahmayajñaṃ tu pūrvameva kurvīta agnihotramaupāsanaṃ vā hutvā;
GV06apastgcu:3457: ityevamante viguṇe kṛte 'yadi yajuṣṭa'iti 'bhuvasvāhā'iti homaḥ prāyaścittm /
GV06apastgcu:3458: 'dākṣiṇena pāṇinā savyaṃ prokṣya'ityārabhya śeṣe viguṇe kṛte 'yadyavijñātā'iti prāyaścittam /
GV06apastgcu:3459: atha krama ucyate- brahmayajñena yakṣye ityuktvā, vidyuta /
GV06apastgcu:3461: āsanakalpanādi sāvitrījapāntaṃ kṛtvā vedasyādita ārabhya yathādhyāyamadhyayanamadhyāyaḥ kṛtsnasya vedasyāsamāpteḥ;
GV06apastgcu:3463: iti vacanāt yena prakāreṇādhyāyo yena ca krameṇā dhīryate'vinā cāmnānaiḥ ādipradiśṭānuṣaṅgaprakhyādibhiḥ,
GV06apastgcu:3467: evamaharahaḥ kṛtāntādārabhya yāvatsamāpto vedaḥ sahaikāgni vidhikāṇḍena /
GV06apastgcu:3468: samastamadhītya vaiśvadeva mantrānadhītya tataḥ prasugmanteti praśnadvayadhīyīta /
GV06apastgcu:3472: yadyanekaśākhādhyāyī tato 'nenaiva vidhinā dvitīyaṃ punaradhīyīta ṛgyajussāmnāṃ krameṇa adhyayane yadyanadhyāyassyāt,
GV06apastgcu:3473: tadaikāṃ varcamekaṃ vā yajurekaṃ vā sāma kṛtāṃtādevārabhyābhivyāharet /
GV06apastgcu:3474: yadā brāhmaṇasya krameṇa tadā 'bhūrbhuvassuvassatyaṃ tapaśśraddhāyāṃ juhomī'tyabhivyāharet /
GV06apastgcu:3478: pākapariveṣaṇapātrebhyo lepān saṅkṛṣyottarataḥ śucau deśe rudrāya sampadānabhūtāya ninayet,
GV06apastgcu:3486: phalaṃ vā, sūtrakāreṇopadiṣṭatvāt 'yaetānavyagro yathopadeśaṃ kurute nityaḥ svargaḥ puṣṭiśca'(āpa.dha.2-4-9)
GV06apastgcu:3488: evamṛte mahāyatrebhyaḥ sāyaṃ raudrāntaṃ kṛtvā vaihāyasamākāśe bhūtabaliṃ kurvīta //
GV06apastgcu:3494: “śrāvaṇyāṃ 'paurṇamāsyāmastamite sthālīpāka“ityādi paurṇamāsyāṃ yat karma coditaṃ tatra paurṇamāsīdevatā /
GV06apastgcu:3495: kā sā ?yasyāṃ tat karma kriyate śrāvaṇyai paurṇamāsyai svāheti /
GV06apastgcu:3501: yasyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ śrāvaṇyāṃ mārgaśīrṣyā ca nimittabhūtāyāṃ sthālīpākaḥ kriyate,
GV06apastgcu:3503: ayamarthaḥ sarpabalau 'śrāvaṇyai paurmāsyai svāhā'iti sthālīpākasya homaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3508: upākaraṇe samāpane ca ṛṣiryaḥ prajñāyate // ĀpGs_8.1 //
GV06apastgcu:3513: tathā cānyapare vākye darśanaṃ“kāṇḍopākaraṇe cāmātṛkasya kāṇḍasamāpane cāpitṛkasye“ti (āpa.dha.1-11-1-2)
GV06apastgcu:3515: tathā samāpanaṃ taiṣyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ rohiṇyāṃ vā viramet,iti /
GV06apastgcu:3516: (āpa.dha. 1-9-20) tatra dvividhe 'pyupākaraṇe samāpane cārṣiyeḥ prajñāyate kāṇḍānukramaṇyāṃ kāṇyaṛṣitvena sa tatra devatā /
GV06apastgcu:3519: tatra prājāpatyaṃ saumyaṃ āgneyaṃ vaiśvadevamiti kāṇḍāni /
GV06apastgcu:3522: yatāha baudhāyanaḥ-pauroḍāśikaṃ yājamānaṃ hotāro hautraṃ pitṛmedha iti sabrāhṇaṇāni sānubrāhmaṇāni prājāpatyāni /
GV06apastgcu:3523: ārdhvayavaṃ grahāḥ dākṣiṇāni samiṣṭayajūṃṣyavabhṛthayajūṃṣi vājapeyaśśukriyāṇi savā iti sabrāhmaṇāni sānubrāhmaṇāni saumyāni /
GV06apastgcu:3524: agnyādheyaṃ punarādheyaṃ agnihotramagnupasthānamagnicayanaṃ sāvitra nāciketacāturhotriyavaiśvasṛjāruṇā iti sabrāhmaṇāni sānubrāhmamānyāgyeyāni
GV06apastgcu:3525: rājasūyaḥ paśubandhaḥ iṣṭayo nakṣatreṣṭayo divaśyenayo 'pāghāḥ satrāyaṇamupahemāḥ
GV06apastgcu:3529: tatra kāṇḍopākaraṇe tasya kāṇḍasya ṛṣiryaḥ tasmai homaḥ prajāpataye kāṇḍaṛṣaye svāheti /
GV06apastgcu:3530: tatassadasaspatimadbhutamiti mantreṇa kramaprāptena sahitamantrasvādhyāmārtha vivāhaprakaraṇe paṭhita- /
GV06apastgcu:3531: tasyaiva viniyogapradarśanārtha idaṃ sūtramasmin pradeśe pachitam /
GV06apastgcu:3533: evaṃ tasya tasya samāpane tasmai tasmai kāṇḍarṣaye homaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3540: adhyāyopakāraṇe tu sarveṣāṃ kāṇḍarṣīṇāṃ homaḥ tatassadasaspateḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3542: tatra kāṇḍopākaraṇasamāpanayoru- dagayanādiprāpterupanayanānantaraṃ tadānīmeva prājāpatyaṃ kāṇḍamupākṛtya śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmupākṛtya prājāpatyasya kāṇḍasyādhyayanam /
GV06apastgcu:3546: atha yāvadadhyāyopākaṇaṃ tāvat prājāpatyasya kāṇḍasya dhāraṇādhyayanaṃ śuklapakṣeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:3553: sarvatra utsarjanādūrdhva pūrvagṛhītasyāṃśasya dāraṇādhyayana- maṅgādhyayanañca homaḥ prathamaḥkalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3554: atha ye sārasvataṃ pāṭhamadhīyate teṣāmupanayanānantaraṃ tadānīmeva catvāri vedabratāni krameṇa kṛtvā kāle 'dhyāyamupākṛtya yathāpāṭhamadhyayanaṃ taiṣyāmutsargaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3562: tatra prayogaḥ-parvaṇyudayagayana ityārabhyājyabhāgante somāya kāṇḍarṣaye svāheti sadasaspatimiti ca hutvā jayādipariṣcanānte madantīrupaspṛśyetyevamādi pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:3564: atra viṣayaśudhyarthamadhyāyasya ca prājāpatyasaumyāgneyavaiśvadevākhyānāṃ kāṇḍānāṃ ca tattatkāṇḍākhyavratānāṃ copākaraṇa samāpa- nayośca svarūpamucyate-tatrādhyāyasyopākaraṇaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:3570: ye ete kāṇḍānāmupākaraṇasamāpane te eva vratānāmiti,
GV06apastgcu:3574: vratānyevodagayane kāṇḍavadekaikaśaḥ upākṛtya saṃvatsaraṃ caritvā vidhivadutsṛjet /
GV06apastgcu:3583: tatra tāvadadhyāyopākaraṇasya śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ ācāryaśśiṣyaissaha kṛtaprāṇāyāmo
GV06apastgcu:3584: 'dhyāyamupākariṣya'iti saṅkalpya mahānadyāṃ vidhivat snātvā pavitrapāṇiḥ nava ṛṣīn
GV06apastgcu:3603: tata ācāryapramukhāḥ darbhevāsīnā darbhān dhārayamāṇā vedasyāditaścaturo 'varārdhyānanuvākānadhīyīran /
GV06apastgcu:3613: atha prājāpatye vrate pūrvavat snātvā somāgniviśvedevavarjyānāṃ tarpaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:3614: agnimukhānte cānvārabdhe vratini juhoti-prajāpataye kāṇḍaṛṣaye svāhā /
GV06apastgcu:3624: prājāpatyaṃ vrataṃ cariṣyāmi tacchakeyaṃ tanme rādhyatām ,'; /
GV06apastgcu:3628: evameva samāpane prayogaḥ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare paryavete /
GV06apastgcu:3635: ;'agne vratapate kāṇḍaṛṣibyaḥ āgneyaṃ vrataṃ cariṣyāmī'tyāgneye viśeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3647: madantīmupaspṛśya prathamenānuvākena śāntiṃ kṛtvā catasna audumbarīssamidho ghṛtānvaktā abhyādadhāti 'pṛthivī samit'(tai.ā.7-42-1)
GV06apastgcu:3649: atha devatopasthānam 'agne vratapate kāṇḍaṛṣibhyaḥ saubyaṃ vrataṃ cariṣyāmi'ityādibhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3651: iti vābhivyāhārya vācayitvā jayādi prati padyate /
GV06apastgcu:3659: uttamenānuvākena śāntiṃ kṛtvā gurave varaṃ datvā keśaśmaśru vāpayitvā brāhmaṇabhojanam /
GV06apastgcu:3661: atha sūtramākṣipyate- nanu- 'upākaraṇe samāpane ca ṛṣiryaḥ prajñāyate'iti yaḥ prajāpatyādīnāmanyatamaḥ
GV06apastgcu:3662: kāṇḍānukramaṇyāṃ kāṇḍaṛṣitvena samāmnāyate sa ṛṣiḥ devateti vyarthamevedaṃ sūtram /
GV06apastgcu:3681: homo liṅgakramābhyāṃ 'sadasaspatimadbhutam'ityetayā hotavya iti spaṣṭatvāt sūtrakārasyānādaraḥ kecit--'upākaraṇe samāpane ca yaḥ kāṇḍaṛṣiḥ prajñāyate tasya dvitīyassadasaspatiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3686: vyājena etayoḥ karmaṇoḥ prayogakalpasyānyatra prasiddhasyātrāprasiddhatvāt avaśyāśrayaṇīyasya
GV06apastgcu:3689: tanna;sūtrasthasya sadasaspatiśabdasya mukhyārthadevatāparatvasambhave 'pi mantrapratīkaṃ lakṣayitvā tena lakṣitena mantralakṣaṇāyā ayuktatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:3693: iti dharmaśāstravacanāt śarīrasthityarthamapi bhojanaṃ dvijasya vaiśvadevaśeṣeṇaiva bhavitavyam /
GV06apastgcu:3695: tataśca jvarādibhirupadrave satyapi vaiśvadevāgnihotrādeḥ tatprāyaścittānāṃ vā homānāmavaśyakāryatvādṛtvigantarālābhe
GV06apastgcu:3696: satyapi dvayorapi stryanupetayoḥ yena kenacit prakāreṇa mantra aṅgalopenāpi tatra prasaktiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3697: tathā vaiśvadevasya śrāddhādiṣu 'atha gṛhamedhinoyadaśanīyasya homā balayaśca'; (āpa.dha.2-3-12)
GV06apastgcu:3699: suvarcakā yavakṣārābhyāṃ lavaṇena cāvarānnena ca kośadhānyāparanāmnā māṣādinā tilavyatiriktena saṃsṛṣṭasyāpi bhavati haviṣo home prasaktiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3701: 44 vaiśvadeve niṣiddhaḥ kartā niṣiddhāni ca dravyāṇi /
GV06apastgcu:3702: striyānupetena kṣāralavaṇāvarānnasaṃsṛṣṭasya ca homaṃ paricakṣate // ĀpGs_8.3 //
GV06apastgcu:3704: pākayajñādhikāre sarvatrāyaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ śraddhādiṣvapyavarānnāni kośīdhānyāni māṣādīni kṛṣṇadhānyāni caṇakakodravādīni /
GV06apastgcu:3708: na kṣāralavaṇahomo vidyate“iti pratiṣedhenaiva siddhe uttarārtho 'yaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3709: kiñca “pāṇigrahaṇādi gṛhyaṃ paricaret svayaṃ pantyapi vā putraḥ kumāryantevāsīve“(āśva.gṛ.1-9-1)
GV06apastgcu:3711: setriyāanupetena anupanītena cahoma homamātraṃ śrautaṃ smārta ca śiṣṭāḥparicakṣatevarjayanti yasmāt tasmādeva tābhyāṃ na hotavyamiti vākyaśeṣaḥ
GV06apastgcu:3712: homamiti ca sāmānyābhidhānena śrautahome 'pi stryanupanītau śiṣṭāḥ varjayantīti jñāpanāt gārhyaadhikārāpavādaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3720: tathā tasminnāpi stryanupanītābhyāṃ na hotavyamiti niṣeddhum //3//
GV06apastgcu:3724: yo 'yaṃ stryādīnāṃ pratiṣedhaḥ sa kāmyeṣu karmasu nādaraṇīyaḥyathepadeśamevatāni kartavyāni /
GV06apastgcu:3726: sidhyarthe yadasya gṛhe paṇyaṃ syāditi kāmyodāharaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:3727: evamataūrdhva yadaśanīyasyetyādi balīnāṃ home coditasya stryādipratiṣedhasya baliṣu prasaṅgābhāvāt jñāpakamidaṃ-homadharmo baliṣu pravartata iti /
GV06apastgcu:3728: tena apareṇāgniṃ dakṣiṇaṃ jānvācyetyevamādi baliṣvapi bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3729: 'na kāmyeṣu baliṣu ca'ityova siddhe yathopadeśamiti vacanamupadeśādevaiṣāṃ pravṛttiḥ svaśāstreṇa śāstrāntareṇa vā na pratinidhitvena //3//
GV06apastgcu:3740: anyathā 'gṛhamedhino yadaśanīyasya homā balayaśca'iti vacanādeva kṣārādivyatiriktaśākamāṃsādisūpasaṃsṛṣṭenānnena kāryāssyuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3741: atra ca 'yadaśanī yasya homā balaśca'iti homasāhacaryāt baliṣvapi yā kṣārādiniṣedhaśaṅkā sāvāryate /
GV06apastgcu:3747: sarvatrasarveṣu pākayajñeṣu agnau svayaṃ prajvalite dhamanādi puruṣaprayatnamantareṇetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3748: etasmin nimitte saṃprāpte uttarābhyā- mṛgbhyāṃ dve samidhāvagnāvādadhyāt 'uddīpyasva''mā no hiṃsīriti /
GV06apastgcu:3763: anye tu- 'na svāhākaroti'itteṣa pratiṣedhaḥ ajuhoticoditeṣvapyādadātītyādiṣu svāhākāgaṃ jñāpayatīti //5//
GV06apastgcu:3774: yasminnakṣatre pāṇigrahaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tat na vismartavyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3776: avismaraṇopadeśe prayojanaṃ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare tasminnakṣatre karmaviśeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3781: pārvaṇaviśeṣo yadi syāt tasyopacāraḥ pārvaṇena vyākhyāta ityetadasamjasaṃ syāt /
GV06apastgcu:3784: tataśca śamyādayo 'pi vivāhadharmāḥ syuḥ kiñci sarvacaraṇārthaḥ tatropadeśaḥ //6//
GV06apastgcu:3785: yasminnahani gṛhapraveśanādi sthālīpākāntaṃ karma karoti tadetadaharavadhitvenavijānīyāt tata ārabhya trirātramubhayoradhaśśayyotyādikartum
GV06apastgcu:3789: tasyacehopadiṣṭasya tatropadeśaḥ kathaṃ vivāhāṅgatvaṃ śamyāśca mā bhūvan,
GV06apastgcu:3799: tatra kṣāralavaṇavarjanaṃ sthālīpākāt prāgadhvani na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:3801: caturthyā samāveśanavidhānāt idaṃ tu brahmacarya vacanaṃ dārḍhyaratham /
GV06apastgcu:3825: tayośśayyāmanteraṇa daṇḍo gandhalipto vāsasā sūtreṇa vā parivītastiṣṭhati // ĀpGs_8.9 //
GV06apastgcu:3827: tayoḥ dampatyoḥśayyāmanatareṇaśayanasya madhye daṇḍaḥkṣīrivṛkṣodbhavaḥgandhenasurabhiṇāliptaḥpuṣpaiścālaṅkṛtaḥvāsasā sūtreṇa vā parivītaḥ tiṣṭhatisthāpayitavyaḥ
GV06apastgcu:3830: na tu trirātrādūrdhva nānāśayyā- mekāśayyāṃ cāntareṇāpīti;
GV06apastgcu:3837: ata evāyaṃ daṇḍo naiyagrodha audumbara āśvatthaḥ plākṣo vā,
GV06apastgcu:3849: atra prāptasya nidhānasya vidhānaṃ punastasmin śayane daṇḍasya nidhānaṃ mā bhūditi //9//
GV06apastgcu:3855: tantraśeṣaṃ samāpya tataḥtāmapareṇāgniṃagneḥ paścātprācīṃprāṅmukhīṃupaveśya yo huyasyājyasya
GV06apastgcu:3856: śeṣaḥ tasmādavadāya darvyātasyā vadhvāśśirasi vyāhṛtibhiroṅkāracaturthābhiḥ svāhākārāntābhiḥ

GV06apastgcu:3870: caturthyā rātreḥcaturthasyāhorātrasyāpararātre rātreraparatra tṛtīyabhāge taṃ daṇḍaṃuttarābhyāṃ
GV06apastgcu:3874: tato 'nvārambhavarja jayādau praṇītā mocanānte kṛte apareṇāgniṃ vadhūṃprācīṃprāṅmukhīmupaveśya
GV06apastgcu:3881: atha uttarāstisraḥ 'prajāpate tanvaṃ me'ityādyā japitvā śeṣamanuvākaśeṣaṃ 'ārohorum'ityādikaṃsamāveśane samāveśanakāle japet /

GV06apastgcu:3886: kecit- asatyapi rāge karmārthamasmin krame samaviśanaṃ niyatameveti /
GV06apastgcu:3889: asminneva krame yadi daivādṛtugamanamapi kartavyaṃ syāt tadā pūrva 'ārohorum'ityādijapaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3893: anyo vā brahmaṇaḥ kaścit enau jāyāpatī samāgamiṣyantau anuvākaśeṣeṇābhimantrayeta /
GV06apastgcu:3896: vadhūvāsaḥ prāganena paridhāpitaṃ tat vratānte vimucyānyat vāsaḥ paridhāya saṃspṛśati vadhūḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3899: tadvāsaḥ śvobhūte parādehi śāvalyamityetābhiścatasṛbhiḥ ṛgbhissūryāvide brāhmaṇāya varo dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:3906: yadā malavadvāsāḥ syādathaināṃ brāhmaṇapratiṣiddhāni karmāṇi saṃśāsti 'yāṃ malavadvāsasa'(tai.saṃ. 2.5.1)
GV06apastgcu:3918: brāhmaṇapratiṣiddhānītyucyate lokaparatiṣiddhānyupariśayyāsanādīni lokata eva pratyetavyānīti jñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:3921: 'etānī'tivacanaṃ 'yāṃ malavadvāsa'samityādīnāṃ pratiṣiddhānāṃ vihitānāṃ ca saṃśāsanaṃ yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:3925: tatra 'yāṃ malavadvāsasa'miti vākye snānāt prāk samāgamapratiṣedhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:3941: malavadvāsāḥkālanirgatena śoṇitena malinaṃ vāso vasanaṃ yasyāssā;
GV06apastgcu:3943: rūḍhaśabdatvādyadṛcchayā nirmalavāsā api yadeyaṃ rajasvalā syāt,
GV06apastgcu:3945: kāni tāni brāhmaṇapratiṣiddhānītyata āha- 'yāṃ malavadvāsasa' mityetāni /
GV06apastgcu:3949: atha tāni sugrahārtha krameṇocyanate-na snānātpūrva maithunam /
GV06apastgcu:3951: tadeva na snātayāpi parāṅmukhyā anicchantyā vā /
GV06apastgcu:3965: atra cāmī maithunādiniṣedhā amaithunādisaṅkalapa vidhayo veti bhāṣye na viviktam /
GV06apastgcu:3988: atra rajasaḥ prādurbhāvāt snātāmitivacanāccaturtha'hani prāyatyārthamanayā snātavyameva //13//
GV06apastgcu:4000: ṛtugamana iti vacanāt vaivāhike prathamagamane satyapi ṛtunimittenāyamupadeśaḥ pravartate /
GV06apastgcu:4003: uttarābhirabhimantrayata iti ca gamanamantrāṇāṃ samuccayo bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4012: uttarāmuttarāṃ yugmāṃrātriṃ prati ṛtugamane ṛtau maithune kṛte,
GV06apastgcu:4015: etaduktaṃ bhavati-trayodaśasu rātriṣu ṛtugamane śuklādhikye sati putrā jāyante /
GV06apastgcu:4016: uttarottarāsu ca yugmāsu yathākramaṃ taratamabhāvena te sadguṇādhikā bhavanti //1//
GV06apastgcu:4018: 1. dhanādiprāptyartha prasthitasya madhye parikṣavādau durnimitte jāte kartavyo japaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4019: arthaprādhvasya parikṣave parikāsane cāpa upaspṛśyottare yathāliṅgaṃ japet // ĀpGs_9.2 //
GV06apastgcu:4026: parikāsanevā durnimitte prāpte prāyaścittaṃ apa upaspṛsyottare ṛcau japet 'anuhavaṃ parihavaṃ'; ityete /
GV06apastgcu:4031: tatra yasmin kṛte prayato manyate tatra tat kuryāt /
GV06apastgcu:4034: atha pūrvasyāmṛci parikṣavaśabda ekatośa- vikṛto liṅgamityucyate tathāpyuttarasyāṃ parikāsanaliṅgaṃ nāstyeva /
GV06apastgcu:4053: iha ca vacanaprayojanaṃ vivāhārtha gaccha to 'pi eteṣu nimtteṣu prāyaścittametat yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:4055: idaṃ tu arthaprādhvasyeti vacanāt sarvārtha ca bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4056: prakaraṇāt vivāhe 'pi svādhyāyasthānaniyamārtha ca mantrayoretayoriha pāṭhaḥ //2//
GV06apastgcu:4061: brahmayajñodaka yagyaghāsādi kamuddiśya samīpadośaṃ prati nirgataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4062: tasyaparikṣavekṣavadhau parikāsanekāse ca durnimitte jāte apa upaspṛśya upasparśanamācamanaṃ
GV06apastgcu:4063: sparśanamātraṃ vā yathātuṣṭi kṛtvottare 'anuhavaṃ parihavam'ityete yathāliṅgeparikṣave pūrvā,
GV06apastgcu:4066: atra ca yathāliṅgamityanenaitat jñāpayati-pūrvayā varṇavyatyayona parikṣava eva prakāśyaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:4068: yathā caite ṛcau kṣavadhukāsāveva tātparyeṇa prakāśayataḥ,
GV06apastgcu:4070: kecit-yathāliṅgamiti na kevalaṃ parikṣave parikāsane cānayorjapaḥ anyeṣu ca mantraliṅgapratīteṣvanuhavādiṣu durnimitteṣvapīti //2//
GV06apastgcu:4072: evamuttarairyathāliṅgaṃ citriyaṃ vanaspatiṃ śakṛdrīti sigvātaṃ śakunimiti // ĀpGs_9.3 //
GV06apastgcu:4078: citriyaḥprasiddhaḥ tatrārtaprādhvaḥ citriyaṃ vṛkṣamāsādyāpa upaspṛśya 'agnirastvi'ti etayarcānumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:4082: sigasi nāsīti dīrghānte prāpte chāndaso hrasvaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4083: śakuniṃ śubhāṃ vāca manumantrayeta udgāteva śakune''katyetayarcā aśubhavacane tu prāgukto japaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4103: 'nvārabdhāyāṃ sthālīpākāduttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvā
GV06apastgcu:4104: tena sarpiṣmatā yugmān dvyavarān brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā sidviṃ vācayīta // ĀpGs_9.4 //
GV06apastgcu:4106: yadi varasya mano vardhvā na tuṣyet atha tassiddhikāmena vadhvāḥ pitrādinā tapoyuktenedaṃ karma kartavyamajñātaṃ varasya /
GV06apastgcu:4109: taduktaṃ purastāt brahmacaryavidhānasya dṛṣṭārthatvāt yāvatā tapasārthasiddhiṃ manyate tāvat kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:4123: pārvaṇātideśāt ekasyaiva brāhmaṇasya bhojane prāpte bahutvaṃ vidhīyate /
GV06apastgcu:4125: sarpiṣmadvacanaṃ niyamārtha pariṣecanādūrdhva pārvaṇadharmāṇāṃ sarpiṣmatvameva bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:4129: katham?yo homasya kartā sa eva vrāhmaṇabhojanaṃ siddhivācanaṃ ca kuryāditi tena yaduttaraṃ karma parikiraṇādi tasya vadhūḥ kartrīti //6//
GV06apastgcu:4132: hṛdayasaṃsarga manasossamprītimīpsuḥ vadhvā hitaiṣī pitṛbhrātrādirapāpo 'pi trirātrādanūnaṃ
GV06apastgcu:4137: tenahutaśeṣeṇasarpiṣmatā yugmān dvyavarāndvāvavarau saṃkhyāto yeṣāṃ tānbrāhmaṇānyathālābhaṃbhojayitvātaireva bhuktavadbhiḥ karmaphalasiddhirastvitisiddhiṃ vācayīta /
GV06apastgcu:4138: tena sarpiṣmateti ca pārvaṇasiddhānuvādo yugimāniti vidhātum //4//
GV06apastgcu:4141: śvastiṣyeṇeti trissaptairyavaiḥ pāṭhāṃ parikirati“yadi vāruṇyasi varuṇāttvā niṣkrīṇāmi yadi saumyasi somāttvā niṣkrīṇāmi“iti // ĀpGs_9.5 //
GV06apastgcu:4143: śvoyat karaṇīyaṃ karmatattiṣyeṇa nakṣatreṇasampādyata iti kṛtvā pūrvedyussiddhivācanānte
GV06apastgcu:4144: karmaṇi kṛte pitrādinā ṛtvijā yajamānabhūtā vadhūḥ yatra pradeśe pāṭhā tiṣṭhati tatra
GV06apastgcu:4148: pāṭhotthāpanādi bhartṛparigrahaṇāntaṃ karma śvobhūte paridyustiṣyo bhavatīti kṛtvā pūrvedyuḥśvastiṣyaḥpunarvasū ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4149: tasmin nakṣatre pitrādinā siddhivācanānte karmaṇi kṛte,
GV06apastgcu:4150: anantaraṃ vadhūryatra bhūmau pāṭhāsti tatra gatvā tāṃpāṭhāṃ trissaptaiḥekaviṃśatyā yavaiḥ 'yadi vāruṇyasi';
GV06apastgcu:4153: śvobhūte uttarayotthāpyottarābhistisṛbhirabhimantryottarayā praticchannāṃ hastayorābadhya śayyākāle bāhubhyāṃ bhartāraṃ parigṛhṇīyādupadhānaliṅgayā
GV06apastgcu:4155: kṛtvā parikiraṇamupoṣya tataḥśvobūtetāṃ pāṭhāṃ itthāpayati khanitreṇa khātvotkhidatiuttarayarcā “imāṃ khanīmī“tyetayī /
GV06apastgcu:4157: tasyā mūlaṃ dvedhā pracchidya hastayorāvadhnāti uttarayarcā'ahamasmī'tyetayā /
GV06apastgcu:4158: praticchannāṃ yathā bhartā na paśyati tathetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4159: ubhayatra mantrasyāvṛttiḥ ābadhya tato rātrau śayyākāle bhartāraṃ parigṛhṇīyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4160: upadhānaliṅgayāṛcā 'upate 'dhā'mityetayā uttarayeti vaktavye upadhānaliṅgayeti vacanaṃ parigrahe viśeṣavidhānārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4162: anyataradadhastādupadhānaṃ bhavati itaraccopariṣṭādapidhānaṃ tathā parigrahaḥ kartavyaḥ //8//
GV06apastgcu:4163: paredyurvadhūreva tāṃ pāṭhāṃ 'imāṃ khanāmi'ityetayā khamitreṇotkhāya 'uttānaparṇe'ityādibhistisṛbhirabhimantryatasyāḥ mūlaṃ dvidhā chitvā
GV06apastgcu:4164: upāyena bharturadṛśye kṛtvā 'ahamasmi sahamānā'ityetayābhyastayā svahastayorābadhya rātrau śayyākāle 'upate 'dhām'ityupadhānaliṅgayā bāhubhyāṃ bhartāraṃ parigṛhṇīyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4166: kecit-ābadhya pāṭhāmūlayorhastayorupadhānameko 'nyaścāpidhānaṃ yathā syāt tathā parigṛhṇīyāditi //6//
GV06apastgcu:4169: yadi bhāryā bhartari na ramate tadā naivaitatkarma bhavatīti pradarśanārthamidaṃvaśyaḥ patirbhavati bhāryāyāḥ na bhāryā bharturiti //9//
GV06apastgcu:4179: aupāsana evāgniḥ yo 'syā vivāhena sampāditaḥ yā saptanīṃ bādhate /
GV06apastgcu:4181: tathā ca rājasūya ityuktaṃ-“tasyā aupāsane pratinihitam“(āpa.śrau.18-16-14) iti /
GV06apastgcu:4189: ya ekayā saṃsṛṣṭahṛdayo 'pyanyāṃ tatsapatnīṃ bhāryā tadadhīnadharmādāvapi lobhānna
GV06apastgcu:4190: bādhate so 'pi kathaṃ nu nāma tadadhīnadharmā dyupekṣayāpi tāṃ bādhetaivetyevamarthatvādasya karmaṇaḥ //8 //
GV06apastgcu:4197: etāsminneva kāme vadhūḥ 'udasau sūryo agāt'ityanuvākena prāgbhojanādaharaharādityamupatiṣṭhate /
GV06apastgcu:4198: sadeti vacanaṃ ca siddhe 'pi sapatnībādhanakāme karmāntaraṃ veti //9//
GV06apastgcu:4199: yakṣmagṛhītāmanyāṃ vā brahmacaryayuktaḥ puṣkarasaṃvartamūlairuttarairyathāliṅgamaṅgāni saṃmṛśya pratīcīnaṃ nirasyet // ĀpGs_9.10 //
GV06apastgcu:4202: tena gṛhītāṃbhāryā anyāṃ vā svāṃ striyaṃ mātṛprabhṛtiṃ jñātvā bhaiṣajyamidaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:4215: anyāṃ vā rājayakṣmaṇo 'nyaiḥ kuṣṭhādibhirgṛhītāṃ vā vadhūṃ taddhitaiṣī uktalakṣaṇabrahmacaryayuktaḥpuṣkarasyapadmasya
GV06apastgcu:4219: kecit yakṣmagṛhītāṃ bhāryā anyāṃ vā mātrādiṃ puṣkarasya saṃvartaiḥ parimaṇḍalākāraiḥ mūlairiti //10//
GV06apastgcu:4225: yo 'smin praśne paṭhitān mantrān sārthān veda tasmai /
GV06apastgcu:4228: teṣāṃ vadhūvāsa iti viśeṣaṇamanyasyāḥ striyāḥ yakṣmagṛhītāyāḥ vāsaso dānanivṛttyartham /
GV06apastgcu:4229: etadvida iti ca bhaiṣajyakarmakṛta ityarthaḥ mantreṣu tu parādehi ityādiṣu vivāhakāle parihitasya vadhūvāsasaḥ sparśanindā /
GV06apastgcu:4231: kalpāntare ca tadvyaktam -“caritavrataḥ sūryāvide vadhūvastraṃ dadyāt“(āśva.gṛ. 1.8.13) iti /
GV06apastgcu:4237: etadvideetatkarma samantrārtha yo vetti tasmai 'parā dehi'ityādibhiścata bhrda tasṛbhirdadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4239: ya etān mantrān sārthān veda tasmai dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4241: asya ca samāveśanānantaramupadeṣṭa vyasya ihopadeśo hṛdayasaṃsargārthe karmaṇi śamyājñāpanārthamiti /
GV06apastgcu:4257: yena ācāryakusamupanīyate kumāraḥtadupanayanaṃ nāma karma śrautaḥ puruṣasaṃskāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4263: yatra brahmacāridharmāḥ sāmayācārikeṣu tatraivopanayane 'pyucyamāne sarvacaraṇārthatā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4272: tathā cāyamarthaḥ- upanayanākhyaṃ karma vaikalpikakalpoktyā vistṛtaṃ balavatpramāṇopapannaṃ asādhāraṇaiśśabdairvakṣyāma iti /
GV06apastgcu:4276: kiñci gṛhyopadiṣṭakarmasu gṛhasthasyaivādhikāro na brahmatāriṇa ityevaṃrūpaṃ viśeṣaṃ jñāpayitumapratijñaṃ vivāhamupadiśya upanayanakalpopadeśaḥ sapratijñaḥ kriyate /
GV06apastgcu:4281: yasmin varṣe garbho bhūtvā śete tadvarṣa garbhaśabdenocyate tadaṣṭamaṃ yeṣāṃ tānīmānigarbhāṣṭamānivarṣāṇi /
GV06apastgcu:4283: apara āha-janmaprabhṛti saptānāṃ varṣāṇāṃ garbhamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4287: atra ṣaṣṭhasaptamayoḥ kāmyamupanayanaṣṭame nityamityayaṃ viseṣo na syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4289: kiṃca pañcame ṣaṣṭhe vā varṣe vartamāne kathaṃ garbhavarṣamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4291: tasmāt saptame vartamāna eva garbhavarṣamaṣṭamaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4296: rājanyavaiśyayoḥ viśeṣopadeśā deva garbhāṣṭamavidheḥ brāhmaṇaviṣayatve siddhe brāhmaṇavidhiḥ śrutyanuvāda eva /
GV06apastgcu:4304: tadaṣṭamaṃ yeṣāṃ janmādīnāṃ saptānāṃ tāni garbhāṣṭamāni varṣāṇi /
GV06apastgcu:4307: tathāpi janmādiṣu triṣu caulāntaiḥ garbhasaṃskārairavaruddhatvānna kriyate /
GV06apastgcu:4310: ato 'tropādeyagatā bahutvasaṅkhyā kapiñjalanyāyena garbhādārabhya ṣaṣṭhasaptamāṣṭameṣu triṣvevāvatiṣṭhate,
GV06apastgcu:4312: nanūttaratra 'rājanyaṃ''vaiśya'miti viśeṣopādānādeva garbhāṣṭamavidhirbraahmaṇa syaivetyarthasiddhatvāt brāhmaṇamiti na vaktavyam /
GV06apastgcu:4328: śāstrāntaradṛṣṭānāṃ kālāntarāṇāmihapravṛttirmā bhūdityevaṃ bruvannetat jñāpayati-caulādiṣu śāstrāntaradṛṣṭo 'pi kālaḥ pakṣe bhavatīti //3//
GV06apastgcu:4338: brāhmaṇānbhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā kumāraṃ bhojayitvānuvākasya prathamena yajuṣāpaḥ saṃsṛjyoṣṇāśśītāsvānīyottarayā śira unatti // ĀpGs_10.5
GV06apastgcu:4341: tataḥ śvobhūte brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā tairāśiṣo vācayati-piṇyāhaṃ svasyṛddhaṃ iti /
GV06apastgcu:4349: uttareṇa yajuṣetyeva siddhe anuvākasya prathamena yajuṣetyuktaṃ saṃjñākaraṇārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4350: tena uṣṇena vāyavudakenetyeṣa ityatrānuvākasya grahaṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4351: anyathā saṃśayaḥ syāt- anuvāko mantrā veti /
GV06apastgcu:4353: atmanaśca nāpitasya ca yā undanārthāstāḥ saṃsṛjati taccānyeṣāṃ vyaktam-nāpitaṃ śiṣyāt-śīto ṣṇābhirahbhirabartha kurvāṇo 'kṣaṇvan kuśalīkurviti
GV06apastgcu:4354: brāhmaṇān bhojayitvetyanena yacchrāddhaṃ dharmaśāstre 'śucīn mantravatassarvakṛtyeṣu bhojayet'(āpa.dha.2-15-11)
GV06apastgcu:4368: atra ca kumārasya snavabhojanātprāk 'yajñopavītaṃ paramaṃ pavitram'ityādimantreṇa yajñopavītadhāraṇam /
GV06apastgcu:4369: 'bhojana ācamane svādhyāye ca yajñopavītī syāt'iti dharmaśāstravacanāt //
GV06apastgcu:4378: atra cānuvākagrahaṇaṃ gṛhyamantrāssamāmnātā eva na kalpasūtrasthā iti jñāpanārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4382: trīṃstrīn darbhānantardhāyottarābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratimantraṃ pratidiśaṃ pravapati // ĀpGs_10.6 //
GV06apastgcu:4385: tena pūrva mantravadvapanaṃ karotyācāryaḥ paścānnāpita ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4386: tatrāyaṃ prayogaḥ kumārasya śirasi prācyāṃ diśi trīn darbhānantardhāya 'yenāvapa'dityetayā pracchinatti kṣureṇa /
GV06apastgcu:4387: asāvityabya sthāne tasya nāma pthamayā vibhaktyā gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:4391: athāpa upaspṛśya tathaiva dakṣiṇyāṃ diśi 'yena pūṣe'ti /
GV06apastgcu:4394: atra saṃbudhyā nāmagrahaṇaṃ-tena te vapāmi yajñadattaśarmmannāyuṣeti //5//
GV06apastgcu:4395: tato 'yenāvapat'ityādibhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratimantraṃ pratidiśaṃ trīṃstrīn darbhānantardhāya keśān pravapati /
GV06apastgcu:4397: tatra prathame mantre asāvityasya sthāne viṣṇuśarmeti kumārasya nāmagrahaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:4399: vapantamuttarayānumantrayate dakṣiṇato mātā brahmacārī vā // ĀpGs_10.7 /
GV06apastgcu:4401: evamāryeṇa pratidiśaṃ pravapane kṛte nāpitastasya keśān vapati saṃsṛṣṭābhirevādbhirabartha kurvāṇaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4403: dakṣiṇata upaviśya kumārasyamātā brahmacarī vā kaścit 'yat kṣureṇa'ityetayāvapantamācāryamanumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:4408: ānaḍuhe śakṛtpiṇḍe yavānnidhāya tasmin keśānupayamyottarayodumbaramūle darbhastambe vā nidadhāti // ĀpGs_10.8 //
GV06apastgcu:4410: atha kumārasyamātā brahmacārī vā kaścit tasya dakṣiṇata upaviśya kasmiścit pātre
GV06apastgcu:4411: ānaḍuhaṃ śakṛtpiṇḍaṃ kṛtvā yavāśca tasmin piṇḍaṃ nidhāya tasmin keśānupayacchati
GV06apastgcu:4412: upagṛhṇāti yathā bhūmau na patanti tathā sarvānupayamya tatastān keśānudumbarasya
GV06apastgcu:4416: upanayanasya prakṛtatvānmātā brahmacārī vā 'uptvāya keśān'ityetayāānaḍuhe śakṛtpiṇḍeityādi yathopadeśaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:4426: snātamagnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte pālāśīṃ samidhamuttarayā'dhāpyottareṇāgniṃ dakṣiṇena padāśmanamāsthāpayatyātiṣṭheti // ĀpGs_10.9 //
GV06apastgcu:4443: ādhāpya samidhamuttareṇāgniṃ aśmānaṃpratiṣṭhitamanenāsthāpayati dakṣiṇena padā 'ātiṣṭhema'miti mantreṇa /
GV06apastgcu:4446: tenācāryo mantramuktatvā dhatriṇaṃ pādaṃ hastābhyāṃ gṛhītvāśmani nidhāpayati //8//
GV06apastgcu:4450: ājyabhāgānte kṛte snātaṃkumāraṃ 'āyurdā deva'ityetayāpālāśīṃva samidhaṃhaste gṛhītvā'dā- payati /
GV06apastgcu:4464: ekasminnevāhani tantukriyā vayanākriyā ca yasya tatsadyaḥkṛttotaṃ /
GV06apastgcu:4469: tataḥ taṃ parihitavantaṃ kumāraṃ ācāryaḥuttarayā ' parīdaṃ vāsa'ityetayāanumantrayate //9//
GV06apastgcu:4470: vāsaḥ yacchāṇyādi dharmaśāstre vihitaṃtat sadyaḥkṛttotaṃsadya eva chinnotaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:4472: kecit-ekasminne vāhani tantukriyā vayanakriyā ca yasya,
GV06apastgcu:4474: evaṃbhūtaṃ 'revatīstvā'iti dvābhyāmabhimantrya 'yā akṛntan'ityetābhistisṛbhiḥ paridhāpya parihitaṃkumāraṃ 'parīdaṃ vāsaḥ'ityanayānumantrayate
GV06apastgcu:4476: mauñjīṃ mekhalāṃ trivṛtāṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇamuttarābhyāṃ parivīyājinamuttaramuttarayā // ĀpGs_10.11 //
GV06apastgcu:4478: athamekhalāmuttarābhyāmṛgbhyāṃ 'iyaṃ duruktā'dityetābhyāṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ parivyayati kumāram /
GV06apastgcu:4491: mekhalāṃ ' iyaṃ duruktāt' ityetābhyāṃtriḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ parivyayati /
GV06apastgcu:4496: ityādi dharmaśāstre vihitamuttaraṃ vāsaḥ karoti 'mitrasya cakṣuḥ'ityetayā //11//
GV06apastgcu:4500: triḥ prokṣyottarairdakṣiṇe haste gṛhītvottarairdevatābhyaḥ parīdāyottareṇa yajuṣopanīya
GV06apastgcu:4505: avasthāpyasvayaṃ paścāt bhūmāvavasthāya svamañjalimudakena pūrayitvā tamjalimasmai kumārāya pratimukhaṃ darbheṣvavasthitāya prokṣaṇārthamānayati tasyāñjalau /
GV06apastgcu:4517: atha kumārasya hastaṃ gṛhṇāti uttaraurdaśabhirmantrauḥ 'agniṣṭe hastamagramī'dityādibhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4519: tatauttarai rekādaśabhiḥ 'agnaye tvā paridadāmī'tyādibhiḥ taṃ devatābhyaḥparidadāti /
GV06apastgcu:4521: paridāyatamuttareṇa yajuṣā'devasya tvā savituḥ'ityetenaupanayate vidyānuṣṭhānārtha ācāryaḥ svakulaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4525: kecit-asāvityantodātasya pāṭhāt ācāryasya nāma prathamayā nirdeśyaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:4528: upanīyasuprajā iti dakṣiṇe karṇe japati 'supoṣaḥ poṣai'rityevamanto japaḥ //11//
GV06apastgcu:4537: tataśca yadi sakṛtparidānaṃ syāt tadā vidhyaparādhāt sarvaprāyaścittaṃ hotavyam /
GV06apastgcu:4539: uttareṇa yajuṣā'devasya tvā savituḥ'ityanena upanayateātmanassamīpaṃ nayati /
GV06apastgcu:4551: savitrā prasūta ityevamanto mantraḥ āheti vacanaṃ uccaiḥ prayogārtham //1//
GV06apastgcu:4556: tatra yatra pṛṣṭaṃ tata ārabhya karmcārsyetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4569: 'ko nāmāsī'tyādiṣu praśnaprativacanārtheṣu caturṣu mantreṣu praṣṭaṃ parasyācāryasya,
GV06apastgcu:4580: pṛṣṭaprativacanādūrdhva anuvākasyayaśśeṣaḥtaṃ 'eṣa te dva sūrye'tyādikaṃ para ācāryo japati //3//
GV06apastgcu:4602: pradhānahomeṣu hāvayitveti vacanāt upahomeṣvācārya eva kartā //5//
GV06apastgcu:4605: ājyabhā gāntamuktvā ye paścāt pratyagāśiṣo mantrāḥ mekhalāparivyayaṇādiṣūktāḥ 'iyaṃ duruktāt'ityādyāstānapi svayamuktavā vācayati /
GV06apastgcu:4607: idaṃ tviha vaktavyam yāsu mekhalāparivyayaṇādiṣu kumārapradhānāsu saṃskārakriyāsu ye pratyagāśiṣo mantrāḥ,
GV06apastgcu:4608: taccodakairākhyātaiḥ karaṇatvena coditāḥ kriyāḥ tairmantraiḥ kṛtvā paścādvācayati /
GV06apastgcu:4620: ityekādarśacaḥ pratyagāśiṣo vācayan haste gṛhītvā pratimantraṃhāvayati /
GV06apastgcu:4621: tatra dvitīyacaturthau 'imamagna āyuṣe''agniṣṭa āyuḥ pratarām'iti liṅgavirodhāt 'āyurdā deva jarasam'itivat svayameva brūyāt,
GV06apastgcu:4625: tataśca agnirbhūtānāmadhiparissamāvatu'ityādīnāṃ pratyagāśiṣāmapi vācanaṃ na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:4628: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvāpareṇāgnimudagagraṃ kūrca nidhāya tasminnuttareṇa yajuṣopanetopaviśati // ĀpGs_11.7 //
GV06apastgcu:4632: kecit sāvitraṃ nāma vratamasmin kāla upākurvanti kecit trirātrānte sāvitrīmanubruvate /
GV06apastgcu:4637: purastāt pratyaṅṅāsīna ityatra upanetuḥ purastāt yathā syāt agneḥ pirastāt mā bhūt iti /
GV06apastgcu:4638: tathā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dakṣiṇaṃ pādamityatropanetuḥ pādo na māṇavakasya //6//
GV06apastgcu:4644: purastāt pratyaṅṅāsīnaḥ kumāro dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dakṣiṇaṃ pādamanvārabhyāha 'sāvitrīṃ bho anubrūhi'iti // ĀpGs_11.8 //
GV06apastgcu:4649: upanetuḥpurastāt prayaṅmukhaḥ āsīnaḥ kumāro dakṣiṇena pāṇināupaneturdakṣiṇaṃpādaṃ anvārabhyaupasaṃgṛhya 'sāvitrīṃ bho /
GV06apastgcu:4659: tena yadyasamarthaḥ kumāraḥ tāvat vaktuṃ tato yathāśakti vācayati /
GV06apastgcu:4660: svayaṃ vidhivat pūrvamuktvā prathamaṃ pacchaḥ pādepāde 'vasānam /
GV06apastgcu:4663: uttaramiti vaktavyaṃ tatsavituriti nirdeśaḥ sāvitrīpradeśoṣu sāvitryā samitsahasramādadhyā(āpa.dha.1-27-1)
GV06apastgcu:4664: dityādiṣu asyā eva grahaṇaṃ yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4669: tatraca savitṛdevatyāmṛcamanubrūhītyaviśeṣeṇa prārthanā yāṃ kṛtāyāmapi yoyaṃ 'tatsaviturityanvāha'iti
GV06apastgcu:4683: vyāhṛtīrvihṛtāḥ pādādiṣvanteṣu vā tathārrdhacayoruttamāṃ kṛtsnāyām // ĀpGs_11.11 //
GV06apastgcu:4685: tatrāvānuvacane viśeṣaḥ prathame vacane pādānāṃ trayāṇāṃ ādiṣvanteṣu vā tistro vyāhṛtayaḥ krameṇa vaktavyāḥ //9//
GV06apastgcu:4686: dvitīya vacane arrdhacayorāditaḥ antato vā dve vyāhṛtī krameṇa vaktavye /
GV06apastgcu:4698: oṃsivaḥ tatsaviturveṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhāmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt //
GV06apastgcu:4713: oṃsuvaḥ tatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargodevasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt '; /
GV06apastgcu:4714: anteṣu veti pakṣe prayogaḥ-'oṃ tatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhūḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4716: oṃ dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt suvaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:4717: oṃ tatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi bhūḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4719: oṃtatsaviturvareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayāt suvaḥ 'iti //11//
GV06apastgcu:4726: mantre asāvityanena prāṇo 'bhidhīyate nācāryo nāpi māṇavakaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4749: pālāśo daṇḍo brāhmaṇasya naiyyagrodhasskandhajo 'vāṅgro rājanyasya bādara audumbaro vā vaiśyasya // ĀpGs_11.15 //
GV06apastgcu:4751: rājanyavaiśyayoḥ viśeṣavidhānādeva siddhe brāhmaṇagrahaṇaṃ ayamapi vidhirrvaṇasaṃyuktau yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:4753: itarathā rājanyavaiśyayoreva syāt tayoreva varṇasaṃyuktaṃ vidhānamiti kṛtvā //14//
GV06apastgcu:4758: badaryā vikāro bādaraḥvṛkṣaprakaramāt udumbaro vṛkṣaḥ, na tāmram //16//
GV06apastgcu:4770: atra ca sāmayācārika eva daṇḍavidhissarvacaraṇārthaḥ sannihānūdyate naiyyagrodhādiṣu mantraprāpaṇārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4773: “devā vai brahmannavadanta tat parṇa upāśṛṇot suśravā vai nāmeti“(tai.saṃ.35-7)
GV06apastgcu:4774: vārkṣo daṇḍa itvetāvataiva siddhe avarṇasaṃyogeneti vacane kalpāntarayorasaṃbhedadarśanārtham-yadi varṇasaṃyuktaḥ kalpaḥ prakrāntaḥ sa evāsamāvartanāt kartavya iti //17//
GV06apastgcu:4778: atra yadyapi 'tat parṇa upāśrṛṇotsuśravā vai nāma'(tai.saṃ.3-5-7)
GV06apastgcu:4785: kecit -tatraiva sarvacaraṇārtha vihitānāṃ daṇḍānāṃ gṛhye 'nuvādaḥ sarveṣāmupādāne 'pi śrutyaitanmantravidhānārtha iti //16//
GV06apastgcu:4788: smṛtaṃ ca ma ityetadvācayitvā gurave varaṃ datvodāyuṣetyutthāpyottarairādityamupatiṣṭhate // ĀpGs_11.17 //
GV06apastgcu:4790: atha daṇḍamādāya tatraivāsīnaḥ kumāraḥsmṛtañca ma ityetatvratasaṃkīrtanamāha /
GV06apastgcu:4795: vivakṣite tu tasmin varadāne upasthāne cā'cārya eva kartā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:4799: teṣāṃ pratyagāśiṣṭvādeva vācane prāpte vācayitveti punarvacanaṃ vācanavaradānayoḥ nairantaryārtham /
GV06apastgcu:4805: ityādita ārabhya 'devi dakṣiṇe'ityevamantamuktvā 'rudrāya gāṃ tenāmṛtatvamaśyām'ityādi sandhāya 'uttānastvāṅgīrasaḥ pratigṛhṇātu'(tai.ā.3-10)
GV06apastgcu:4814: jñāpitaṃ cait 'yoktraṃ vimucya tāṃ tataḥ pra vā vāhayet'(āpa.gṛ.5-13)
GV06apastgcu:4819: vācayitvotthāpyeti tu ṇijartho he turavivakṣitaḥ'anyathā tvasamānakartṛkatvāt varadānamupasthānaṃ cācāryakartṛkaṃ syāt tathā gurugrahaṇaṃ caulādau brahmaṇe varadānārthamiti //17//
GV06apastgcu:4823: cchidyeteti tamuttarayā dakṣiṇe haste gṛhṇīyāt // ĀpGs_11.18 //
GV06apastgcu:4826: ayaṃ matto na chidyeta na viyujyeta madadhīna eva sāyādāsamāvarthanāditi tametasmin kāle dakṣiṇe haste gṛhṇīyātuttarayarcā'yasmin bhūtami'tyetayā
GV06apastgcu:4830: yaṃ kumāraṃ ayamāsamāvartanānmatto na cchidyena na viyucyetetikāmayeta,
GV06apastgcu:4831: tamuttarayā 'yasmim bhūtam'ityanayarcā sambudhdyā ca nāma gṛhītvādakṣiṇe haste gṛhṇīyātyadyamācāryaścaturvedī sarvaśāstravit adhyāpayituṃ vyākhyātuṃ ca śaknoti //18//
GV06apastgcu:4834: etamupanayanāgniṃ vyahaṃ dhārayanti avināśinaṃ kurvanti pitrādayaḥ //20//
GV06apastgcu:4849: pari tve ti parimṛjya tasminnuttarairmantraissamidha ādadhyāt // ĀpGs_11.21 //
GV06apastgcu:4851: tamupanayanāgniṃ 'pari tve 'tyanena mantreṇaparimṛjya sarvato mārjamudakena kṛtvāuttarairmantraiḥ
GV06apastgcu:4852: 'agnaye samidha'mityādibhiḥ dvādaśabhiḥ pratimantraṃ samidho nityamādadhyāt brahmacārī /
GV06apastgcu:4861: adhikārādeva siddhe tasminniti vacanaṃ tryahādūrdvamapi tasminupanayanāgnāveva samidādhānaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:4877: tathā dharmaśāstre tu 'samiddhamagniṃ pāṇinā parisamūhenna samūhanyā'; (āpa.dha.1-4-18)
GV06apastgcu:4884: evaṃ tryahaṃ dhāraṇapakṣe tryahādūrdhvaanyasminnapyagnāvidaṃ karma kartavyamityarthaḥ //23//
GV06apastgcu:4891: evamuktena vidhinā sadā upanayanaprabhṛtyāsamāvartanāt aharahassāyaṃ prātaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:4894: na tūpanayanāgnirnaṣṭa iti nityasya samidādhānasya lopaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4906: athaṃ taṃuttarayarcā'brahmacāryasī'tyetayāsaṃśāstiguruḥ saṃśkṣayatītyarthaḥ yathāpāṭhāmṛcā saṃśāsanaṃ arta ca kathayati /
GV06apastgcu:4912: pūrvavat prativacanaṃ sarvatrā karma kuru guruśuśrūṣaṇādi /
GV06apastgcu:4916: apara āha-atha yaḥ pūrvotthāyī jaghanyasaṃveśī tamāhurna svapitīti /
GV06apastgcu:4919: ācāryādhīno bhavamātāpitrorapi vaśaṃ tyaktvā ācāryavaśe vartasvetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4921: atra bodhāyanaḥ-“athāsmā ariktaṃ pātraṃ prayacchātrāha mātaramevāgre bhikṣasveti” /
GV06apastgcu:4939: saṃśāsaneṣu ca sarveṣu kumāro bāḍham' 'evaṃ karomi'iti prativacanaṃ dāpyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:4948: tatra kim?yadvāsaḥkumārasya dhārya sadyaḥkṛttotaṃ paridhāpitaṃ tadācārya ādatte uttarayarcā“yasya te prathamavāsya“mityetayā /
GV06apastgcu:4960: upanayanakāle yatparidhāpitaṃ tadācāryaḥ saptaśakṛtvo 'pānya 'yasya te prathamavāsyam'ityanayaiva svīkaroti,
GV06apastgcu:4966: sa tu 'guro vāsaste dadāmi, iti dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:4970: kecit smṛtyantaropasaṃhāreṇa palāśavṛkṣasamīpe pālāśaṃ karma kurvate samānam /
GV06apastgcu:4971: anyeṣāṃ ca śraddhadhānānāṃ hitārtha pālāśakarmaṇo vidhirucyate-trīṇyahāni pratyahamāmamaikṣamācaret /
GV06apastgcu:4972: caturtha'hanyannasaṃskāreṇa saṃskṛtyācāryeṇa saha prācīmūdīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramya
GV06apastgcu:4973: pūrveṇottareṇa vā palāśavṛkṣaṃ trīṇyudagapavargāṇi sthaṇḍilāni kalpayitvā teṣu yathākramaṃ
GV06apastgcu:4982: tataḥ palāśamūle daṇḍaṃ visṛjya anyadaṇḍamādāya sahācāryo gṛhamāgacchatīti //
GV06apastgcu:4995: yasmādetayorvyākhyānamantareṇa prayogo na śakyate kartu ata eto vyākhyāsyāmaḥ iti //1//
GV06apastgcu:4996: śravaṇāpakṣa oṣadhīṣu jātāsu hastena paurṇamāsyāṃ vādhyāyopākarma //2//
GV06apastgcu:4998: oṣadhīṣu jātāsupravarṣaṇādrūḍhāsuhastena nakṣatreṇa paurṇamāsyāṃ vā śrāvaṇasya kartavyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5001: tathā ca kalpāntaraṃ-śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ proṣṭhapadyāmāṣāḍhyāṃ veti //2//
GV06apastgcu:5003: agnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte 'vārabdheṣu kāṇḍaṛṣibhyo juhoti sadasaspataye sāvitryā ṛgvedāya yajurvedāya sāmavedāyātharvaṇavedāyeti hutvā
GV06apastgcu:5014: kāṇḍaṛṣibhyaḥ prajāpatissomo 'gnirviśvadevā brahmā svayaṃbhū- iti pañca kāṇḍaṛṣayaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5023: eka ācāryā vedāhutīnāmupariṣṭāt sadasaspatiṃ hotavyaṃ manyante //3//
GV06apastgcu:5026: tantraśeṣaṃ samāpya vedasyāditaḥ trīnanuvākānadhīyīran'iṣe tvorjetvā''āpa undantu''uddhanyānaṃ''anumatyai puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ- nirvapati dhenurdakṣiṇā';
GV06apastgcu:5031: yadi vā vedasya prathamottamau anuvākāvadhīyīran 'iṣe tvā''bhṛgurvaivāruṇi'riti //5//
GV06apastgcu:5033: yasminnahannyupākaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tata āraṇyatryahamekāhaṃ vā kṣamyaviramyādhīryīran /
GV06apastgcu:5036: adhīyīranniti vacanaṃ upākṛtyatryahādūrdhva niyamenādhyayanaṃ yathā syāditi //6//
GV06apastgcu:5039: yadi sarvebhyaḥ kāṇḍaṛṣibhyo hutvā vedādau trayāṇāmanuvākānāmārambhaḥ kṛtaḥ prathamottamayorvā tathā sati yathādhyāyamadhyayanaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:5040: yadi tu kāṇḍādīnāṃ sarveṣāmārambhaḥ tathā sati yathākāṇḍamadhyetavyam /
GV06apastgcu:5041: yastu kṛtsnaṃ vedamaraṇye 'nuvākyāni parihāpya prāgutsarjanādadhyetuṃ na śaknoti tasya pṛthakvāmḍopākaraṇam /
GV06apastgcu:5042: tatra tasyaiva kāṇḍasyaika ṛṣiḥ sadasaspatiḥ sāvitrī vedāhutaya upahomāḥ pariṣcanānte tasyaiva kāṇḍasyānuvākaṃ ekāhamanadhyāyaḥ tasyaiva kāṇḍasyādhyayanam
GV06apastgcu:5049: upākaraṇavat samānavidhānādupākaraṇavadgṛhe hutvaiva kṣamyamāṇaṃ karma pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:5052: prācīmudīcīṃ vā sagaṇo diśamupaniṣkramya yatrāpaḥ purastāt sukhāḥ sukhāvagāhā avakinyaḥ
GV06apastgcu:5055: darbhānanyonyasmai sampradāya śucau deśe prākkūlairdarbhairāsanāni kalpayanti //9 //
GV06apastgcu:5056: sagaṇasaśiṣyaḥyatrāpaḥ purastaditi yatra deśe pūrvasyāṃ diśi apaḥpaśyatītyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5059: yāsvavakā bhavanti tāḥavakinyaḥ tathā śaṃkhinyaḥ tāsāmantaṃsamīpaṃ gatvābiṣekān kuṃbhaiḥ
GV06apastgcu:5060: kṛtvā tataḥ surabhimatyādadhikrāvamṇa ityetayābliṅgābhiḥ 'āpohi ṣṭhā mayo bhuva'iti
GV06apastgcu:5061: tisṛbhiḥvāruṇībhiḥ avate heḍa uduttamamimaṃ me varuṇa tatvāyīmītyetābhiḥ
GV06apastgcu:5062: hiraṇyavarṇīyābhiḥ ' hiraṇyavarṇāśśucayaḥ pāvakā' iti catasṛbhiḥ pāvamānībhiḥ pavamānaḥ suvarjana,
GV06apastgcu:5065: tato 'ntarjalagataḥ jalasyāntarnimagno 'ghamarṣaṇena tṛcena 'ṛtaṃ ca satyaṃ ce'tyaghamarṣaṇadṛṣṭenatrīn prāṇāyāmān dhārayati /
GV06apastgcu:5067: apsu nimaḍyaitamanuvākaṃ sakṛjjapati sa ekaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ /

GV06apastgcu:5655: patnīyajamānau jaṅghe dhāvata iti yajñe viśeṣaḥ /

GV06apastgcu:5658: atha pūjyastā apaḥ 'āpaḥ pādāvanejanīḥ'ityetayābhimantrya prathamaṃdakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ brāhmaṇāyaprakṣālayitre prayacchet /
GV06apastgcu:5663: anye tu-kṣatriyavaiśyābhyāṃ aniyamena pūrva pādaṃ prayacchediti //5//
GV06apastgcu:5672: tataḥ prakṣālitapādastaṃ prakṣālayitāraṃ pāṇāvupaspṛśya 'mayi mahaḥ'iti yajuṣā ātmānaṃ hṛdayadeśe pratyabhimṛśet pratilomena pāṇinā spṛśet /
GV06apastgcu:5675: kūrcābhyāṃ parigṛhya mṛnmayenār 'haṇīyā āpa 'iti prāha // ĀpGs_13.7 //
GV06apastgcu:5677: tataḥ pradātā mṛṇmaye pātre upanītā apaḥkūrcābhyāmadhastādupariṣṭācca parigṛhya 'arhaṇīyā āpa'iti prāha nivedayati /
GV06apastgcu:5679: athārhayitā mṛnmaye pātra arhaṇārthāḥ puṣpākṣatasaṃyuktāḥ apa ānīya,
GV06apastgcu:5688: atha pūjyastā apaḥ 'āmāgan'ityetayābhimantrya tāsāmekadeśe stoke svāñjalau dātrāānīyamāne'virājo dohī'si'iti yajurjapet //8//
GV06apastgcu:5691: atha tāsāmapāṃ śeṣaṃ pṛrvasyāṃ diśi nayati pradātā /
GV06apastgcu:5692: tat nīyamānaṃuttarayarcā' samudraṃ va'ityetayābhimantrayate pūjyamānaḥ mānaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5693: etasminkāle vastrayugalaṃ kuṇḍalayugaṃ gāṃ srajaṃ yaccānyadalaṅkaraṇārtha tatsarva dadyāt /
GV06apastgcu:5696: atha tāsāṃ śeṣaṃ dātrā purastāt nīyamānaṃ pūjyaḥ 'samudraṃ vaḥ'ityetayā anumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:5697: kecit-asmin kāle bhojanānte vā pūjyāya vastrakuṇḍalayugādyālaṅkaraṇaṃ dātavyam;
GV06apastgcu:5701: dadhi madhviti saṃsṛjya kāṃsyena varṣīyasā pidhāya kūrcābhyāṃ parigṛhya 'madhuparka 'iti prāha // ĀpGs_13.10 //
GV06apastgcu:5703: varṣīyasā bṛhatā kāṃsyena pātreṇa madhuparka prāha /
GV06apastgcu:5705: tenobhayoḥ pātrayoḥ kāṃmya niyamaḥ siddho bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:5706: itiśabdaḥ prakāre-dadhi madhviti vā payo madhviti veti //10//
GV06apastgcu:5708: tato varṣīyasā bṛhatā kāṃsyena pātreṇa pidhāya /
GV06apastgcu:5716: pūrvokte dve dadhi madhviti vā payo madhviti vā,
GV06apastgcu:5719: tasmin pakṣe pūrvokte dadhimadhunī ghṛtaṃ ca saṃsarjanīyāni //11//
GV06apastgcu:5727: uttarābhyāmabhintrya yajurbhyāmapa ācāmati purastādupariṣṭāccottarayā triḥ prāśyānukampyāya prayacchet // ĀpGs_13.13 //
GV06apastgcu:5735: tataḥ prāśanasya purastādupariṣṭācca yajurbhyāmanantarapaṭhitābhyā“mamṛtopastaraṇamasyamṛtopidhānamasī'tyetābhyāṃ yathākramaṃ apa ācāmati /
GV06apastgcu:5736: tatra prayogaḥ amṛtopastaraṇasītyupastaraṇīyā apa ācamya madhuparka mantreṇa prāśyācamya evaṃ dvistūṣṇīṃ prāśyāpidhānīyā apa ācāmati /
GV06apastgcu:5738: śeṣaṃ madhuparkaprāśanaśeṣaṃanukampyāyaanugrāhyāya putrāya bhrātre vā samāvṛttāyaiva prayacchet /
GV06apastgcu:5740: somabhakṣaṇe madhuparkaprāśane bhojane ca madhye nocchiṣṭateti śiṣṭāḥ smaranti //13//
GV06apastgcu:5741: atha pūjyastaṃ madhuparka pratigṛhyāpidhānapātramapanīya 'trayyai vidyāyai''āmāgan yaśaśā'iti dvābhyāmabhimnatrya /
GV06apastgcu:5748: atācamya śeṣamanukampyāya anugrāhyāya putrāśiṣyādaye samāvṛttāyaiva prāśituṃprayacchet;
GV06apastgcu:5767: somapāne punaḥ 'na somenocchiṣṭā bhavanti'iti vacanādante 'pi naivācamanam /
