GV06apastgcu:5775: antaraṅgatvena upastaraṇādya- pidhānāntaṃ bhojanavadekaṃ karmeti madhye suddhyarthamācamanaṃ na yuktamiti /
GV06apastgcu:5779: 11 madhuparkapratigrahītā rājā sthapatirvā cet tena tasya purohitāya dānam /
GV06apastgcu:5797: -“tadyathaivādo manuṣyarāja āgate 'nyasmin vār'hati ukṣāṇaṃ vehataṃ vā kṣadante“iti /
GV06apastgcu:5798: (ai.brā.1-3-4) evamarthamevātra gāmityuktaṃ gojātimātrasya nvedanaṃ yathā syāt . anyathā gauriti prahetyetāvatā siddhaṃ yathā pādyadiṣu //15//
GV06apastgcu:5807: uttarayābhimantrya tasyai vapāṃ śrapayitvopastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayā juhoti // ĀpGs_13.16 //
GV06apastgcu:5815: tatrāmuṣyetyasya sthāne pradāturnāmanirdeśaḥ mama ca yajñaśarmaṇaśceti //16//
GV06apastgcu:5816: tataḥ pradātā tenāsambhane 'nujñāte laukikyā'vṛtā tasyā gorālambhaṃ kṛtvā vapāmutkhidya vapāśrapaṇībhyāṃ parigṛhya aupāsane pacane vā
GV06apastgcu:5817: śrapayitvā tāmupastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayarcā ' gniḥ prāśnātvi'tyetayā tasminnevāgnau juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:5819: hutvā tato māṃsaṃ saṃskṛtyānnena saha tasmā upaharanti /
GV06apastgcu:5821: palāśaparṇenetyeva siddhe madhyamenāntamenetivacanaṃ dviparṇasya palāśavṛntasya parṇena homo mā bhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:5822: abhāvavikalpārtha vā pūrva madhyamena tadabhāve antameneti //17//
GV06apastgcu:5825: amuṣyetyasya sthāne cārhayiturnāma viṣṇuśarmaṇa iti gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:5828: abhimantryeti ca ktavāpratyayaḥ kriyāvidhāna mātrārtha eva,
GV06apastgcu:5833: madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇena laukikenājyenopastīrya kṛtsnāṃ vapāṃ sakṛdevāvadāyābhighārya 'agniḥ prāśanātu'ityetayā tena parṇena svāgenau juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:5834: tatra ca madhyamenāntamena veti vacanaṃ dviparṇapratiṣedhārthamabhāvavikalpārtha vā /
GV06apastgcu:5836: ayaṃ ca saṃjñapanapakṣaḥ kaliyugānācāreṣu paṭhitatvādidānīṃ tyājya eva //16//
GV06apastgcu:5840: atha yadi gāmutsṛjatyayaṃ pūjyamānaḥ sa gauriti prokte mantrān uttarāṃścaturo 'yajñe vardhatā'mityupāṃśu japati /
GV06apastgcu:5846: japatvādeva siddhe upāṃśuvacanaṃ niyamārtham-uttare catvāra eva mantrāḥ
GV06apastgcu:5852: tena brahmaṇaḥ evaiṣa vikalpaḥ siddho bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:5856: tadottarān trīn mantrān 'yajño vardhatām'ityādikānupāṃśu japitvā ' omutsṛjata' ityuccaiḥprabrūyāditi śeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5860: annaṃ proktamupāṃśūttarairabhimantrya oṃ kalpayate tyuccaiḥ // ĀpGs_13.18 //
GV06apastgcu:5867: tadannaṃ peroktamuttaraiḥ pañcabhirmantrairbhūtamityādibhiḥ bhoktopāṃśvabhimantrya oṃkalpayatetyuccaiḥ prasauti /
GV06apastgcu:5868: prasūtāḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ pariveṣanti caturo nānāgotrān brāhmaṇān bhojayateti brūyettoṣu bhuktavātsvannamasmā upāharantīti (bau.gṛ.1-2)
GV06apastgcu:5870: atha dātā siddhamannaṃ 'bhūtaṃ'iti mantreṇa pūjyāya prabrūyānnivedet /
GV06apastgcu:5871: kuta etat ?'sijjhe 'nne tiṣṭhan bhūtamiti svāmine prabrūyāt'; (āpa.dha.2-3-10)
GV06apastgcu:5873: madhuparkaprakaraṇa eva 'siddhenne tiṣṭhan bhūtamiti prāha'iti kalpāntarācca /
GV06apastgcu:5881: ācāryāyartvije śvaśurāya rājña iti parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhya etatkāryam // ĀpGs_13.19 //
GV06apastgcu:5884: tebhyaścaturbhyaḥ parisaṃvatsaraṃ vipreṣyopatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ gṛhamātiśyenāgatebhyaḥ etadapacitkarma kūrcādi bhojanāntaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:5892: tena vivāhāda- nantaraṃ ācāryaśvaśurābhyāṃ nimantryāpacitiḥ kartavyā /
GV06apastgcu:5895: atha tebhya eva saṃvatsaraṃ vipro ṣyopagatebhyaśca kartavyamiti //20//
GV06apastgcu:5896: yadetadarhaṇaṃ kūrcādi bhojanāntaṃ gṛhasthena snātakāya snānadivasa evāgatāya kartavyamiti vihitaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:5903: ācāryāyartvije śvaśurāya rājña iti parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhyo gaurmadhupa4kaśca /
GV06apastgcu:5906: iti snātakāyācāryāyartvije upādhyāyāya śvaśurāya rājñe ca dakṣiṇārthagavā saha madhuparko vihitaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5908: utyate- iha vikalpena vihitasya trivṛtaḥ pāṅktasya ca tasmin gomadhuparke avedādhyāyāya śvaśurāya ca dīyamāne ca prāptyartham /
GV06apastgcu:5910: tadācāryartvidādhyāyaśvaśurarājabhya eva parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ kāryam,
GV06apastgcu:5914: sakṛt na prativatasaraṃ kalau gorālambhsya nṣedhādraurityuttkā yajño vardhatāmityādi japet madhyamantralopaḥ)
GV06apastgcu:5915: pravaktre vedasya vedārthasya ca citrāya prasiddhāya bhinnasaṃśayāyetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5918: pravaktā yaḥ padavākyapramāṇābhyāṃ prakarṣeṇa vakti sādhuśabdānāmuccārayitā,
GV06apastgcu:5920: citraḥ prakāśaḥ loke prasiddha ityarthaḥ . idaṃ pravaktureva viśeṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:5929: tena gṛhye yājñikaprasiddhyā madhuparkasaṃśike karmaṇi upadiṣṭā eva dharmāḥ 'gomadhiparkarahaḥ'ityatra madhuparkanāmnā atidiśyante,
GV06apastgcu:5935: 'dadhimadhusaṃsṛṣṭaṃ madhuparkaḥ'iti pratyakṣavidhānādatideśaprāptaṃ trivṛttvaṃ pāṅktatvaṃ ca bādhyata(āpa.śrau.2-8-8) iti /
GV06apastgcu:5936: ayamatra niścitor'thaḥ ācāryāyartvije vedādhyāyāya śvaśurāya rājñe ca dakṣiṇārthādhikagavā vinā gārhyaḥ sāmayācāriko vā madhiparkaḥ kāryaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5940: avedādhyāyābhyāṃ tu varāpacitābhyāṃ snātakāya ca snānadina evāgatāya gavā vinā gṛhyokto dharmokto vā /
GV06apastgcu:5941: prakāśāya ca pravaktre vinā gavā gārhyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5947: anyathā saṃvatsaramapi proṣitābhyāṃ sakṛdapi na sidhyet /
GV06apastgcu:5948: ṛtvije ca karmaṇi karmaṇi pūjā kāryā /
GV06apastgcu:5962: tathā vedasya vedārthasya ca pravaktre ctrāya etatsakṛtkāryamiti /
GV06apastgcu:5972: sīmantonnayanaṃ prathame garbhe caturthe māsi // ĀpGs_14.1 //
GV06apastgcu:5975: sa unnīyate yasmin karmaṇi tatsāmantonnayanannāyakarma garbhasaṃskāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:5978: ādhāre ca saṃskṛte tatrāhitāḥ sarva eva garbhāḥ saṃskṛtā bhavanti //1//
GV06apastgcu:5980: yasmin karmaṇi garbhiṇyāssīmanta unnīyate tat vyākhyāsyāma iti śeṣa- /
GV06apastgcu:5990: brāhmaṇānbhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvāgnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte 'nvārabdhāyāmuttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate // ĀpGs_14.2 //
GV06apastgcu:5993: atha tasminnahanibrāhmaṇān bhojayitvātairbhuktavadbhiḥāśiṣo vācayitvāagnerupasamādhānādi pratipadyate sakṛtpātrāṇi śalalyādayaśca saha śamyaḥ
GV06apastgcu:5994: aṣṭau pradhānāhutayo 'dhātā dadātu no rayi'miti catasro 'yastvāhṛdā kīriṇe'ti catasraḥ //3//
GV06apastgcu:5998: uttarāḥ 'dhātā dadātu no rayim'iti catasro 'yastvā hṛdā kīriṇā'iti catasra ityaṣṭau /
GV06apastgcu:6001: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvāpareṇāgniṃ prācīmupaveśya treṇyā śalalyā tribhirdarbhapuñjīlaiśśalāluglapsenetyūrdhva sīmantamunnayati vyāhṛtībhiruttarābhyāṃ ca // ĀpGs_14.3 //
GV06apastgcu:6012: etāni dravyāṇi yugapadgṛhītvātaissīmantamunnayati ūrdhvamudūhati bhūrbhuvassuvaritye- tābhiḥ
GV06apastgcu:6016: iha mantrasamāmnāye vyāhṛtīnāṃ pāṭho na kartavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6021: kiñcāsati pāṭhe vyāhṛtibhiruttarābhyāñcetyucyamāne yājamānasamāmnāyāt grahaṇaṃ prāpnoti-vyāhṛtibhiruttarābhyāñca mantrābhyāṃ 'ucchuṣmo agna';
GV06apastgcu:6026: tasmādasmādeva samāmnāyadgrahaṇaṃ yathā syāditi vyāhṛtīnāmiha pāṭhaḥ //4//
GV06apastgcu:6058: sāsālvānāṃsīmantakarmaṇi gāthā sālvadeśanivāsināṃ asyāmṛci gānaṃ kartavyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6071: kṣatriyavaiśyānāṃ tu 'somomaeva no rājāvatu mānuṣīḥ prajāḥ (āśva.gṛ.1-12-7)
GV06apastgcu:6072: ityāśvalāyanīye dṛṣṭāyāṃ sārvavarṇīkyā- mṛci gānaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:6079: dvitīye mantre asau śabdasya sthāne nadyā nāma saṃbudhyā nirdeṣṭavyam /
GV06apastgcu:6082: kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ kalpāntaradṛṣṭāyāṃ sārvavarṇikyāmṛci gānaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6086: 'soma eva no rājā'ityasvāṃ asāvityasya sthāne 'kāveri''vegavati'iti sambudhyānadīnirdesaścabhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6097: yavāśca prāgeva vaptavyāḥ yathāsmin kāle virūḍhā bhavanti //9//
GV06apastgcu:6102: uduteṣu nakṣatreṣu prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramya vatsamanvārabhya vyāhṛtīśca japitvā vācaṃ visṛjet // ĀpGs_14.8 //
GV06apastgcu:6121: yadāpi caturthe tadā sīmantāt pūrvameva puṃsavanam /
GV06apastgcu:6127: yena karmaṇā nimittena garbhiṇi pumāṃsameva sūte tatpuṃsavanam /
GV06apastgcu:6133: bahucādiṣu smṛtyantareṣūbhayathā darśanāt . yadi puṃsavanaṃ caturthe syāttadā pūrva sīmantaṃ kṛtvaiva /
GV06apastgcu:6141: tiṣyeṇa tiṣyanakṣatre puṃsavanaṃ kartavyayamiti vyavāhitena sambandhaḥ;
GV06apastgcu:6146: nyagrodhasya yā prācyudīcīṃ vā śākhā tatassavṛṣaṇāṃ śuṅgāmāhṛtya sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādi // ĀpGs_14.10 //
GV06apastgcu:6148: nyagrodhasyavṛkṣasyayā prācī śākhodīcī vā tasyāḥśuṅgāmagrāṅkuraṃ savṛṣaṇāṃphalaṃ vṛṣaṇamiti vyapadiśyate sādṛśyādeva /
GV06apastgcu:6149: tadvatīṃ śuṅgāmāhṛtya sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādi pariṣecanāntaṃ karma pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:6150: agnerupasamādhānādivacanāt tataḥ pūrva brāhmaṇabhojanamāśīrvacanaṃ ca na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6152: tathā yat pariṣecanādīrdhva saṃśāsanādi tadapi na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6156: śuṅgayā saha paridhaya eva, na śamyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6157: ājyabhāgānte 'nvārabdhāyāṃ dhātā dadātu no rayi'miti catasro yastvā hṛdā kīriṇeti catasraḥ jayādi pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:6162: atra ca sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādītyatideśāt brāhmaṇabhojanamāśīrvacanaṃ ca tantrāt purastānnivartate /
GV06apastgcu:6166: 'loke ca bhūtikarmasvetadādīnyeva vākyāni syuryathāpuṇyāhaṃ svastiṛdvimiti vācayitvā (āpa.dha.1-13-9)
GV06apastgcu:6168: pātraprayege ca śuṅgādīnāṃ karmopayuktānāṃ sakṛdeva sādanam /
GV06apastgcu:6170: na tu śamyāḥ 'śamyāḥ paridhyarthe'iti atra caulagodānagrahaṇāt /
GV06apastgcu:6171: tathaiva 'sīmantavadagnerupasamādhānādi'ityādinā pariṣecanāntakalpātideśasya vivakṣitatvādihāpi ta evāṣṭau pradhānahomāḥ //10//
GV06apastgcu:6173: 3 tānaṅkurānanṛtumatyā kumāryā peṣayitvottānaṃ śāyitāyā garbhiṇyā dakṣiṇanāsāyāṃ niṣecanam /
GV06apastgcu:6174: anavasnātayā kumāryā dṛṣatputre dṛṣatputreṇa peṣayitvā pariplāvyāperaṇāgniṃ prācīmuttānāṃ nipātyottareṇa yajuṣāṅguṣṭhena dakṣiṇe nāsikācchidre 'pinayati // ĀpGs_14.11 //
GV06apastgcu:6182: tatra śuṅgāṃ peṣayitvā vastreṇa pariplāvya apareṇāgniṃ prācīṃ prāṅmukhīṃuttānāṃ ūrdhvamukhīṃ,
GV06apastgcu:6183: nipātya śāyayitvāuttareṇa yajuṣā'puṃsuvanamasī'tyanena taṃ rasaṃ aṅguṣṭhena tasyā nāsikācchidre dakṣiṇe apinayatiapigamayati /
GV06apastgcu:6186: snānanimittasya rajaso 'nutpannatvāt yā na snātā tayāanavasnātayākanyayā dṛṣadarthāpanne
GV06apastgcu:6190: 'puṃsuvanamasi'iti yajuṣā dakṣiṇa nāsikāchidre aṅguṣṭhenakaraṇabhūtena tadrasamapinayati garbha prāpayati /
GV06apastgcu:6205: vacanāt putrasya sakṛdutpādanaṃ nityamiti yāvadekaḥ putra utpadyeta tāvadūgarbheṣu bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6206: ūrdhva tu putrecchāyāṃ satyāṃ bhavati duhiturīpsāyāṃ na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6209: puṃsuvanasya tu paścādupadeśo yathā caturthe māsi tatkriyate tasya paścāt prayogārtha iti //14//
GV06apastgcu:6214: phalamakṣe 'pi 'eṣa vā anṛṇo yaḥ putrī'ityādiva canaissakṛdapi putrotpādanasya avaśyaka- rtavyatvāt tadaṅgaṃ puṃsuvanaṃ prathame garbhe kartavyameva
GV06apastgcu:6215: tata ūrdhva tu yatra yatra garbhe putrepsā tatra tatra kartavyaṃ nānyatra /
GV06apastgcu:6216: yastvatikrānta- codanaḥ strīreva janayeyamiti kāmayate tasya sakṛdapi na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6217: anye tu-pumāṃsaṃ janayatītyetadvacanaṃ garbhe garbhe 'sya kartavyatāparamiti //12//
GV06apastgcu:6221: yena karmaṇā kṣipraṃ sūyate tatkṣipraṃsuvanaṃnāma karmocyate //15//
GV06apastgcu:6222: yenakṣipraṃśīghraṃ sūte 'ntarvatnī na ciraṃ kālaṃ pīḍyate tatkṣipraṃsuvanaṃnāma iti karmopadiśyate //13//
GV06apastgcu:6226: pattaḥpādayoradhastāt yasyāḥ śvetopamāni patrāṇi pītopa- māni puṣpāṇi yā ca madhyāṅṇe puṣyati sā tīryantī vaneṣu jāyate /
GV06apastgcu:6227: veṇupatropamāni ca yasyāḥ patrīṇi raktopamāni ca puṣpāṇi yāṃ cāgniśikhetyāhuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6228: sā śoṣyantī tat oṣadhidvayaṃ samūlapatramādāya suṣliṣṭaṃ nidadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:6232: daśabhiriti liṅgādubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāmabhimarśanam anulomaṃ mukhādārabhya tata etābhirāhṛtābhirevādbhistāmavokṣet /
GV06apastgcu:6233: uttarābhistisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ'yathaiva somaḥ pavata'ityetābhiḥ pratimantra mavokṣaṇam //16//
GV06apastgcu:6238: śoṣyantīṃprasavapīḍayā śuṣyamāṇāṃ striyaṃ 'ābhiṣṭvāhaṃ daśabhirabhibhūmṛśāmi'iti yajuṣobhābhyāṃ hastābhyām /
GV06apastgcu:6248: tāṃ mūrdhniṃ nidhāya striyaṃ yatra kvacābhimṛśediti /
GV06apastgcu:6271: kṣipraṃsuvane yo vidhiścoditaḥ 'anāprītena śarāveṇe'tyādi (evaṃ vihitābhiradbhiḥ uttarābhyāṃmantrābhyāṃ“tisadeva padyasva,
GV06apastgcu:6276: yadi prasūtāyāstasyājarāyugarbhaprāvaraṇaṃna patettadā'anāprītena śarāveṇa'ityādividhinā'hṛtābhiradbhiḥ aitu garbhau akṣitaḥ'
GV06apastgcu:6282: iti śrīsudarśanācāryaviracite gṛhyatātparyadarśane caturdaśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:6288: jātaṃ vātsapreṇābhimṛśyottareṇa yajuṣopastha ādhāyottarābhyamābhimantraṇaṃ mūrdhanyavaghrāṇaṃ dakṣiṇe karṇe jāpaḥ // ĀpGs_15.1 //
GV06apastgcu:6290: jātamiti pulliṅgasya vivakṣitatvāt puṃsa evāyaṃ jātakarmākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6297: uttaratra māturiti viśeṣaṇādiha sva upastha ādadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:6298: uttarābhiriti pāṭhaḥ uttarābhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ ṛgbhiḥ abhimantraṇādīni trīṇi kartavyāni /
GV06apastgcu:6303: kecittu uttarābhyāmiti dvivacanāntapāṭhamāśritya dvayormantrayoḥ triṣvapi karmasu viniyogaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:6305: āśvalāyanaścāha-karṇayorupanidhāya medhājananaṃ japati medhāṃ te devassaviteti (āśva.śrau.1-13-2) //1//
GV06apastgcu:6311: ityanuvākena ante sakṛdabhimṛśya 'asminnaham'ityanena yajuṣā svasyopasthe tamādhāya,
GV06apastgcu:6314: etayorevarcoḥ dakṣiṇe karṇe jāpo japa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6324: ata evāśvalāyanaḥ -“karṇayorupanidhāya me dhājananaṃ japati'medhāṃ te devassavitā'iti” /
GV06apastgcu:6336: asyārthaḥ-rohiṇī revatī maghā mṛgaśīrṣā jyeṣṭhā titrā-ityeteṣu ādyakṣaranirdiṣṭeṣu ādau vṛddhirbavati,
GV06apastgcu:6339: rūpaṃ ca rauhiṇaḥ raivataḥ māghaḥ mārgaśīrṣaḥ jyaiṣṭhaḥ caitraḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:6340: ṣṭhātpe ca, proṣṭhapadetyatra ṣṭhakārātpare pakāre ca vṛddhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6346: śravaḥ śravaṇaṃ śa-śatabhiṣak aśvayuk ityeteṣu caturṣu vā vikalpena vṛddhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6347: atra ca śravaṇāpabharaṇyoḥ bahulagrahaṇādeva luko vikalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6354: śeṣeṣu na uktādanyeṣu nakṣatreṣu na vṛddhiḥ yato 'tra 'śraviṣṭhāphalgunyanūrādhāsvātitiṣyapunarvasuhasta viśākhāṣāḍhābahulālluk'; (pā.sū.4-3-34)
GV06apastgcu:6355: ityanena, nakṣatrebhyo bahulam'ityanena ca lugva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6356: iti strīpratyayanivṛttiḥ kṛttikaḥ tiṣyaḥ āśreṣaḥ phālgunaḥ hastaḥ viśākhaḥ anūrādhaḥ āṣāḍhaḥ śraviṣṭhaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6367: evaṃ sarveṣāṃ nakṣatranāmnāṃ prathamayā nirdeśaḥ sūktavāke /
GV06apastgcu:6372: yathā pare na jānanti tathā vaktavyamityarthaḥ sūktavākādiṣvapyevameva //3//
GV06apastgcu:6373: nakṣatranāma ca rahasyaṃ nirdiśatīti sūtre praṇetavye sūtrāntarakaraṇāt yat nāmanakṣatranibandhanaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:6374: yacca daśamyāṃ kṛtaṃ tadubhayaṃ jātakarma sūktavākānnaprāśanābhivādanādiṣu nityaṃ rahasyameva nirdeśyaṃ bhavati //3//
GV06apastgcu:6377: madhu, ghṛtamiti saṃsṛjya tasmin darbheṇa hiraṇyaṃ niṣṭarkya badhvāvadāyottarairmantraiḥ
GV06apastgcu:6378: kumāraṃ prāśayitvottarābhiḥ pañcabhissnāpayitvā dadhi ghṛtamiti saṃsṛjya kāṃsyena
GV06apastgcu:6379: pṛṣadājyaṃ vyāhṛtībhiroṅgāracaturthābhiḥ kumāraṃ prāśayitvādbhiśśeṣaṃ saṃsṛjya goṣṭhe
GV06apastgcu:6382: madhughṛtamityetadvayaṃ viṣamaparimāṇaṃ kāsyapātre saṃsṛjya tasmin hiraṇyaṃ darbheṇa,
GV06apastgcu:6385: tathā baddhena hiraṇyena tadrasadvayamādāya tenaiva kumāraṃ prāśayet /
GV06apastgcu:6388: tato 'nyasmin kāṃsyapātre dadhi ghṛtañca saṃsṛḍya tatpṛṣadāḍyaṃ tenaiva kāṃsyena prāśayati /
GV06apastgcu:6391: kumāragrahaṇaṃ asamarthasyāpi kumārasyaiva prāśanamupāyena yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:6392: tena yatnābhāve“dhānāḥ kumārān prāśayanti““kṣaitrapattyaṃ ca prāśayanti“ityādau prāśanamasamarthānāṃ na bhavati //4//
GV06apastgcu:6393: niṣṭakarya śikhābandhanavat sarandhreṇa granthinā niṣṭarkya badhnāti;
GV06apastgcu:6403: tacca yasmin kāṃsye saṃsṛjyate tenaiva prāśayenna hastena /
GV06apastgcu:6411: uttarayā māturupastha ādhāyottarayā dakṣiṇaṃ stanaṃ pratidhāpyottarābhyāṃ pṛthivīmabhimṛśyottareṇa yajuṣā saṃviṣṭam // ĀpGs_15.5 //
GV06apastgcu:6416: tatauttarayarcā'ayaṃ kumāra'ityetayādakṣiṇaṃ stanaṃ pratidhāpya tata uttarābhyāṃ ṛgbhyāṃ'yadbhūmerhṛdaya'mityetābhyāṃ pratimantraṃ pṛthivīmabhimṛśati
GV06apastgcu:6417: tataḥ taṃ kumāraṃ abhimṛṣāṭāyāṃ bhūmau saṃveśayati mātā /
GV06apastgcu:6420: iha ca mātṛgrahaṇāditaḥ pūrva svopastha eva /
GV06apastgcu:6426: 'vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāte yadaṣṭakapālo bhavati gāyatriyaivainaṃ brahmavarcasena punāti'(tai.saṃ.2-2-5)
GV06apastgcu:6427: ityādinā yadyapi putrajanmākhyānimittasaṃyogena śrutā tathāpi kṣāmavatyādivanna nimittādanantaraṃ kartavyā /
GV06apastgcu:6429: jāteṣṭhipravṛtteścotkaṭajīvatputragatapūtatādiphalarāgādhīnatvāt dīrghakālasamāpyāyāṃ ceṣṭau kṛtāyāṃ paścādvaidhastanamāne sati kumāra eva śeṣī śiṣkaṇṭhatayā na jīvet /
GV06apastgcu:6432: iṣṭistūktena nyāyena nimittasvārasyabhaṅgasya durnivāratvāt codakānugrahāccāśauce 'pagate parvaṇyeva kartavyā /
GV06apastgcu:6436: uttareṇa yajuṣā śirasta udkumbhaṃ nidhāya sarṣapān phalīkaraṇamiśrānañjalinottaraistristriḥ
GV06apastgcu:6437: pratisvāhākāraṃ hutvā saṃśāsti -praviṣṭe praviṣṭa eva tūṣṇīmagnāvāvapateti // ĀpGs_15.6 //
GV06apastgcu:6439: tatastasya śirassamīpe uttareṇa yajuṣā'āpassupteṣvi'tyanena udakumbhaṃ nidadhāti /
GV06apastgcu:6453: etaduktaṃ bhavati-asya sūtikāgārasya yadā yadā praveśo yuṣmābhiḥ kriyate tadā tadā sarṣapān phalīkaraṇa-
GV06apastgcu:6454: miśranasminnagnāvevaṃ tūṣṇīmāvapata yathā mayoptāḥ añjalinā triltriśceti /
GV06apastgcu:6461: tena yadyapi'yasyai vijātāyāṃ mana'iti māturapi rakṣā pratīyate tathāpi
GV06apastgcu:6463: tataśca strīprasave daśāhamadhye putramṛtau ca na bhavati // 6 //
GV06apastgcu:6464: uttareṇa 'āpassupteṣu'ityanenayajuṣā kumārasya śirassamīpe udakasya pūrṇakumbhaṃ nidhāya atha 'yatra kva tāgnim'; (āya.dha.2-1-23)
GV06apastgcu:6465: ityādividhinā śrotriyāgārādagnimāhṛtya tamupanidhāyaphalīkaraṇamiśrān sarṣapān uttaraiḥ'ayaṃ kalim'ityādibhiraṣṭabhirmantraiḥ añjalinā pratimantraṃtrisrirjuhoti
GV06apastgcu:6470: sampraiṣasya cāyaṃ vivakṣitor'thaḥ-- pratipraveśaṃ tadanantarameva sarṣapān phalīkaraṇamiśrān añjalinā asminnevāgnau tūṣṇīṃ vāgyatā eva āvapateti
GV06apastgcu:6471: eva kārācca praveśāvāpayormadhye truṭimātrasyāpi kālasya na kṣepaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6478: vijananaprabhṛti yāvat daśāhāni na nirgacchanti tāvadeva homaḥ kartavyaḥ saṃśānañcetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6480: yadyapi saṃśāsanamanantaraṃ tathāpi tāvanmātrasyāyamatideśo na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6491: daśamyāmutthitāyāṃ snātāyāṃ putrasya nāma dadhāti pitā māteti // ĀpGs_15.8 //
GV06apastgcu:6495: yaccanyat striyo viduḥ tacca sarvavarmānāṃ daśame 'hani bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6498: tatra paribhāṣāvaśādahanyeva karma snānaṃ ca sati sambhave tasminnevāhani niyamena bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6499: prakāraṇādeva siddhe putrasyeti vacanaṃ vakṣyamāṇo 'nāmno lakṣaṇaviśeṣaḥ'tasyaiva yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:6503: pitā māteti tā ca dadaturyadagre“(tai.saṃ.1-5-10) iti /
GV06apastgcu:6505: diti brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā pitāmātā ca nāmāgre 'bhivyāhṛtyāśīrvacanaṃ brāhmaṇairabhivyāhārayetām /
GV06apastgcu:6510: evaṃ vadatā daśame 'hani niṣkramya snātavyamityuktaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6517: imamartha mantravarṇe 'pyāha“mama nāma prathamaṃ jātavedaḥ pitā mātā ca dadhaturyadagre” (tai.saṃ.1-5-100 iti //8//
GV06apastgcu:6519: dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃ vā nāmapūrvamākhyātottaraṃ dīrghābhiniṣṭhānāntaṃ ghoṣavadādyantarantastham // ĀpGs_15.9 //
GV06apastgcu:6524: taduttarapadaṃ yatra tatākhyātottaraṃ dīrghātparo 'bhiniṣṭhāno visarjanīyo 'nte yasya
GV06apastgcu:6526: antasthā yasya tatantarantasthamvargāṇāṃ tṛtīyacaturthau ikāraśca ghoṣavantaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6533: “ṛṣyaṇūkaṃ devātāṇūkaṃ vā yathā vaiṣāṃ pūrvapuruṣāṇāṃ nāmāni syu“riti (bau.gṛ.2 -2-28,29)
GV06apastgcu:6538: atha vyavasthāpanīyasya nāmno lakṣaṇamucyate-dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃveti samāse 'bhipretaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:6542: kutaḥ punarvākyasamāsayorartavatsamudāyatvāviśeṣe'pi samāsa eva dravyavācako na vākyam?
GV06apastgcu:6548: nanu-'supsupā'iti samāsaniyamāt ākhyātena tiṅantena naiva samāsaḥ?
GV06apastgcu:6549: satyam;ata evātra ākhyātaśabdena ākhyāta sadṛśaṃ kvibantaṃ subantameva vivakṣitam /
GV06apastgcu:6567: api vā yasmin svityupasargassyāt taddhi pratiṣṭhitamiti hi brāhmaṇam // ĀpGs_15.10 //
GV06apastgcu:6569: api vā ayamapi pakṣaḥyasminnāmni 'su'ityayamupasargaḥ syāt devatatra lakṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:6575: tathāca pūrvāsminneva lakṣaṇe sthitvā bharadvāja āha-dvyakṣaraṃ caturakṣaraṃ vā ghoṣavadādyantarantasthaṃ dīrghābhiniṣṭhānāntaṃ taddhi prasiddhamiti vijñāyate iti /
GV06apastgcu:6579: upasarga iti vacanātsomasudityādi pratiṣṭhitaṃ na bhavati //10//
GV06apastgcu:6582: iha brāhmaṇagrahaṇāt dvyakṣarādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ sviti viśeṣaṇaṃ vikalpyate /
GV06apastgcu:6586: atra bodhāyano vikalpāntarāṇyāha-'ṛṣyaṇūkaṃ devatāṇūkaṃ vā yathā vaiṣāṃ pūrvapuruṣāṇāṃ nāmāni syuḥ'iti /
GV06apastgcu:6596: yā skhyā arthavimituṃ na śakyate sā ayuk saṃkhyā /
GV06apastgcu:6597: ayuñji akṣarāṇi yatra tat ayujākṣaram-ekākṣaraṃ tryakṣaramityādi /
GV06apastgcu:6610: kumāryā api jātakādayaścaulāntāḥ dehaṃsaskārārthāḥ kriyāstūṣṇīṃ kartavyā eva /
GV06apastgcu:6614: iha ca dravyaniṣṭhā bhāvārthāḥ prāśanavapanādaya eva niṣkṛṣya kartavyāḥ,
GV06apastgcu:6618: pravāsādetya putrasyottarābhyāmabhimantraṇaṃ mūrdhanyavaghrāṇaṃ dakṣiṇe karṇa uttarān mantrān japet // ĀpGs_15.12 //
GV06apastgcu:6624: mantraliṅgāt kumāryā abhimantraṇāntaropadeśācca siddhe putragrahaṇaṃ mūrdhanyavaghrāṇaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ karṇe jāpaśca kumāryā mā bhūt /
GV06apastgcu:6625: anyathā liṅgavirodhābhāvāt ubhayaṃ kumāryā api syāt /
GV06apastgcu:6627: kumārīmuttareṇetyayaṃ ca abhimantraṇasyaiva pratyāmnāyaḥ syāt, netarayoḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6628: uttare mantrāḥ 'agnirāyuṣmāniti pañce'tyādiṣṭāḥ tān putrasyadakṣiṇe karṇe japet /
GV06apastgcu:6629: mantragrahaṇaṃ kriyate 'agnirāyuṣmāniti pañce'tyasya pañcaśabdasya mantreṣu vṛttiriti prajñāpanārtham //12//
GV06apastgcu:6632: asāvityasya sthāne daśamyāṃ kṛtaṃ nāma sambuddhyā gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:6637: tataḥ putrasyadakṣiṇe karṇe uttarān'agnirāyuṣmān sa vanaspatibhiḥ'ityādikān sānuṣaṅgān pañcamantrān japet /
GV06apastgcu:6643: duhitaramiti kartavye kumārīmiti vacanaṃ pradānādūrdhva mābhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:6644: putrasya tu yāvajjīvaṃ bhavati putre 'pi proṣitāgate abhimantraṇāditrayaṃ bhavati nyāyasya tulyasya tulyatvāt //13//
GV06apastgcu:6654: janmano 'dhi ṣaṣṭhe māsi brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā dadhi madhu ghṛtamodanamiti saṃsṛjyottarairmantraiḥ kumāraṃ prāśayet // ĀpGs_16.1
GV06apastgcu:6659: tatkariṣyan brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā yugmān tairāśiṣo vācayati-puṇyāhaṃ svasti ṛddhimiti /
GV06apastgcu:6662: yatrāpagedyuḥ devejyā tatra pūrvedyuḥ pitṛbhyaḥ kriyate /
GV06apastgcu:6666: vācayitvā'śiṣaḥ dadhyādi catuṣṭayaṃ saṃsṛjya tena kumāraṃ prāśayet /
GV06apastgcu:6673: kumāraṃ iti canāt kumāryā vidhivadannaprāśanaṃ na bhavati-āvṛtaiva kumāryā (āśva.gṛ.1-14-7)
GV06apastgcu:6677: tena mārgaśīrṣa śukle dvitīyāyāṃ jātasya na mārgaśīrṣo māsaḥ pūrṇo gaṇyate /
GV06apastgcu:6682: āśīrvacanānantaraṃ dadhyādicatuṣṭayaṃ saṃsṛjyauttarairmantraiḥ ' bhūrapāṃtvauṣadhīnāṃ'ityādibhiścaturbhiḥ kumāraṃ sakṛdeva prāśayot /
GV06apastgcu:6691: anye tu māṃsameva mantravat prāśyaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:6696: janmano 'dhi tṛtīye varṣe caulaṃ punarvasvoḥ // ĀpGs_16.3 //
GV06apastgcu:6698: atha causavidhiḥ -yasmin karmaṇi keśāḥ prathamaṃ khaṇḍyate tat caulaṃ /
GV06apastgcu:6701: janmanaḥ prabhṛti tṛtīye varṣe punarvasevornakṣatre kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:6702: kumāraṃ prāśayediti vihitatvāt puṃsa evedaṃ vidhivaccaulam /
GV06apastgcu:6705: janmagrahaṇaṃ garbhādārabhya tṛtīye varṣe mā bhūditi //3//
GV06apastgcu:6716: brāhmaṇabhojanādīti brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā kumāraṃ bhojayitvetyetāvadiha draṣṭavyam /
GV06apastgcu:6737: keśān vinīya yatharṣi śikhā nidadhāti // ĀpGs_16.6 //
GV06apastgcu:6742: yathārṣiyāvanta ṛṣayo yasya pravare tāvatīśśikhāḥ karoti-tryārṣeyasya tisnaḥ pañcārṣeyasya pañceti //6//
GV06apastgcu:6751: athavāyathāyena prakāreṇaeṣāṃkumārasya kulajānāṃkuladharmaḥpravartate tathā śikhāṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:6752: eṣāṃ iti vacanaṃ kartuḥ kuladharmo mā bhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:6753: tenāsmin karmaṇi pitaiva karteti niyamo nāsti /
GV06apastgcu:6754: anyatra tu sati sambhave kumārakarmasu tasyaiva niyamaḥ //7//
GV06apastgcu:6755: athavā-yathā yena prakāreṇa eṣāṃ kulajānāṃ kuladharmaḥ pravartate,
GV06apastgcu:6773: tena kṣureṇa triṣvahorātreṣu nāpitakarma na kartavyam //10//
GV06apastgcu:6777: asminkarmaṇi samāpte kumārasya pitā brahmaṇe varaṃ dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:6779: varaṃ gāṃ pitā dadāti dakṣiṇata asīnāya brāhmaṇāya /
GV06apastgcu:6783: evaṃ godānamanyasminnapi nakṣatre ṣoḍaśe varṣe // ĀpGs_16.12 //
GV06apastgcu:6785: yathā caulaṃ evamasya godānākhyamapi karma kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:6801: agnirdevatā yatra godāne tadagnigodānaṃ yasya vaso 'gnigodānaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6812: āgneyānāṃ kāṇḍānāṃ upākaraṇasamāpanayoryaḥ kalpaḥ tatra cauladharmāḥ pravartanta iti /
GV06apastgcu:6815: asyāsmin gṛhye 'nupadiṣṭatvāt yat godānamupadiṣṭaṃ tatraiva śamyāvidhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6816: tatra prayogaḥ brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā'śiṣo vācayitvā tūṣṇīṃ keśaśmaśru vāpayitvāgnerupasamādhānādi
GV06apastgcu:6828: asmin pakṣe ājyabhāgānte kṛte 'agnaye kāṇḍarṣaye svāhā'ityājyenaivaikā pradhānāhutiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6835: agnigodāne tu kāṇḍopākaraṇātideśāt nityameva yadā vratacaryā tadā varadānādūrdhva devatopasthānaṃ pūrvavadante,
GV06apastgcu:6854: atra ca vāpayata iti ṇijantanirdeśādācārya eva godānakarmaṇaḥ kartā /
GV06apastgcu:6856: tathātra śikhāyā api vapanaṃ 'etāvannānā sarvān keśānvāpayate'ityasmādeva vacanāt ;satravat /
GV06apastgcu:6857: anya āhuḥ 'rikto vā eṣo 'napihito yanmuḍastasyaitadapidhānaṃ yacchikheti /
GV06apastgcu:6859: iti satrebhyo 'nyatra śikhāyā vapanagratiṣedhāt ihāpi naiva śkhāyā vapanamiti //15//
GV06apastgcu:6875: te ca 'śālīnasyodavasāya'iti vacanābhāve gṛha eva kartavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6886: tatra yasmin pradeśe 'gāraṃ cikīrṣitaṃ so 'gārāvakāśaḥ sa dakṣiṇāpratyakpravaṇobhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6889: tamagārāvakāśaṃ uddhanti khanitreṇa khanati yathā pāṃsava utpadyante /
GV06apastgcu:6890: uddhatya tān pāsūn pālāśena samīyena vodūhena etāmeva diśaṃ prati uttarayarcā'yadbhūmeḥ krūra'mityetayāudūhatiunnatāt pradeśāt avanate prāpayati
GV06apastgcu:6892: yo 'gārārthatvenābhipareto 'vakāśo bhūmibhāgo dakṣiṇāpratyakpravaṇaḥdakṣiṇāpratīcyāṃ naitṛtyāṃ diśi nimnastamuddhatya khanitrādinā pāṃsūnutkhādya pālāśena śamīmayena vodūhena,
GV06apastgcu:6905: kḷptamuttarayābhimṛśya pradakṣiṇaṃ sthūṇāgartān khānayitvābhyantaraṃ pāṃsūnudupyottarābhyāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ dvārasthūṇāmavadadhāti // ĀpGs_17.3 //
GV06apastgcu:6907: evamudūhya tatastaṃ bhūmibāgaṃ kalpayanti yathā sarvatassamaṃ sampadyate /
GV06apastgcu:6910: abhyantaraṃ ca bahirārabhya madhye yathā samāpyate tathetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6911: tatra madyasthūṇāsu vaṃśadhāraṇārthāsu pradakṣiṇamiticābhyantaramiti ca viśeṣaṇasyāsambhavāt paryantāsveva bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:6912: tatra prāgdvāre 'gāre dakṣiṇadvārasthūṇāgartamārabhya pradakṣiṇamottarasmāt dvārasthūṇāgartāt khānayitvā tato yāvatyo madhyamamasthūṇāḥ tāvatīnāṃ dakṣiṇādārabhyodagapavargaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6914: evaṃkhānayitvā gartebhyaḥ pāsūnudūpya uddhatya tatauttarābhyāṃ ṛgbhyāṃ 'ihaiva tiṣṭhe'tyetābhyāṃ dakṣiṇādvārasthūṇāṃ garte avadadhāti //3//
GV06apastgcu:6915: kḷptamudūhena prāgudakpravaṇaṃ kṛtaṃuttarayā'syonā pṛthivi'ityanayābhimṛśya sthūṇāgartānsthūṇānāṃ vibhāgārthān gartān karmakaraiḥ pradakṣiṇaṃkhānayitvābhyantaramārabhya,
GV06apastgcu:6920: atra prādakṣiṇyasya cābhyantaratvasya ca vidhānaṃ pa4yantīyāsveva sthūṇāsu;
GV06apastgcu:6931: itarāsaṃ tuyathākhātaṃ yena krameṇa gartāḥ khātāḥ tenāvadhānaṃ tūṣṇīm /
GV06apastgcu:6933: tairādhīyamānaṃ vaṃśamuttareṇa yajuṣā ' ṛtena sthūṇā” vityanenābhimantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:6939: yathākhātaṃ khananakrameṇaitarāḥsthūṇāḥ tūṣṇīmanvavadhāyavaṃśaṃ samatūpaṃ samathūṇāsvādhīyamānaṃuttareṇa yajuṣā'ṛtena sthūṇā vadhiroha';
GV06apastgcu:6945: yathāliṅgamitiyasyāgārāṅgasya liṅgaṃ yasmin mantre dṛśyate tena tadabhimukho 'gāramabhimantrayata ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6946: yadāpi pūrvasthūṇā baddhā tadāpi dve evābhisandhāyābhimantraṇam /
GV06apastgcu:6948: evaṃ sarvatra agāramadhye yaḥ sthūṇārājaḥ stūpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6949: pṛṣṭhavaṃśaḥ atraike sthūṇāliṅgeṣu caturṣu mantreṣu 'sthūṇe abhirakṣatu'ityevamanuṣaṅgāmcchanti /
GV06apastgcu:6950: yajñaśca dakṣiṇāśca dakṣiṇe sthūṇe abhirakṣatu iti /
GV06apastgcu:6954: ūhasya cāvidhānāt abhyātānavat pāṭhābhāvacca sarvānuṣaṅgeṣu dṛṣṭasyānte punaḥ pāṭhasyābhāvācca /
GV06apastgcu:6955: yattu sākāṃkṣatvamuktaṃ tadapi nānuṣaṅgahetuḥ sannidhimātreṇākāṅkṣāyā nivartanāt /
GV06apastgcu:6956: yadi vā dharmaste sthūṇārāja śrīste ityatrābhirakṣatvityasya nāpekṣā ,
GV06apastgcu:6961: sammitaṃnirmitamagāraṃuttarāḥ'brahma ca te kṣatraṃ ca'ityādibhiḥ pañcabhirmantraiḥyathāliṅgaṃmantraliṅgāvagatadiṅmukho 'bhimantrayate tatra pañcamena madhyamābhimukhaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:6968: atra kecit-dvitīyādiṣu triṣu mantreṣu vākyasamāptyartha 'sthūṇe abhirakṣatu'ityādyanuṅgaṃ manyante /
GV06apastgcu:6980: pālāśaṃ śamīmayaṃ vedhmamādīpyottarayāgnimuddhṛtyottareṇa yajuṣāgāraṃ prapādyottarapūrvadeśe 'gārasyottarayāgniṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati // ĀpGs_17.7
GV06apastgcu:6995: yeṣāṃ tūdagayanāpekṣā te rātrau praveśaṃ necchanti /
GV06apastgcu:6996: ahaḥkṛtasya rātrikṛtasya ca pāpmano viniyogaḥ prapādyata ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:6999: tamuddhṛtamagniṃ uttareṇa yajuṣā 'indra sya gṛhā vasumanto varūthinaḥ'ityanenaagāraṃprapādayati /
GV06apastgcu:7015: homasaṃyogāt . athaupāsanasya vaihārikāṇāṃ ca tadaiva praveśanaṃ pratiṣṭhāpanaṃ ca sve sthāne /
GV06apastgcu:7018: idhmamiti ca 'agniṣu mahata idhmānādadhāti'itivadaniyataṃ saṃkhyādikaṃ vivakṣitam /
GV06apastgcu:7021: atra ca sānuṣaṅge catuṣpade triṣṭubhau dve ṛcau pañcabhiḥ pādairāmnāte /
GV06apastgcu:7031: tathā śrautāgnīnapi vidhivadānītānasminneva kāle agāraṃ prapādyāgnyagāre yathāvidhi pratiṣṭhāpayati /
GV06apastgcu:7032: kecit-ihāgnimuddhṛtya agāraṃ prapādyeti prakṛte 'pi punaruktayoretayorarthavattvāya agārasyāgnimityanvayādādīpanādipratiṣṭhāpanāntaṃ pacanārtha sya laukikāgnereva,
GV06apastgcu:7034: teṣāmetattulyasūtre vivāhāṅge praviśya home pacanāgnerevopasamādhānādi syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7035: athāgāraśabdasya śayanasthānavācitvāt gṛhaśabdasya cātathātvāt na tatra tulyasūtrateti cet-na;
GV06apastgcu:7050: udakaṃ dhīyate yatra tat udadhānaṃ maṇikākhyam /
GV06apastgcu:7053: tasminviṣūcīnāgrāndarbhānsaṃstīrya teṣūttarayā vrīhiyavān nyupya tatrodadhānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati // ĀpGs_17.9 //
GV06apastgcu:7065: tatra caturbhirvā kumbhaiḥ pṛthagānayanamekenaiva vātha punaḥ pūrayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:7067: tasmin udadhāne uttareṇa'ariṣṭā asmākaṃ'ityanenayajuṣā catura udakumbhānānayati /
GV06apastgcu:7075: atha yadi tadudadhānāṃ bhidyate tatuttarayarcā bhūmirbhūmi'mityetayāanumantrayate /
GV06apastgcu:7080: agnerupasamādhānādyājyabhāgānte uttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate // ĀpGs_17.12 //
GV06apastgcu:7089: agniniyamārta tu-yo 'gāre pacanārtha pratiṣṭhāpito 'gniḥ tasyaiva homārthamupasamādhānaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:7090: anyathā sarvapākayajñārthe aupāsana eva homaḥ syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7096: utyate-sviṣṭakṛtpratiṣedhastāvat gamyate-uttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate na sviṣṭakṛtpratiṣedhastāvat gamyate-uttarā āhutīrhutvā jayādi pratipadyate na sviṣṭakṛtamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7104: itivadājyabhāgānta ityanenaiva tantraprāptau siddhāyāṃ 'agnerupasamādhānādi'iti vacanaṃ svamatena pratiṣṭhitaḥ pacanāgnireveha homārtha ityevamarthamiti
GV06apastgcu:7111: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvottareṇa yajuṣodakumbhena triḥ pradakṣiṇamantarato 'gāraṃ niveśanaṃ vā pariṣicya brāhmaṇān bhojayedapūpaissaktubhirodaneneti
GV06apastgcu:7118: paribhāṣayaiva siddhe pradakṣiṇamiti vacanāt pariṣecanamidamekameva pradakṣiṇaṃ triguṇībhūtaṃ sakṛdupāttenaivodakumbhena saṃtatamavicchinnaṃ kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:7119: mekhalayā parivyāṇavat trīṇi pariṣecananīti siddhaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7120: antaraṃtaiti vacanamagārāt bahiḥ pariṣecanaṃ mā bhūt /
GV06apastgcu:7127: pariṣecanāntamuttareṇa'śivaṃ śivam'ityanenayajuṣāudakumbhena sakṛdupāttenaagāraṃ niveśanaṃ vāntarato na bahiḥtriḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ pariṣicya brāhmaṇān bhojayedapūpādibhiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7136: śvagrahahītaṃ kumāraṃ tapoyukto jālena pracchādya kaṃsaṃ kiṅkiṇiṃ vā hrādayannadvāreṇa
GV06apastgcu:7147: yāvatā tapasā siddhaṃ manyate tāvat kṛtvetyarthaḥjālaṃmatsyagrahaṇaṃ tenapracchādya /
GV06apastgcu:7150: tayoranyataraṃ hrādayan anyatarasya dhvaniṃ kārayan kenacidanyena /
GV06apastgcu:7151: svayaṃ kumāraṃ gṛhītvāsamāṃ prapādayati advāreṇachadīrapohyamārga kṛtvā tenetyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7153: sabhā, tasyā madhye 'dhidevanaṃ sthānaṃyatra kitavā dīvyanti taṃ pradeśaṃuddhatyādbhiravokṣyatatrākṣānnivapati /
GV06apastgcu:7158: tato dadhnā lavaṇamiśreṇāvokṣedañja- linā uttarairmantraiḥ 'kūrkurassukūrkura'ityādibhiḥ 'śvānamicchvādanna puruṣaṃ chat'ityantaiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7165: yāvat karma samāpyate tāvat saṃsakiṅkaṇyoranyatarasya hrādanam /
GV06apastgcu:7180: tasmin pakṣe āditastisra ṛcaḥ tataḥ 'tatsatyaṃ yattvendraḥ'vigṛhya bāhū iti dve yajuṣā tato 'bibhranniṣkam'iti pañcarcaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7191: yadi bhaiṣajyena kumāro 'gadaḥ syāt na tatredaṃ kartavyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7192: anyathā kumāra syāsmin roge piturnaimittikamidamavaśyaṃ kartavyaṃ vijñāyeta gṛhadāheṣṭyādivat
GV06apastgcu:7193: . evaṃ bruvatāṃ doṣaḥ yakṣmagṛhītāmanyāṃ vetyetatprakārāntareṇa rogaśāntāvapi kartavyaṃ
GV06apastgcu:7195: evametasmin karmaṇi triṣu kāseṣu kṛte kumāro 'gado bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7196: yadi na bhavati punarapi tapoyuktena kartavyamiti //2//
GV06apastgcu:7198: sarvatra śrutitor'thato vāvagatasya kāminaḥ karmopadeśaḥ sāmarthyātphalasiddhyavagamaparyanta iti pradarśayitum /
GV06apastgcu:7203: yadi na bhavati tadā punarapyetatkarma kartavyaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:7206: śaṅkhinaṃ kumāraṃ tapoyukta uttarābhyāmabhimantryottarayodakumbhena śirasto 'vanayetprātarmadhyandine sāyam // ĀpGs_18.3 //
GV06apastgcu:7210: tena gṛhītaṃśaṅkhinamuttarābhyāṃete te pratidvaśyete ityetāmyāmṛgbhyāṃabhimantrya tata udakuṃbhenaśirasto 'vanayet,
GV06apastgcu:7213: śahkho 'pi grahaḥ yena gṛhītaḥ śaṅkhavannadati tadgṛhītaśśaṅkhī /
GV06apastgcu:7225: atha sarpavalirnāma karma nityaṃ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare kartavyamupadiśyatetasya śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāmārambhaḥ
GV06apastgcu:7227: tasyopakrame śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ astamite āditye sthālīpākobhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7228: asatyapi nakṣatrayoge śrāvaṇasya māsasya paurṇamāsī śrāvaṇītyucyate lakṣaṇayā /
GV06apastgcu:7229: tatra ślokaumeṣādisthe savitari yoyo darśaḥ pravartate /
GV06apastgcu:7231: teṣu yā yā paurṇamāsī sā sā caitryādikā smṛtā /
GV06apastgcu:7234: tatra sāyamāhutiṃ hutvā sthālīpākakarma pratipadyate pārvaṇenāto 'nyānītyuktaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:7236: śrāvaṇyai paurṇamāsyai saṅkalpitān vrīhin yavān vā nirupya pratiṣṭhitābhidhāraṇāntaṃ
GV06apastgcu:7237: kṛtvāgnerupasamādhānādi dvandvaṃ nyañci pātrāṇi kiṃśukapuṣpairāragvadhamayasamidbhiśca saha //5 //
GV06apastgcu:7250: teṣu yā yā paurṇamāsī sā sā caitryādikā smatā /
GV06apastgcu:7258: pārvaṇavadājyabhāgānte sthālīpākāddhutvāñjalinottaraiḥ pratimantraṃ kiṃśukāni juhoti // ĀpGs_18.6 //
GV06apastgcu:7272: pratimantramittyucyate pratimantraṃ kiṃśukānāṃ bahutvaṃ yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:7277: śthālīpākādvidhivadavadāya 'śrāvaṇyai paurmamāsyai svāhā'iti hutvā 'jagdho maśakaḥ'ityādibhistribhiḥuttaraiḥ pratimantraṃ kiṃśukāni palāśasya puṣpāṇi juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:7282: añjalerapi darvyā saha lepāñjanaṃ ca bhavatyeva;
GV06apastgcu:7298: tenātra samidhāṃ māntravarṇikadevatoddeśena tyāgaḥ kartavya eva //7//
GV06apastgcu:7308: evametā ekādaśa pradhānāhutīrhutvā sauviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca sthālīpākādeva hutvā tato jayādi pratipadyate kiṃśukaprabhṛtīnāmapyāhutīnāṃ prādhānyajñāpanārthamidaṃ nacanam /
GV06apastgcu:7309: anyathā paurṇamāsyāmastamite sthālīpāka iti vihitatvāt paurmamāsyāṃ paurṇamāsīti ca tasya devatābhidhānādarśakarmakatvācca kiṃśukānāṃ pradhānatvaṃ na gamyeta /
GV06apastgcu:7310: tataśca pārṇavadupahomāntaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ kiṃśukādīnāṃ hemaḥ prāpnoti //9//
GV06apastgcu:7314: 5 gṛhādīśānyāṃ diśi sthaṇḍilaṃ kalpayitvā tatra saktunivāpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7315: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvā vāgyatassaṃbhārānādāya prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramya sthaṇḍilaṃ
GV06apastgcu:7316: kalpayitvā tatra prācīrudīcīśca tistrastistro lekhā likhitvādbhirupaninīya tāsūttarayā
GV06apastgcu:7320: pariṣecanānte upaniṣkramaṇameva nānditi kiṃ siddhaṃ bhavati ?
GV06apastgcu:7322: vāgyataḥśabdamakurvandhānāḥ lājāḥ ajanābhyañjane sthagarośīramu- dapātramiti saṃbhārāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7324: kalpayitveti vacanāt svayameva kalpanaṃ nānyaiḥ kalpitasya parigrahaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7325: tatreti vacanāt sthaṇḍilasya madhye balerāyatanaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7335: evaṃ lokhā likhitvādbhirupaninayati tāsāṃ samīpe apo ninayati sarvadevajanebhyo dadāti yathāpitṛbhyaḥ piṇḍadāne /
GV06apastgcu:7336: tatastāsu lekhāsūttarayarcā 'namo 'stu sarpebhyo ye pārthivā'ityetayā saktūnnivapati hastena darvyā vā,
GV06apastgcu:7338: tāsviti vacanaṃ tāḥ sarvā lekhāḥ yathā balirvyāpnuyādityevamartham //10//
GV06apastgcu:7342: sthaṇaḍilaṃ pīṭhaṃ kalpayitvā tatra pīṭhe dakṣiṇasyā ārabhyaprācīstisraḥpratīcyā
GV06apastgcu:7343: ārabhyaudīcīstisraśca rekhā likhitvādbhirupaninīya tāsu ṣacisu lekhāsu lekhanakpameṇottarayā
GV06apastgcu:7349: kecit-sarvāsu rekhāsu yathā yugapatyāpnuyādvaliḥ tathā nivapati //10//
GV06apastgcu:7351: tūṣṇī sampuṣkā dhānā lājānāñjanābhyañjane sthagarośīramiti // ĀpGs_18.11 //
GV06apastgcu:7353: saṃpuṣkāakṣatā akhaṇḍitāstaṇḍulaiḥ kṛtāḥ sthagarañcośīrañca gandhadravye etāni ṣaṭ dravyāṇi tāsu nivapati /
GV06apastgcu:7354: iti śabdaḥ samuccayārthaḥ tena sarvatra pūrveṇa mantreṇaiva nivapane prāpte tūṣṇīmiti mantrapratiṣdhaḥ //11//
GV06apastgcu:7360: etāni ṣaṭ dravyāṇi tūṣṇī rekhasveva nivapati //11//
GV06apastgcu:7362: uttarairupasthāyāpaḥ pariṣicyāpratīkṣastūṣṇīmetyā paśveta padetyetābhyāmudakumbhena triḥ pradakṣiṇamantarato 'gāraṃ niveśanaṃ vā pariṣicya brāhmaṇān bhojayet // ĀpGs_18.12 //
GV06apastgcu:7367: tebhya imaṃ balimahārṣamiti pūrvasyā evottarasya pādasya sannāmaḥ na mantrāntaram /
GV06apastgcu:7372: pratyetya 'apaśveta padā'ityetābhyāṃ ṛgbhyāṃ udakuṃbhena untarato 'gāraṃ niveśanaṃ vāpariṣicyabrahmaṇān yugamān bhojayet sthālīpākaśṣādibhiḥ
GV06apastgcu:7376: ityādiṣu caturṣu paryāyeṣu daśabhyaḥ padebhya ūrdhva 'rakṣitā yaścādhipatiḥ'ityāderanuṣaṅgaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7377: tathā 'hetayo nāma stha'ityādiṣvapi pañcasvekādaśabhya urdhva 'vātanāmaṃ tebhyo vo namaḥ'iti ādeḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7378: yattumadhye-tebhya imaṃbalimahārṣamiti tatpūrvasyā eva baliharaṇārthāyā ṛcaḥ
GV06apastgcu:7381: atha nyaptaṃ balimadbhiḥ pariṣicya tamapratīkṣamāṇaḥ tūṣṇīṃ vāgyato gṛhānpratyetya 'apa śveta padā'ityetābhyāmityādi yathāsūtraṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:7392: evamata ūrdhva yadaśanīyasya saktūnāṃ vaitaṃ baliṃ haredāmārgaśīrṣyāḥ // ĀpGs_19.2 //
GV06apastgcu:7399: tadasmāt karmaṇaūrdhvamāmārgaśīrṣyāḥ parvaṇaścaturṣu māseṣu yadasīyasyānnaviśeṣasyasaktūnāṃ vāharahaḥkartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:7404: tūṣṇīṃ saṃpuṣkāḥ dhānā“ityādi sarveṣāṃ tulyā cedanā /
GV06apastgcu:7405: mantre ca tulyavadabhidhānaṃ tebhya imaṃ baliṃ hariṣyāmi iti /
GV06apastgcu:7417: yadi hyevaśabda ubhayārthassyāt rātrau pārvaṇaḥ prāpnoti /
GV06apastgcu:7419: tathā yadyetacchabda ubhayārthassyāt “parisaṃvatsarādupatiṣṭhadbhyaḥ etatkārya“miti rātrāvapacitiḥ prāpnoti;
GV06apastgcu:7424: katham?yadaśanīyasyeti vacanāt yadaśanīyasyeti vacanāt yadyadannamaśanārtha yadā kriyate tasya tasya tadā kartavyamiti hi tasyārthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7427: tataśca yadā gṛhamedhino yadaśanīyasya homā balayaścettyutpannasya vaiśvadevasya dvayoḥ kālayoḥ pravṛttiḥ evamasyāpi /
GV06apastgcu:7428: spaṣṭañcaitadāśvalāyanake“sarpadevajenabhyassvā- heti sāyaṃ prātarbaliṃ haredā pratyavarohaṇāt (āśva.2-1-14) iti /
GV06apastgcu:7430: ata ūrdhvamitivacanama- smin prathame baliharaṇe dravyavikalpomā vijñāyīti /
GV06apastgcu:7441: yadaśanīyasya vā sambandhinamiti vāśabdasya vyavahitena sambandhaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:7443: agārapariṣecanādikaṃ tu sthālīpākasyaiva śeṣo na baliharaṇasya,
GV06apastgcu:7450: tathā etamitiśabdasyaiva apekṣitakṛtsnadharmaprāpakatvāt evamiti śabda uttarasūtrārtha iti /
GV06apastgcu:7456: yathedaṃ śrāvaṇyāṃ karma kataṃ evaṃ mārgaśīrṣyāmapīti /
GV06apastgcu:7457: tena 'pārvaṇavadājyabhāgānta'ityādeḥ dhānāḥ kumārān prāśayantī'tyantasya kṛtsnasya kalpasyātra pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7459: śrāvaṇyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ iti prakṛte punaḥ paurṇamāsyāmityucyate jñāpanārtham
GV06apastgcu:7461: tena pūrvasūtre āmārgaśīrṣyā iti karmāvadhitvena na gṛhyate /
GV06apastgcu:7463: tena mārgaśīrṣyā paurṇamāsyāmahani yadaśanīyasya baliharaṇaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7464: kālavācitve tu na prāpnoti yadi ca maryādāyāmākāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7467: iṣyate cāstamite sthālīpākakarmaṇi saptarbhirdravyairba- liharaṇamahani ca yadaśanīyasya /
GV06apastgcu:7469: kālasya vyapadeśo mā bhūditi paurṇamāsyāmiti viśeṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:7470: evañca yadaśanīyavacanenobhayoḥ kālayorbaliharaṇamiti yaduktaṃ tadeva sthitaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7475: patnyavahantītyādi dhānāprāśanāntaṃ kṛtsnaṃ karmānuṣṭheyamityarthaḥ . sthālīpākahome tu'mārgaśīrṣyaipaurṇamāsyai svāhe'ti viśeṣaḥ //3//
GV06apastgcu:7479: yadyapyayaṃ sannāmastasminneva mantre paṭhitaḥ tathāpyasatyasmin vacane baliharaṇamantre caturthapādasya pṛthagviniyogābhāvāt catuṣpādā sā vijñāyeta
GV06apastgcu:7481: tripadaiva sā tasyā eva tṛtīyasya pādasya sannāmo 'yamuttamaḥ paṭhitaḥ tasyaiva viniyogakālo na prāgiti /
GV06apastgcu:7482: kiñca kṛtsnamevaitat karma dhānāprāśanāntaṃ sthālīpākaśabdena gṛhyate etacca darśitaṃ bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:7489: evamityanena vacanena śrāvaṇīvidhānasya kṛtsnasyātidiṣṭatvādasyāpi sthālīpākasya śeṣatvena baliharaṇaprāptiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7503: tat karma vakṣyate-tatra anāhitāgnigrahaṇamāhitāgneraupāsanavataḥ śrautenāgrayaṇena saha samuccayapratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:7522: sarvādhīnino 'pi māsiśrāddhaṃ homavarja kartavyameva upadśamataṃ tu-saśeṣādhāninaścāhitāgne /
GV06apastgcu:7527: yena karmaṇā agre navadravyaṃ devān prāpayatīti /
GV06apastgcu:7532: navānāṃ sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā'grayaṇadevatābhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛccaturthābhyo hutvā taṇḍulānāṃ
GV06apastgcu:7533: mukhaṃ pūrayitvā gīrtvā'camyaudanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvṛttyottareṇa yajuṣāgārastūpa udviddhet // ĀpGs_19.7 //
GV06apastgcu:7535: navānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ yavānāṃ vā aupāsane śrapayitvā pratiṣṭhitamabhighāryāgnimupasamādhāya
GV06apastgcu:7536: saṃparistīya tūṣṇīṃ samantaṃ pariṣicya durvī saṃmṛcya sthālīpākādupaghātaṃ catasra
GV06apastgcu:7551: tān gīrtvā bhakṣayitvā'camya tata odanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvartayāti prayatnena sampādayati /
GV06apastgcu:7552: yathā stūpe udvidhyamāno na saṃśīryati tathā saṃvartya tamagārastūpe udvidhyet-uttareṇa yajuṣā'parameṣṭhyasī'tyanena ūrdhva vidhyet
GV06apastgcu:7557: āgrayaṇavacanādeva siddhe navānāmiti vacanamanāhitāgnernavānāṃ sthālīpāka eva yathā syāt /
GV06apastgcu:7560: tena śyāmākānāṃ veṇukānāṃ veṇuyavānāṃ cāgrayaṇaṃ anāhitāgnerbhavati //7//
GV06apastgcu:7561: navānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ yavānāṃ vā sambandhināṃ patnyavahantītyādividhināsthālīpākamevaśrapayitvāgnerupasamādhānādyagnimukhānte kṛte
GV06apastgcu:7563: tatra prathamamindrāgnibhyāṃ agnīndrābhyāṃ vā svāheti juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:7575: 'āgrayaṇaṃ bhavati hutādyāya'ityatrendrāgnyādadīnāmevopadeśāt aindrāgnasya mukhyapradhānatve cāmāvāsyātantramiti tantrani- yamasyopapatteḥ,
GV06apastgcu:7577: atra ca sviṣṭakṛccaturthābhya iti vacanaṃ śrautavadiha vrīhyāgrayaṇena śyāmākāgrayaṇasya pākṣikī samānatantratā mā bhūdityāvamartham /
GV06apastgcu:7583: kecit-sviṣṭakṛccaturthavacanāhitāgneḥ syāmākādīnāṃ veṇuyavānāṃ cāgrayaṇameva na bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:7597: tata odanena hutaśeṣeṇa piṇḍaṃ saṃvartayati yathā udvidyamāno na śīryati tathā sudṛḍhaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:7598: tatastaṃ piṇḍamuttareṇa yajuṣā 'parameṣṭhyasi'ityanena udviddhet ūrdhva vikṣipet /
GV06apastgcu:7604: uttareṇa yajuṣā pratyavaruhyottarairdakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥ navasvastare saṃviśanti // ĀpGs_19.9 //
GV06apastgcu:7606: hemantapratyavarohaṇaṃ nāma karma nityaṃ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare kartavyam,
GV06apastgcu:7607: tadupadiśyate-hemante prāpte khaṭvāṃ vihāya palāśasvastare śete /
GV06apastgcu:7613: (apara āha-mārgaśīrṣyā paurṇamāsyāmastamite sthālīpākānte pratyavarohaṇaṃ sarvaṣāṃ prasiddhatvāditi /
GV06apastgcu:7616: palāśaiḥ kaspite śayanīye dakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥdakṣiṇāni pārśvānyadhaḥ kṛtvāsaṃviśantiśerate /
GV06apastgcu:7618: nityaseyaiva saṃveśanasya niyama- vidhirayam-niśāyāṃ yatsaṃveśanaṃ saṃvapnārtha tadasyāṃ niśāyāmeva kartavyamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7620: yasmin karmāṇi hemante svaṣṭvātaḥ pratyavarohaṇaṃ taddhemantapratyavarohaṇaṃ nāma karmopadiśyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7621: asmādeva ca yaugikānnāmadheyāt 'pratyavarūḍo no hemantaḥ'iti mantraliṅgāccedaṃ karma hemante prathamāyāṃ rātrau kartavyamiti vidhiḥ kalpyate
GV06apastgcu:7624: uttareṇa yajuṣā 'pratyavarūḍho no hemantaḥ'ityanena gṛhasthaḥ patnyādayaśca navasvastare
GV06apastgcu:7625: āruhya svaṣṭvāto hemante pratyavarohanti yāvaddhemantastāvatkhaṣṭvāṃ śayyāṃ vimucya
GV06apastgcu:7627: na punaḥ pūrvamadṛṣṭārtha khaṣṭvāmāruhya mantreṇa svastaraṃ pratyavarohantīti /
GV06apastgcu:7629: navasvastare navaiḥ palāśaiḥ kalpite śayanīye dakṣiṇaiḥ pārśvaiḥ
GV06apastgcu:7633: dakṣiṇataḥ pitottarā mātaivamavaśiṣṭānāṃ jyeṣṭho jyeṣṭho 'nantaraḥ // ĀpGs_19.10 //
GV06apastgcu:7635: teṣāṃ saṃviśatāṃ yaḥ pitā sa dakṣiṇaśśete yā mātā sottarā /
GV06apastgcu:7639: avaśiṣṭā amātyāsteṣāṃ yo yo jyeṣṭaḥ kumāraḥ kumārī vā sa piturdakṣiṇataḥ tadanantaro māturuttarataḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7640: tṛtīyaḥ prathamasya dakṣiṇataḥ caturtho dvitīyasyottarata ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:7642: sarve prākśrasaḥ udaṅmukhāḥ mantravidaśca mantrān japeyuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7645: avaśiṣṭānāṃputrādīnāṃ madhye yo yo jyeṣṭhaḥ putro duhitā vā sa sa dakṣiṇo 'nantaraśca,
GV06apastgcu:7646: yo yaḥ kanīyān sa sa uttaro 'nantaraśca;
GV06apastgcu:7649: yo dvitīyo jyeṣṭhassa sarvajyeṣṭhasya uttaro 'nantara ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:7654: evaṃ saṃviśya kiñcit suptvā saṃhāya sampūrvo jahatiḥ śayanāduttthāyāsane dṛṣṭaḥ 'kaliśśayāno bhavati saṃjihānastu dvāpara“iti /
GV06apastgcu:7661: evaṃ saṃveśanaṃ saṃhāyābhimarśanaṃ ca mantravat trirāvartanīyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7663: “udita āditye sauryāṇi svastyayanāni ca japitvānnaṃ saṃskṛtya brāhmaṇān bhojayitvā svastyayanaṃ vācayitve“(āśva.gṛ.4-6-18)
GV06apastgcu:7671: kiṃ tarhi?yadeva rāgaprāptaṃ rātrau saṃveśanaṃ tadāśratya mantrā niyamāśca vidhīyante;
GV06apastgcu:7673: yathā vā 'payasvatīroṣadhayaḥ iti purā barhiṣa āhartorjāyāpatī aśnītaḥ '(āpa.śrau.4-2-3) ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:7677: atheśānabalirnāma nityaḥ pākayajño mantrāmnānakramaprāpto vyākhyāyate tasya ca sāmānyavidhisiddhodagayanādireva kālaḥ;
GV06apastgcu:7682: tathā śāstrāntarādeva gavāṃ śāntyarthaḥ putrādikāmārthaśca prayogaḥ pratyetavya iti /
GV06apastgcu:7686: īśānāya sthālīpākaṃ śrapayitvā kṣaitrapatyaṃ ca prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramya sthaṇḍilaṃ kalpayitvāgnerupasamādhānādi // ĀpGs_19.13 //
GV06apastgcu:7688: atha īśānabalirnāma pākayajño vakṣyate śūlagava iti yasya prasiddhiḥ gavālambhanaṃ ca tatra śāstrāntare
GV06apastgcu:7691: nityaścāyaṃ puruṣasaṃ skāraḥ na kāmyonaimittiko vā /
GV06apastgcu:7702: tena yakṣyamāṇo gṛhe sthālīpākaṃ śrapayati aupāsane īśānāyadevāya saṅkalpitamekaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:7704: taissahaprācīmudīcīṃ vā diśaṃ grāmāt bahirupaniṣkramyayatra yakṣyamāṇo bhavati tatra
GV06apastgcu:7705: devayajanāya devagṛhayośca paryāptamekaṃ sthaṇḍilaṃ kalpayitvātasya pūrvārdhe aganyāyatanamullikhyāgniṃ
GV06apastgcu:7709: īśa aiśvarye“iti dhātvathesmṛteḥ niratiśayamaiśvarya yasya saīśānaḥpraṇavopāsanādibhirupāsyo maheśvara ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7710: tasmai īśānāya sthālīpākaṃhomādibhyaḥ paryāptaṃ pārvaṇavadaupāsane śrapayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:7712: kecit-trīnodānān kalpayitvāgnimabhyānīya tato bahiḥ pratiṣṭhāpya trayāṇāmabhighāraṇamiti /
GV06apastgcu:7715: atha yathārtha sambhārānādāya grāmātprācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamupaniṣkramyāgnikuṭyādibhyo 'laṃsthaṇḍilādi kalpayitvā,
GV06apastgcu:7723: tata agneḥ paścāt dve kuṭī karoti devāya devyai ca /
GV06apastgcu:7728: agnimukhānte kṛte apareṇāgniṃ dve kuṭī prāgdvāro udagaparge kṛtvā //14//
GV06apastgcu:7734: madhye jayaṃtasya pratikṛtimākāśa eva kṛtvā dakṣimasyāmīśānamāvāhayati uttarayarcā 'ā tvā vahanti'tyetayā /
GV06apastgcu:7735: agnerupasamādhānādīttyuktatvāt pradhānāhutīnāṃ ca vakṣyamāṇatvāt ājyabhāgānte kuṭīkaraṇameva bhavati //1//
GV06apastgcu:7742: uttarasyāṃ laukikyā vācā mīḍhuṣīṃ devīṃ āvāhayati /
GV06apastgcu:7748: tathottarasyāṃ kuṭyāṃlaukikyā vācā 'āyāhi mīḍhuṣi'iti mīḍhuṣīmīśānasya patnīṃ āvāhayatītyeva jaya karmāṇamindraṃ //2//
GV06apastgcu:7749: kuṭyormadhye ākāśe jayantamindrasūnuṃ skandaṃ vā 'āyāhi jayanta'ityāvāhayati /
GV06apastgcu:7754: yathoḍhamudakāni pradāya trīnodanān kalpayitvāgnimabhyānīyottaraikupasparśayitvā uttarairyathāsvamodanebhyo hutvā sarvatassamavadāyottareṇa yajuṣāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtam // ĀpGs_20.4 //
GV06apastgcu:7756: (yena śabdena yeṣu sthāneṣu yena krameṇāvāhanaṃ coditaṃ taddevatākānyardhyāṇi prayacchati) /
GV06apastgcu:7760: tato gandhapuṣpaghūpadīpairabhyarcya tataḥ sthālīpākāduddhṛtya trīnodanān kalpayati triṣu pātreṣu devyai skandāya ca devāya homārtha upahārārtha ca /
GV06apastgcu:7762: tatastānodanānagnisamīpamānīyyāpageṇāgniṃ barhiṣi pratiṣṭhāpayati dakṣiṇata uttaratomadhye ca /
GV06apastgcu:7769: yenaudanena yasyai devatāyai tvatvasambandha upasparśanenopalakṣitaḥ tasmāt tasya juhotītyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7773: evaṃ pradhānāhutīrhutvā tatassarvataḥ samavādāyottareṇa yajuṣāva 'agnaye sviṣṭakṛte suhuta'ityanenāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃyajati /
GV06apastgcu:7774: sarvatassamava- dāyettyucyate yathā svamodanebhyaḥ pṛthakpṛthak sviṣṭakṛnmābhūditi /
GV06apastgcu:7790: ityādibhissaptadaśabhiḥyathāsvamodanebhyaḥyo ya odano yasyā yasyā devatāyāssvabhūtastasmāttasmādyathāliṅgaṃ pārvaṇavadānadharmeṇāvadā- ya pradhānāhutīrjuhoti
GV06apastgcu:7795: tatassarvatassarvebhyastribhya odanebhyaḥ sviṣṭakṛto 'vadānadharmeṇasamavadāya sahvadāyauttareṇa yajuṣā'agnaye sviṣṭakṛte suhuta huta'ityanenāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃjuhoti /
GV06apastgcu:7796: ataḥsarvatassamavadāyeti vacanaṃ āgrayaṇamāsiśrāddhādivat sakṛdevāvadāya sviṣṭakṛditi śahkānirāsārtham //4//
GV06apastgcu:7798: uttareṇa yajuṣopasthāyottaraissahaudanāni parṇānyekaikena dve dve datvā daśa devasenābhyo daśottarābhyaḥ // ĀpGs_20.5 //
GV06apastgcu:7800: uttareṇa yajuṣā'svastinaḥ pūrṇamukha'ityanena upasthānaṃ ca mahādevasya,
GV06apastgcu:7806: tatra cāditassaptabhiḥ pratimantraṃ dve dve parṇedadāti /
GV06apastgcu:7807: aṣṭamena daśadevasenābhya iti vadan mantrapratītā devatā darśayati /
GV06apastgcu:7808: tatra gṛhapa iti mahādevābhidhānaṃ manyate gṛhān pātīti /
GV06apastgcu:7812: tasmādanena mantreṇa devyai dātavyaṃ tasyā evaudanāt /
GV06apastgcu:7818: deśottarābhyaḥ “yā ākhyātā” ityasminnuttare mantre pratītā uttarā devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7819: tābhyo dhaśa parmāni tenaiva mantreṇa devasyaivaudanāt //4//
GV06apastgcu:7820: uttareṇa yajuṣā'svasti naḥ pūrṇamukha'ityanena agnimīśānaṃ vo pariṣṭhate /
GV06apastgcu:7824: tato yathāsvamodanebhya eva yājñiyeṣuparṇānyuttaraiḥ'gṛhapopaspṛśa'ityādibhissaptabhirdadātīti sāmānyena vidhāya viśinaṣṭiekaikenamantreṇadve dveparṇe iti /
GV06apastgcu:7827: tābhyo daśa parṇāni dakṣiṇasyāṃ kuṭyāṃ devasyaivaudanādavadāya dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:7829: uttarasmin mantre 'yā ākyātā yāścānākhyātā'iti guṇadvayavatyastā uttarā devasenāḥ //5//
GV06apastgcu:7832: pūrvavaduttarairmantraiḥ 'dvārāpospṛśe'tyādibhiḥ caturbhiḥ parmāni deyānipūrvavadekaikena dve dve ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7838: pūrva yathā 'gṛhapopaspṛśa'ityādibhirdakṣiṇettarakuṭyormadhye ca svebhya evaudanebhyo dve dve parṇe pratimantraṃ datte,
GV06apastgcu:7852: tasyāmeva tataḥ punarapi tatraiva 'dvārāpopaspṛśa'iti dve parṇe /
GV06apastgcu:7855: atra yadyapi kecana mantrā avyaktaliṅgakā bahuvacanaliṅgakāśca,
GV06apastgcu:7860: ityatra tu sūtrakāravacanāddevasyeśānasya senā devasenā eva devatāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7862: putrādipūjāyāṃ satyāṃ pitrāderahameva pūjita iti mānasapratyakṣodayāt /
GV06apastgcu:7878: odanapiṇḍaṃ saṃvṛtya parṇapuṭe 'vadhāyottareṇa yajuṣā vṛkṣa āsajati // ĀpGs_20.7 //
GV06apastgcu:7880: atha tasyaivodanāt piṇḍaṃ ubhābyāṃ hastābyāṃsaṃvṛtyadṛḍhaṃ kṛtvā parṇaissyūtaiḥ kṛte puṭe 'vadhāyataṃ śikye
GV06apastgcu:7883: atha homabaliśeṣebhyaḥ tribhyaḥ odanebhya upādāyapiṇḍaṃsaṃvartayati sudṛḍhaṃ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:7886: tatastaṃ piṇḍaṃ parmapuṭe 'vadhāyottareṇa yajuṣā 'namo niṣaṅgiṇa iṣudhimate'ityetāvataiva mantrasamāmnāyagatena vṛkṣe kasmiścidāsajati śikye
GV06apastgcu:7891: atra asminkāle rudrān 'namaste rudra manyava“ityādīnekādaśānuvākān japet /
GV06apastgcu:7894: antatastrayo mantrāḥ 'namorudrebhyo ye pṛthivyāṃ yeṣāmannamiṣavaḥ''namo rudrebhyo
GV06apastgcu:7895: ye 'ntarikṣe yeṣāṃ vātaḥ''namo rudrebhyo ye divi yeṣāṃ varṣamiṣavastebhyaḥ'ityādi sarvatrānuṣaṅgaḥ // 7// //)//
GV06apastgcu:7899: ityekādaśānuvākān japet cātussvaryeṇa tatrottamānuvāke 'asmin mahati'ityādiṣvaṣṭasu 'teṣāṃ sahasrayojane'(tai.saṃ.8-5-11)
GV06apastgcu:7901: tathā 'namo rudrebhyo ye pṛthivyāṃ yeṣāmannamiṣavastebhyaḥ''namo rudrebhyo ye 'ntarikṣe
GV06apastgcu:7902: yeṣāṃ vāta iṣavastebhyaḥ'namo rudrebhyo ye divi yeṣāṃ varṣamiṣavastebhyo daśa prācīrdaśa
GV06apastgcu:7910: abhita etamagniṃ gāssthāpayati yathainā dhūmaḥ prāpnuyāt // ĀpGs_20.10 //
GV06apastgcu:7912: etaṃhūyamānamagnimabhito gāḥātmīyāḥ yathāsthāpayatisthāpane enā gāḥ dhūmaḥ prāpnuyāt /
GV06apastgcu:7925: tatra homa kālavacanaṃ prokṣaṇaṃ tasmin kāle //10//
GV06apastgcu:7927: yadyapyasāvupakrame na tiṣṭhet tathāpi ahgatvāt tasyaivāvokṣaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:7939: gavāṃ marge 'nagnau kṣetrasya patiṃ yajate // ĀpGs_20.12 //
GV06apastgcu:7943: gavāmapagacchantīnāṃ kasyāścit goḥ pathi yāgavidhānāt agnau prāpte pratiṣedhaḥ //12//
GV06apastgcu:7955: caturṣu saptasu vā parṇeṣu nāmādeśaṃ dadhāti // ĀpGs_20.14 //
GV06apastgcu:7957: āvāhyārghya datvā gandhādibhirabhyarcya sthālīpākamāsādyābhighārya catvāri sapta vā parṇāni devasya samīpe kṛtvā
GV06apastgcu:7959: tatra pūrveṣu parmadānamantreṣu svāhākārāntatvaniyamāt ihāpi kṣetrasya pataye svāheti parṇadānam /
GV06apastgcu:7961: catvāri sapta vā parmāni bhūmau sthāpayitvā teṣu kṣaitrapatyāt sthālīpākādodanamādāyanāmadeśaṃnāma caturthyantamādiśya 'kṣetrasya pataye tvāṃ
GV06apastgcu:7966: atra tu na sahaudanāni parmāni deyāni;
GV06apastgcu:7971: pāko bālastadvat gamanaśīlo 'yaṃ devaḥ tasmācchīghraṃ yajetetyarthaḥ //15//
GV06apastgcu:7972: ayaṃ caudanadānātmako yāgaḥ kṣipramāvāhanānantaramudakameva pradāya kartavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:7975: etaduktaṃ bhavati-anityadarsanatvāt kṣetrasya pateḥ śagrimeva balirdeya iti /
GV06apastgcu:7993: kṣaitrapatyaṃ prāśnanti ye sanābhayo bhavanti // ĀpGs_20.18 //
GV06apastgcu:7996: sanābhaya ityeva siddheye bhavanti iti vacanaṃ dauhitrādīnāmapi sambandhināṃ pratigrahārtham //18//
GV06apastgcu:8000: eṣāṃ yajamānakulajātānāṃ yathākuladhrbaḥtathā vā prāśanam-yadi putrāṇāmeva,
GV06apastgcu:8006: ityanākulāyāṃ haradattamiśraviracitāyāṃ gṛhyavṛttau viṃśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ saptamaśca paṭalaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:8007: yadyeṣāmanuṣṭhātṝṇāṃ asapiṇḍakartṛkaprāśanamapi kuladharmastarhi tathā vā syāt //19//
GV06apastgcu:8016: punarapi pākayajñāntaraṃ puruṣatrayasampradānakaṃ tādṛśānāmaṣṭakādīnāṃ prakṛtibhūtaṃ māsiśrāddhasaṃjñikaṃ pitryaṃ karmopadiśyate--
GV06apastgcu:8021: māsiśrāddhaṃnāma pitryaṃ karma māsi māsi kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:8024: niti ca te sarve yathopadeśaṃyathā tatropadiṣṭāḥ tathaiva māsi māsi pratyetavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8025: yadyapi te viśeṣāḥ tasmādeva vacanāt siddhāḥ tathāpi tasya karmaṇaḥ prayogavidhānamita uttaraṃ kriyata iti jñāpanārthamidaṃ vacanam /
GV06apastgcu:8026: anyathā jñāpayeta śucīn mantravataḥ ityādi kasmin karmaṇi vidhīyata iti /
GV06apastgcu:8029: tena pūrvasmin pakṣe pañcadaśyāmakṛtaśrāddhasyāparasmin pakṣe prathamādiṣu sarvāsu tithiṣu kriyābhavati tattatkā-masya //1//
GV06apastgcu:8038: kecit-yasyāṃ tithau prathamamupakramastasyāmevottare prayoga iti niyamo nāsti;
GV06apastgcu:8039: kunti pūrṇe 'pi māse aparapakṣa eva yathopadeśaṃ tithyantare 'pi nityaḥ kāmyaśca prayoga iti //1//
GV06apastgcu:8052: anādye āmaśrāddhe durbhikṣe vā kule ekamapi bhojaye- dityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8053: yadyapi strībhyo 'pi piṇḍadānaṃ dṛśyate tathāpi brāhmaṇabhojanamiha tabhyo na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8075: nanu-sāmayācārikeṣveva brahmaṇānāṃ mantravattvaṃ yonigotramantrāsambandhatvaṃ va siddham;
GV06apastgcu:8077: ucyate-nitye māsiśrāddhe gṛhyoktaguṇānapi bhojayet nāvaśyaṃ dharmoktān brahmavidontevāsyasambandhānityevamartham /
GV06apastgcu:8081: tataśca pitrādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ pratyakaṃ trīn pañca vā na punassaptādīn,
GV06apastgcu:8096: aṣṭakāsu ca vṛddhau ca gayāyāṃ ca mṛte 'hani /
GV06apastgcu:8099: iha ca sūtrakārabhāṣyakārābyāmanuktamapi viśvadevārtha yugmānāṃ bhojanaṃ kartavyam 'dvau daive'iti manuyājñavaklyābhyāmuktatvāt,
GV06apastgcu:8108: aṅgabhūtasya tu vaiśvadevasya yadyekaṃ bhojayecchrāddhe daivaṃ tatra kathaṃ bhavet /
GV06apastgcu:8109: annaṃ pātre samuddhṛtya sarvasya prakṛtasya ca //
GV06apastgcu:8121: iti yājñavalkyaviṣṇusmṛtyoḥ viṣṇupurāṇe ca vidhidarśanāt mātāmahaśrāddhamapi nityamevāvagamyate /
GV06apastgcu:8123: ucyate-naiva tatrāpi smṛtyantareṣu pitryavatsarvasyaiva jīvato dvijasyāvaśyaṃ mātāmahaśrāddhamapi niyamena kartavyamiti vidhitsitam / kṛte
GV06apastgcu:8126: kasya tarhi niyamena kartavyamiti vidhiriti cet;
GV06apastgcu:8127: yaḥ putrikākṛtāyā āsurādivivāho- ḍhāyā vā putro mātāmahena saha mātussāpiṇḍyaṃ karoti,
GV06apastgcu:8132: atha vā yo dauhitro 'putrasya mātāmahasyākhilārtahārī tasyaitacchrāddhaṃ niyatam /
GV06apastgcu:8142: tasmāt sarvasya dhauhitrasya pitryavat kartavyameveti niyamābhāvatsūtrakārabhāṣyakārau na brūtaḥ // 2 //
GV06apastgcu:8173: atra prathamadvitīyayormantrayoramiṣmā ityasya sthāne viṣṇuśarmaṇa iti caturthyā piturnāmagrahaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:8180: ata eva prakṛtau darśapūrṇamāsayoranekapatnīkasyāpi 'patnī sannahya'ityekavacanenaiva sampraiṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8184: jīvapitrādikastu pitrādeḥ pitrādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ mṛtānāṃ nāmāni gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:8189: tattatpratiyopinirdeśapūrvakaḥ 'pituḥ pitā vṛhktām'pituḥ pitāmaho vṛṅktām'ityādikaḥ prayogaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8197: maivam; pitā yasya tu vṛttassyājjīveccāpi pitāmahaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8201: tataśca vyutkramācceti niṣedhaḥ pākṣika iti niścayādadhikāro 'pi pākṣiko 'vigamyate //3//
GV06apastgcu:8208: atrāhuḥ māsiśrāddhe brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ pradhānakarmatadaṅgamagnau karaṇaṃ piṇḍaśca /
GV06apastgcu:8213: homasya bhojanāṅgatvāt piṇḍapitṛyajñe tu homasya pradhānatvāditi /
GV06apastgcu:8214: anye tu yebhya eva pitā dadhyāt tebhya eva putro 'pītyāhuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8215: apara āha trīṇi śrāddhe pradhānāni-agnau karaṇaṃ bhojanaṃ piṇḍadānamiti tenā 'homāt kṛtvā virame'dityasyāpi vidherayaṃ viṣaya iti
GV06apastgcu:8222: prayogaḥ-pūrvadyurnivedanaṃ sāyaṃ bhojanānantaraṃ śvaḥ śrāddhaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GV06apastgcu:8224: (vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ pūrvedyuḥ sāyaṃ bhojanaṃ na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8226: athāparedyuḥ prātaḥ dvatīyaṃ nivedanam-adya kriyata iti /
GV06apastgcu:8229: pūrva viśvebhyo devebhyo yajñopavītī yugmān dvau caturo vā 'māsi śrāddhe viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kartavya'iti /
GV06apastgcu:8234: pitṛbhya udaṅmukhāḥ dviguṇabhugneṣu dakṣiṇāgreṣu yuvānaḥ pitre /
GV06apastgcu:8238: śucaudeśe dakṣiṇāpravaṇe śrāddhāgāraṃ sarvataḥ pariśritamudagavādvāraṃ tasya pūrvottare deśe agniraupāsanaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8240: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ udaṅmukhāḥ pitrārthāḥ paścāt prāṅmukhāḥ devārthāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8241: tasminneva sthaṇḍile yathāvakāśaṃ triṣu pātreṣu pitṛbhya udakānyarghyāṇi dakṣiṇāpavargāṇi tilavanti /
GV06apastgcu:8243: tāni puṣpairavakīryadarbheṣu sādayitvā darbhaiḥ pracchādya āsanagatānāṃ barāhmaṇānāṃ hasteṣu
GV06apastgcu:8244: svasmātsvasmāt udapātrāt pātrāntaremāpa ādāya 'visve devā idaṃ vor'ghya';
GV06apastgcu:8249: purastādupariṣṭācca śuddhodakam tato gandhādibhiḥ vāsobhiśca dvijānabhyarcya /
GV06apastgcu:8252: tato brāhmaṇārtha saṃskṛtādannāduddhṛtyāpareṇāgniṃ bahirṣi pratiṣṭhāpyābhighāryāgnerupasamādhānādyajyabhāgānte trayodaśa pradhānāhutīrjuhoti
GV06apastgcu:8259: evaṃ pradhānāhutīrhutvā sauviṣṭakṛtaṃ hutvā jayādi pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:8262: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvā praṇītāśca vimucya tatassarvamannaṃ hoṣyaṃ ca samupanidhāya hutaśeṣaṃ ca tasman utsṛjya tamuttairastribhiḥ abhimṛśet
GV06apastgcu:8266: atha brāhmaṇabhojanārthahaviṣyamahaviṣayaṃ ca sarvamannaṃ uttaraiḥ 'eṣa te tata madhumān'ityetaistribhirmantraiḥ abhimṛśet /
GV06apastgcu:8271: atha vā bhojanapātreṣu kḷptānodanaviśeṣān pratipuruṣaṃ pṛthagabhimṛśet yathāliṅgam /
GV06apastgcu:8272: tatra yāvantaḥ pitrarthe bhojayante tāvatsu prathamasya mantrasyāvṛttiḥ 'evamuttarayoḥ- /
GV06apastgcu:8274: athavā -pitrādyarthebhyo brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pratirūrūṣaṃ bhojanapātreṣu kḷptān prakaspitān bhojayapadārthān ekaikena mantreṇa yathāliṅga mabhimṛśet
GV06apastgcu:8275: atrāpi pitrāderekaikasya brāhmaṇabahutve yugapadabhimarśanāsambhave ca tattanmantrāvṛttiḥ //7//
GV06apastgcu:8279: uttareṇa yajuṣā 'pṛthivī te pātra'mityanena brāhmaṇaiḥ sparśayitvā bhojayediti śeṣaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8281: 'maiṣāṃ kṣeṣṭhāḥ'iti bahutvaṃ dṛśyate tathāpi pratipuruṣaṃ mantrāvṛttiḥ uparavamantravat ,
GV06apastgcu:8290: rakṣoghnān pitryān vaiṣṇavyānanyāṃśca pavitrān dharmyān mantrān dharmaśāstra mitihāsapurāṇāṃścābhiśrāvayati /
GV06apastgcu:8291: tatastṛptāni jñātvā madhumatīḥ śrāvayet akṣannamīmadanteti ca /
GV06apastgcu:8292: atha bhūmāvannaṃ vikarati-'ye agnidagdhā ye 'nagnigdhā ye vā jātāḥ kule mama /
GV06apastgcu:8293: bhūmau dattena piṇaḍena tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gati'miti /
GV06apastgcu:8294: athācānteṣu punarapo datvā 'svadita'miti pitrartān vācayati 'rocata'iti vāśvadevārtān /
GV06apastgcu:8295: tato yathāśraddhaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ datvā sarvebhyo 'nnaśeṣebhyaḥ piṇḍārtha prāśanārthañcoddhṛtya śeṣaṃ nivedayot-annaśeṣaiḥ kiṃ kriyatāṃ iti /
GV06apastgcu:8298: śraddhā ca no mā vyapagāt bahudeyaṃ ca no 'stu'; //
GV06apastgcu:8305: tatra sarvakarmaṇāṃ vaiśvadeveṣu pūrva pravṛttiḥ paścāt pitryeṣu /
GV06apastgcu:8312: atra ca mantre yadyapi brāhmaṇānāmiti bahuvacanaṃ tatāpi yugapat sparsāyitumaśakyatvāt pratipūruṣaṃ mantrāvṛttiḥ,
GV06apastgcu:8320: bhuktavato 'nuvrajya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya dvaidhaṃ dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān saṃstīrya teṣūttarairapo
GV06apastgcu:8322: triḥprasavyaṃ pariṣicya nyubjya pātrāṇyuttaraṃ yajuranavānaṃ tryavarārghyamāvartayitvā
GV06apastgcu:8323: prokṣyapātrāṇi dvandvamabhyudāhṛtya sarvatassamavadāyottareṇa yajuṣā śeṣasya grāsavarārghya
GV06apastgcu:8326: tatastānbhuktavato 'nuvrajya pradīkṣaṇīkṛtyapratyāvṛtya prācīnāvītī piṇḍapradānadeśe dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān
GV06apastgcu:8337: piṇḍaṃ pūrvavat dadāti piṇḍapitṛyajñe yat piṇḍadānaṃ tadityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8341: evamapo datvā tata uttarairmantraiḥ 'etatte tatāsā'vityādibhisteṣu darbheṣūbhayeṣudakṣiṇāpavargān piṇḍān dadāti yathāliṅgaṃ pitṛbhyaśca mātṛbhyaśca
GV06apastgcu:8343: atrāpi pūrvavadityasya sabandhāt savyaṃ jānvācyāvācīnapāṇirityādi vidhānamihāpi bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8347: etadvāṃ mātarāvasau yāśca yuvāmanu'ityādidakṣiṇāpavargānityucyate-ubhayeṣāṃ piṇḍānāṃ pṛthak dakṣiṇāpavargatā yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:8348: tena pitṛpiṇḍānāṃ dakṣiṇato mātṛpiṇḍā na bhavanti /
GV06apastgcu:8350: evaṃ piṇḍān datvā pūrvavaduttarairapo dadāti pitṛbhyaśca mātṛbhyaśca /
GV06apastgcu:8351: mantrasamāmnāye'mārjantāṃ mama pitara ityete'iti mantrāṇāṃ punarādiṣṭatvāt 'uttarairapo
GV06apastgcu:8352: datvā'ityeva siddhe pūrvavadityatidśaḥ piṇḍapitṛyajñapratyavamarśanārthaḥ -piṇḍeṣu codakāñjaliṣu ca /
GV06apastgcu:8353: tata uttarairmantraiḥ tānupatiṣṭhate yathāliṅgaṃ 'ye ca vo 'treti pitṝn,
GV06apastgcu:8360: tata uttarayarcā 'putrān pautrānityetayātriḥ prasavyamudapātreṇa pimḍān pariṣiñcati . ubhayāstaparyantviti lṅgāt piṇḍānāṃ sahapariṣecanam /
GV06apastgcu:8362: prasavyavacanamanuvādaḥ prasavyaṃ triguṇībhūtamekameva pariṣecanaṃ santataṃ yathā syāt,
GV06apastgcu:8364: evaṃ pariṣicya tataḥ pātrāṇi yānyatra prakṛtāni trīṇyarghyapātrāṇi pariṣecanapātrāmudakumbhaḥ
GV06apastgcu:8365: yasmin piṇḍārthamannamuddhṛtaṃ tacceti tāninyubjyanyāñci kṛtvā tata uttaraṃ yajuḥ
GV06apastgcu:8374: evamabhyudāhṛtya śeṣasyānnasyagrāsavarārghya grāso 'varārdhyo avamā mātrā yasya tatgrāsavarārdhyamchāndaso hrasvaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8375: tatprāśnīyāt uttareṇa yajuṣā'prāṇe niviṣṭo 'mṛtaṃ juhomi'ityanenasarvatassarvabhyaḥ śrāddhaśeṣebhya annaśeṣebhya ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8389: atha pratyetya prācīnāvītī piṇḍadānadeśe dakṣiṇāgrān darbhān,
GV06apastgcu:8394: tatasteṣu darbeṣūttaraiḥ 'mārjayantāṃ mama mātaraḥ'ityādibhiśca yathārha dakṣiṇāpavargamapo
GV06apastgcu:8398: atra pūrveṣu triṣu mantreṣvasāvi- tyasya sthāne pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahānāṃ nāmāni sambuddyā yathākramaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GV06apastgcu:8402: piṇḍadāna eva dakṣiṇāpavargaḥ'dvaidhaṃ darbāstaraṇeṣu tu paścimāpavarga iti jñāpanārtham,
GV06apastgcu:8406: padamapakṛṣya triṣvapi sūtreṣu codyamānaṃ pūrvavat piṇḍapitṛyajñavatkartavyamiti vyācakṣate /
GV06apastgcu:8414: athottaraiḥ 'ye ca vo 'tra'ityādibhiṣṣarḍrbhimantrairyathā kramaṃ yathāliṅgaṃ pitṝn tristrirupatiṣṭhate /
GV06apastgcu:8417: tatra prathamo mantro 'ye ca vo 'tra'ityādiḥ 'tāśca vahantām'ityantaḥ ubhayoṣāmupasthānārthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8423: sāmānyavidhisiddhasya prasavyasyeha punarvacanaṃ pūrvatra“pradakṣiṇīkṛtya“iti vacanādihāpi prādakṣiṇyaṃ syāditi śaṅkānirāsārtham /
GV06apastgcu:8428: tatauttaraṃ yajuḥ'tṛpyata tṛpyata tṛpyata'ityāmnānata evaṃ trirabhyastam /
GV06apastgcu:8430: tryavarārdhya trirabhyāvṛttiravarā mātrā yasyāvartanasya tatttryavarārdhyam yathā bhavati tathāvartayati /
GV06apastgcu:8436: teṣāṃ pātrāṇāṃ niriṣṭikadoṣo nāstīti bhāvaḥ athaśeṣasyānnasyagrāsavarārdhya grāsāvarārdhyam /
GV06apastgcu:8441: idaṃ ca prāśanaṃ bhojanecchāyāmasatyāmapi grāsavarārdhyamavaśyaṃ prāśyaṃ;
GV06apastgcu:8445: athātra sūtrāṇāmapūrṇatvādanyatassiddhānapi padārthānupasaṃhṛtya yathāpratibhāsaṃ prayoga utyate-pūrvedyussāyamaupāsanahomaṃ hutvā prācīnāvītī
GV06apastgcu:8446: kṛtaprāṇāyāmaḥ śvo māsiśrāddhaṃ kartāsmīti saṅkalpya śucitvādiguṇasampannebhyaḥ śvitrādidoṣavarjitebhyaḥ kṛtasāyamāhnikebhyo brāhmaṇebhyo nivedayet
GV06apastgcu:8447: tatra prathamaṃ yajñopavītī bhūtvā 'śvo māsiśrāddhaṃ bhavitā,
GV06apastgcu:8448: tatra bhavadbhirviśvadevārthe kṣaṇaḥ kartavyaḥ'iti viśvadevārthebhyo brāhmaṇebhyo nivedayet /
GV06apastgcu:8452: ekabrahmaṇapakṣe tu 'pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahārthe kṣaṇaḥ kartavyaḥ'iti mātāmahaśrāddhakārī cet,
GV06apastgcu:8455: ca yajñopavītī tathā viśvadevārtheṣu sarveṣu padārtheṣu ca pradakṣiṇānuvrajanayośca yajñopavītameva /
GV06apastgcu:8458: kartuścātra saṅkalpādārabhya āsamāpterbrahmacaryādivratacaryā anaśanaṃ ca bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8460: athāparedyuḥ prātastān brāhmaṇān gṛhamānīya ācāntānāsaneṣūpaveśya pūrvavaddvitāyamāmantraṇam /
GV06apastgcu:8466: tatassvayaṃ ca snāto brāhmaṇa bhojanārthādannādanyenānnena vaiśvadevaṃ pañcamahāyajñāṃśca kuryāt /
GV06apastgcu:8469: tatra viśvadevārthān prāṅmukhān prākkūleṣu darbheṣu pitrādyarthānudaṅmukhān dviguṇabhugneṣu dakṣiṇāgreṣu darbheṣu /
GV06apastgcu:8470: śrāddhāgāraṃ ca sucau deśe dakṣiṇāpravaṇe sarvataḥ pariśritamudagdvāraṃ ca bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:8475: sthaṇḍileṣu yathāvakāśaṃ pitrādibhyasriṣu pātreṣu ekasmin vā śāstrāntaroktavidhinārghyārthamudakagrahaṇam /
GV06apastgcu:8478: darbheṣu sādayitvā darbhaiḥ pracchādyāthāsanagatānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ hasteṣu svasmātsvasmādudapātrātpātrāntareṇāpa
GV06apastgcu:8479: ādāya 'viśva devāḥ idaṃ vo arghya''pitṛpitāmahaprapitāmahāidaṃ vo arghya 'iti vārghyāṇi dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:8490: udhīcyavṛttirityasya samāsasya udhīcyānāṃ vṛttirudīcyeśu vṛttirityubhayathāpi vigrahābhyupagamācca /
GV06apastgcu:8491: atha brāhmaṇabhojanārthādannāt haviṣyamodanāpūpādikaṃ ekasmin pātre samuddhṛtya ahaviṣyaṃ
GV06apastgcu:8492: kṣārādisaṃsṛṣṭamanyasmin pātre uddhṛtyātha haviṣyaṃ pratiṣṭhatamabhighār agnerupasamādhānādyagnimukhāntaṃ
GV06apastgcu:8493: kṛtvā 'yanme mātā'ityādibhistrayodaśa pradhānāhutīrhutvā sviṣṭakṛtaṃ ca tata udīcīnamuṣṇaṃ
GV06apastgcu:8494: bhasmāpohya ahaviṣyaṃ svāhākāreṇa hutvātha 'lepayoḥ'ityādi tantraśeṣaṃ samāpya tataḥ
GV06apastgcu:8496: kṛtvā triṣvapi cāmantraṇeṣu 'oṃ tathā'iti prativacanaṃ brāhmaṇānām /
GV06apastgcu:8499: apare kramāntaramāhuḥ- vaiśvadevapañcamahāyajñānantaraṃ aparāhṇe prācīnāvītī agnerupasamādhānādi karoti /
GV06apastgcu:8506: ihāpi pakṣe svadhāninayanaṃ pākṣikameva anye tu- māsiśrāddhe śāstrāntarānusārānmantravanniyamavadbhojanadeśasaṃskāraṃ,
GV06apastgcu:8509: atra ca padārtheṣu krame ca śiṣṭācārādeva nirṇayaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:8522: bhuñjaneṣu ca parāṅāvṛttya rākṣodhnān pitryān vaiṣṇavānanyāṃśca (kha.ga.pavitrān)
GV06apastgcu:8528: ye agnidagdhā ye 'nagnidagdhā ye vā jātāḥ kule mama /
GV06apastgcu:8529: bhūmau dattena piṇḍena tṛptā yāntu parāṃ gatim //
GV06apastgcu:8533: tato yathāśakti dakṣiṇāṃ datvātha sarvebhyo 'nnaseṣebhyaḥ piṇḍārtha prāśanārtha codghṛtya (annaśeṣaiḥ)
GV06apastgcu:8540: śraddhā ca no mā vyapagādbahu deyaṃ ca no 'stu //
GV06apastgcu:8544: śraddhā ca vo mā vyagamadbahu deyaṃ ca vo 'stu //
GV06apastgcu:8546: atha, annaṃ ca no bahu bhavedatithīṃśca labhemahi /
GV06apastgcu:8547: yācitāraśca nassantu mā ca yāciṣma kañcana //
GV06apastgcu:8550: yācitāraśca vassantu mā ca yācadhvaṃ vañcana /
GV06apastgcu:8561: atra cedaṃ vaktavyam -brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ homaḥ piṇḍadānaṃ ca trīṇyapi māsiśrāddhe pradhānāni /
GV06apastgcu:8570: āmaśrāddhaṃ dvijaiḥ kārya śūdraḥ kuryātsadaiva hi //
GV06apastgcu:8578: yadyaddadāti viprabhyaḥ śṛtaṃ vā yadi vāśṛtam /
GV06apastgcu:8581: atra ṣaṭtriṃśanmatamāmaśrāddhaṃ yadā kūryāt piṇḍadānaṃ kathaṃ bhavet /
GV06apastgcu:8595: atyantāpadi tu 'api ha vā hiraṇyena pradānamātraṃ',
GV06apastgcu:8606: evaṃ prakṛtibhūtaṃ māsiśrāddhaṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ tadvikṛtibhūtaṃ pratisaṃvatsaramanuṣṭheyaṃ aṣṭakākhyaṃ pākayajñāntaraṃ vyākhyāsyan,
GV06apastgcu:8610: yā māghyāḥ paurṇamāsyā uparidvyahyaṣṭakā tasyāmaṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā sampadyate tāmekāṣṭaketyācakṣate // ĀpGs_21.10 //
GV06apastgcu:8613: athāṣṭakā nāma pākayajñaḥ pitryaḥ saṃvatsare saṃvatsare kartavyaḥ sa upadiśyate /
GV06apastgcu:8614: tasya kālavidhirayaṃ yā mādhī tasyāupariṣṭādvyāṣṭakākṛṣṇapakṣaḥ tasyāṃ yā aṣṭamītāmekāṣṭakā
GV06apastgcu:8615: ityācakṣatesā yadijyeṣṭhayā sampadyatesaṅgacchate tāmapyekāṣṭaketyācakṣate iti dvāvimau yogau /
GV06apastgcu:8616: anyathā paurṇamāsyā upariṣṭādaṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā sampadyate tāmekāṣṭaketyācakṣata ityetāvatā siddham /
GV06apastgcu:8620: yadā dvayorahnoraṣṭamī tadā jyeṣṭhāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kriyā yathā syādidi //10//
GV06apastgcu:8621: mādhyāḥmāghamāsasya sambandhinyāḥpaurṇamāsyāḥ upasiṣṭādūrdhva yā vyaṣṭakākṛṣṇapakṣa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8626: yathā gavāmayanadīkṣā yathā ca dīrghasatreṣu vijñānārthamapūpena kakṣasyopoṣaṇaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:8629: atrāyamabhiprāyaḥ- yadyapi māghamāsasya sarvā kṛṣṇapakṣāṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā na sampadyate;
GV06apastgcu:8637: tatra yā aṣṭamī jyeṣṭhayā sampadyate tasyāmeva nāsa mpannāyāmityevamabhiprāya iti //10//
GV06apastgcu:8645: sāyaṃ saptamyāmastamite āditye apūpahaviṣkaṃ karma kartavyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8657: somayāgasyāgnīṣomīyapaśuyāgavattasyā aṣṭakāyā aṅgabhūtaṃ karma pūrvedyussaptamyāssāyaṅkāle kartavyamiti
GV06apastgcu:8659: na tviha tasyā aṣṭakāyā iti sambandhaḥ navamyāṃ vapāhomādi pradhānaprasaṅgāt /
GV06apastgcu:8677: etacca pitryasyāṅgamapi karma svayaṃ pitryaṃ na bhavati,
GV06apastgcu:8682: puroḍāśa iti ca prasiddha ākṛtiviśeṣaḥ tena laukikena prakāreṇa pāka aupāsanaṃ eva //13//
GV06apastgcu:8688: pratiṣṭhitābhidhāraṇānte kṛte agnerupasamādhājyabhāgāntaṃ kṛtvā pārvaṇavadavadānakalpenāpūpāduttarayarcā añjalinā juhoti 'yāṃ janāḥ pratinandantī'tyetayā
GV06apastgcu:8692: anyathā yathā māsiśrāddhe 'ṣṭakāyāṃ ca yatnābhāve 'pi tantraṃ pravartate,
GV06apastgcu:8695: pārvaṇavadvacanaṃ añjalihomānāmadharmagrāhakatvāt avadānakalpaprāptyartha añjalināpi juhvat pārvaṇavadavadānakalpena juhotīti /
GV06apastgcu:8702: nāñjalinā;vikṛtau codyamāno dharmaḥ pradhānārtho bhavatīti nyāyāt /
GV06apastgcu:8708: iti tūṣṇīkatvamādhānāṅgabhūtasya naiyamikāgnihotravikṛteḥ pradhānasyaiva dharmaḥ na tadaṅgānāmapīti /
GV06apastgcu:8709: aupakāryasya cauṣadhihavuṣkatvādeva siddhasya tantrasya punarvacanaṃ etatsnāpannadadhihome 'pi prāptyarthamityuktameva //1// thā
GV06apastgcu:8714: añjalinā juhotītyubhayaṃ viśeṣaḥ sviṣṭakṛti na bhavatītiyarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8715: tena sviṣṭakṛtamavadānakalpena darvyā hutvā samidhamekaviṃśatimādhāya jayādi pratipadyate //2//
GV06apastgcu:8716: 'tena sarpiṣmatā brāhmaṇa'mityayekasya bhakṣaṇe prāpte 'ṣṭābhya ipahāro vidhāyate /
GV06apastgcu:8717: tatra ye brāhmaṇāḥ śvobhūte bhoktāraḥ tebhyo nivedyopavasati // 3 //
GV06apastgcu:8719: taṃ śeṣaṃ sarpiṣmantamaṣṭadhā kṛtvā aṣṭaphyo brahmaṇebhyaiti vidhātum /
GV06apastgcu:8724: jayādi pratipadyata iti ca siddhamiti teṣāṃ tamaṣṭadhetyatra tamapūpamiti vyavahitasya parāmarśo bhavet /
GV06apastgcu:8728: śvobhūte darbheṇa gāmupākaroti pitṛbhyastvā juṣṭāmupākaromīti // ĀpGs_22.3 //
GV06apastgcu:8737: pitryeṣu yatnamantareṇāpi tantraṃ pravartate iti purastāduktam /
GV06apastgcu:8738: tata ājyabhāgānte tantre kṛte upākaraṇādeḥ pravṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8747: tūṣṇīṃ pañcājyāhutīrhutvā tasyai vapāṃ śrapayitvopastīrṇābhighāritāṃ madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇenottarayā juhoti // ĀpGs_22.4 //
GV06apastgcu:8749: tūṣṇīmityanucyamāne sampradānābhāve homānivṛtteḥ devatākalpanāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ yā aitāḥ pāśubandhikyaḥ paśvāhuyaḥ
GV06apastgcu:8750: 'upākṛtya pañca juhotī'ti vihitāḥ tā etā iti vijñāyeta /
GV06apastgcu:8752: evaṃ brūvan etaddarśayati śrautasya paśerāvṛtāṣasyāpi paśossaṃskāra iti /
GV06apastgcu:8753: tena 'purastāt pratyañcaṃ tiṣṭavta'mityevamādayo viśeṣā ihāpi bhavanti /
GV06apastgcu:8754: tasyā iti vacanaṃ tasyā vapāyā evātra codito viśeṣo yathāsyāt śrapaṇādi,
GV06apastgcu:8762: sarvatra pradhānāhutiṣu tāntrikasya haviṣassadharmakasyānekatve sati viśeṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate-sthālīpākādannādājyāhutiritu,
GV06apastgcu:8768: evaṃ pañcājyāhutīrhutvā tūṣṇīṃ saṃjñapya vapāñca vapāśrapaṇībhyāṃ tūṣṇīmuddhṛtya
GV06apastgcu:8769: aupāsane śrapayitvābhighārya barhiṣi pratiṣṭhāpya punarabhighārya tatastāmupastīrṇābhighāritāṃ
GV06apastgcu:8770: madhyamenāntamena vā palāśaparṇena juhoti uttarayarcā 'vaha vapā'mityetayā /
GV06apastgcu:8780: (hutāyāṃ vapāyāṃ paśorviśasanaṃ kārayitvā anvaṣṭakārtha ...gṛheṣu śrapayitvā anyāni
GV06apastgcu:8781: ca haviṣyaudanādīni tānyabhighārya barhiṣi pratiṣṭhāpya punarabhighārya darvyā juhotyavadānakalpena /
GV06apastgcu:8798: māṃsamiśra odano māṃsaudanaḥ taṃ uttarābhiḥ 'yāṃ janāḥ pratinandanti'ityādibhissaptabhirjuhoti /
GV06apastgcu:8810: piṣṭena kṛtamannaṃ tasya payasi śrapaṇamuttarayarcā 'ukthyaśce'tyetayā juhoti //7//
GV06apastgcu:8811: piṣṭena kṛtamannaṃ piṣṭānnaṃ payasi śṛtaṃ prasiddham /
GV06apastgcu:8827: sviṣṭakṛtprabhṛti piṇḍanidhānāntaṃ karma kṛtsnaṃ māsiśrāddhavadihāpi kartavyamityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8835: sviṣṭakṛdādi tantraśeṣaṃ sarvābhimarśanādi ca pradakṣiṇīkṛtyetyevamantaṃ brāhmaṇabhojanaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:8839: tatra ca māṃsaudanāt piṣṭānnācca sviṣṭakṛte sahāvadānamiti bhedaḥ //8//
GV06apastgcu:8844: tatra kaḥ prasaṅgo yadanvaṣṭakāyāṃ na syāt /
GV06apastgcu:8845: evaṃ tarhi etat jñāpayati - vikalpo 'tra vidhirayam /
GV06apastgcu:8846: ataḥ kṛtsnasya karmaṇo viṣayo bhavati sāpūpasya sānvaṣṭakasyeti /
GV06apastgcu:8847: tena dadhyañjaliḥ kṛtsnaikāṣṭakākaraṇāt vikalpyate sāpūpena sānvaṣṭakeneti kecit /
GV06apastgcu:8848: vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ - aṣṭakāyāmakṛtāyāṃ bhojanamasya na bhavatītyetadarthameva vacanamanvaṣṭakāyāṃ yat piṇḍadānaṃ tadiha .... nāsmin karmaṇi pṛthak kartavyamiti //10//
GV06apastgcu:8849: yā śvobhūto 'nvaṣṭaketi vidhāsyate tasyāmanvaṣṭakāyāmeva piṇḍanidhānaṃ piṇḍapradānaṃ nāṣṭakāyāmityeke ācāryā upadiśanti /
GV06apastgcu:8850: kecit - na piṇḍanidhānameke iti vaktavye anvaṣṭakāyāmevaika ityevaṃ vacanametat jñāpayati
GV06apastgcu:8851: - vikalpo 'tra vidhīyamānaḥ kṛtsnasya karmaṇaḥ sāpūpahomasya sānvaṣṭakasya viṣaye bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:8855: na punastadasmin pradeśe pṛthak kartavyamiti vacanavyaktyāsya karmaṇo 'samāptatvasūcanam /
GV06apastgcu:8861: 'anvaṣṭakāyāmevaika'ityeṣo 'nvaṣṭakāyāmeva piṇḍanidhānaṃ nāṣṭakāyāmiti phalābhiprāyo vyapadeśa iti mantavyam //
GV06apastgcu:8862: atha yajñopavītaprācīnavītayorvivekaḥ - aupakārye ca māṃsaudanahomeṣu cāditaścaturṣu,
GV06apastgcu:8871: tena yadyapi 'māṃsaudanamuttarābhiḥ'ityatra havirupasarjanībhūtamāṃsābhāve 'pi kevalaudanahaviṣkahomaiḥ pradhānāntarasahitaiḥ aṣṭakādhikārasiddherupapattiḥ;
GV06apastgcu:8873: maivam, pramāṇabalena kasmiṃścit pradhāne niṣiddhe 'pi pradhānāntaraireva viṣayapratyabhijñānādadhikārasiddherupapannatvāt /
GV06apastgcu:8887: api vātyantalaghurapi dadhihomapakṣaḥ kaliyuge vyavasthito draṣṭavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8890: athaitadaparaṃ dadhna evāñjalinā juhoti yayāpūpam // ĀpGs_22.10 //
GV06apastgcu:8893: athānukalpaḥ yayā ṛcā juhoti 'yāṃ janā'ityetayā tayā dadhnaḥ pūrṇenāñjalinā juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:8894: tantrasya vidhānāt añjalinā homatvācca apūrvo dadhyañjaliḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8896: (2 ka,kha, purastāttantramupariṣṭāttantraṃ ca kṛtsnaṃ na bhavati) /
GV06apastgcu:8900: prātarhomānantaraṃ aupāsanamupasamādhāya samparistīrya tūṣṇīṃ samantaṃ pariṣicya dadhnāñjaliṃ pūrayitvā 'yāṃ janā'iti juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:8903: anye tu purastāttantraṃ sviṣṭakṛccecchanti, na jayādīn /
GV06apastgcu:8914: evaṃ tarhyatra vacanaṃ vyajyate yajjuhoti taddadhna evāñjalineti /
GV06apastgcu:8917: yadi tasyā api pratyāmnāyaḥ syāt tāmabhidhāyāyamanukalpo vaktavyassyāditi) /
GV06apastgcu:8918: anye tu sāpūpasya sānvaṣṭakasya kṛtsnasyāṣṭakākarmaṇo nivartako dadhyañjaliriti // 10 //
GV06apastgcu:8923: 'yena juhoti tadagnau pratitapya'ityādikaṃ lepāñjanaṃ cānyena kārayitavyam /
GV06apastgcu:8934: tenāsminnapi pakṣe brāhmaṇabhojana piṇḍa pradāna yorāvṛttiḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8935: tasmāt saptamyāṃ rātrau brāhmaṇānnimantryāṣṭabhyāṃ homasthāne dadhihomaḥ,
GV06apastgcu:8939: ata eva yathārtha māṃsaṃ śiṣṭvā śvobhūte 'nvaṣṭakām // ĀpGs_22.11 //
GV06apastgcu:8941: ata evāsyā eva gorekāṣṭakāyāmālabdhāyāṃ māṃsaṃ yasya yathārtha yāvatprayojanaṃ śiṣṭvā śvobhūte navamyāmanvaṣṭakānāma karma kartavyam /
GV06apastgcu:8944: ata eva goraṣṭakāyāmālabdhāyāḥ māṃsaṃ yathārtha yathāprayojanaṃ śiṣṭvā ityetatprathamapakṣaviṣayam //11//
GV06apastgcu:8953: yatraiva tu kārye māsi śrāddhe māṃsaṃ ihāpi tatraiveti /
GV06apastgcu:8956: yadi hyasāvanvaṣṭatāyā api pratyāmnāyaḥ syāt tāmapyabhidhāya vaktavyaṃ syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:8957: ata eva yathārtha māṃsaṃ śiṣṭvā śvobhūte 'nvaṣṭakā tasyā māsi śrāddhena kalpo vyākhyātaḥ iti pūrvatra sambandhaḥ //
GV06apastgcu:8971: sarvasmādannātsakṛtsakṛdavadāya dakṣiṇato bhasmamiśrānaṅgārānnirūhya teṣveva juhuyāt pretāyāmuṣmai yamāya ca svāheti /
GV06apastgcu:8972: pretāyeti vacanaṃ pretasya nāmanirdeśārtham yajñaśarmaṇe yamāya ca svāheti prayogamicchanti /
GV06apastgcu:8974: amuṣmai tṛptirastviti apāṃ pratigrahaṇaṃ visarjanaṃ cā asti tṛptiriti prativacanam /
GV06apastgcu:8990: antyaṃ ca sapiṇḍīkaraṇena saha mṛtāha eva trāpakṣikaṃ ṣāṇmāsikaṃ dvitīyādiṣu samvatsareṣu pratisamvatsaraṃ mṛtāha eva sāmvatsarikamiti ṣoḍaśaitānyekoddiṣṭāni
GV06apastgcu:8991: sāmvatsarike ca kṣetrajajārajayoḥ ekoddiṣṭakalpasya ca vikalpaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:8993: ye navaśrāddhānāṃ samuccayamicchanti teṣāṃ ṣoḍaśaikoddiṣṭānītyeṣāpi prasiddhirdurupapādā /
GV06apastgcu:8996: dvādaśāhena vā bhojyā ekāhe dvādaśāpi vā //
GV06apastgcu:8997: atha sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ samvatsara ekādaśe caturthe tṛtīye vā māsi tripakṣe ardhamāse dvādaśe vāhani upanayanābhyudayaprāptau vā /
GV06apastgcu:8999: pretasyaikoddiṣṭaṃ tasya ye ptrādayaḥ tebhyo māsiśrāddhaṃ mantreṣu ca na kścidvikāraḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9000: yanme mātetyādiṣu yathaiva te pitrā pretena pūrva prayuktāstathāva putreṇāpi prayoktavyāḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9004: tasmādaputrasya pretasya bhāryā yāvajjīvamekoddiṣṭakalpenaiva patye māsiśrāddhaṃ dadāti /
GV06apastgcu:9006: vivāhādūrdhva yadā māsiśrāddhamārabhate tadā pituḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇena sahārabhate /
GV06apastgcu:9008: tatra pitre pretāya pūrvavadbhasmani homaḥ itarebhyo 'nnādājyācca māsiśrāddhavat /
GV06apastgcu:9009: piṇḍadāne-māsiśrāddhavatpiṇḍān datvā tatsamīpe pṛthak stīrṇeṣu darbheṣu pretāya piṇḍaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9010: pūrvavadapo datvā tasyānte arghyārdha pitṛpātreṣu pretapātraṃ prasecayet 'ye samāmā'iti dvābhyāṃ piṇḍaṃ piṇḍeṣu saṃsṛjet /
GV06apastgcu:9014: atra vipratipttiḥ- kecitprapitāmahasya pātraṃ piṇḍaṃ cetareṣu saṃsṛjanti /
GV06apastgcu:9015: pretaśabdena sa evocyate prakarṣeṇa itaḥ preta iti /
GV06apastgcu:9021: āsurādivivāhoḍhā vā tato mātāmahādīnāṃ piṇḍeṣu saṃsargaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9022: tatpiṇḍasyetaratra śvaśtvādi piṇḍena ekācityārūḍhāyāstu bhartṛpiṇḍeneti kecidvyavasthāpayanti /
GV06apastgcu:9025: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śṣya eva vā /
GV06apastgcu:9030: atha nāmdīśrāddham- tatra bodhāyanaḥ -athābhyudayikeṣu pradakṣiṇamupacāro yajñopavītaṃ prāgagrān darbhān,
GV06apastgcu:9034: sopayāmena pātreṇa nāndīmukhāḥ pitaraḥ prīyantāmityapāṃ pratigrahaṇaṃ,
GV06apastgcu:9037: āśayeṣu parisamūḍheṣu darbheṣu pṛṣadājyenānupradānaṃ nāndīmukhebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ iti sarva dvirdviriti (bau.gṛ.3-12-2....5)
GV06apastgcu:9038: tatraiva pradeśāntare“teṣu bhaktavatsu svadhāyai sthāne 'madhu maniṣye madhu janiṣya'ityetadyajurjapitvā nāndīmukhāḥ pitaraḥ prīyantāmityapo ninayati svadhaivaiṣoktā bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:9039: naikenāhnā daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca kurvanti yasyaikāhnā pitryaṃ daivaṃ ca kurvanti prajā hāsya pramāyukā bhavati,
