GV06apastgcu:9042: (bau.gṛ.pa.1-3-10-11) tathā puṣpaphalākṣatamiśrairyavaiḥ tilārtha upalipya dadhyodanaṃ samaprakīryeti /
GV06apastgcu:9047: yadyuṣṭau dvau devebheyaḥ pitṛbhyo dvau dvau /
GV06apastgcu:9048: yadi ṣoḍaśa devebhyaścatvāro dvādaśa pitṛbhya ityādi /
GV06apastgcu:9049: yavaistilārthaḥ māsiśrāddho yat tilakṛtyamarghyādiṣu tadatra yavaiḥ kartavyaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9065: arghya pradāya gandhādibhiścālaṅkṛtyānujñāto haviruddhṛtya pṛṣadājyena saṃsṛjyābhighāryājyabhāgānte
GV06apastgcu:9066: nāndīmukhebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svāhetyekāṃ pradhānāhudīṃ juhoti kevalena pṛṣadājyena sauviṣṭakṛtaṃ
GV06apastgcu:9068: tantraśeṣaṃ samāpya klaptānvā pratipūruṣamiti nyāyenānena nāndīmukhebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svāhetyanena mantreṇa pitṛbhyo 'nudiśati,
GV06apastgcu:9073: pṛthivīte pātramityāśayeṣu ca parisamūḍheṣviti āśayeṣu bhojanasthāneṣu parisamūḍheṣu
GV06apastgcu:9074: parisamūhanena śodhiteṣu pṛṣadājyamiśreṇa baviṣā pṛṣadājyenaiva tāvatpiṇḍasyānupradānaṃ
GV06apastgcu:9078: upalipya dadhyodanaṃ samprakīrya tate 'ye agnidagdhā'ityasmin sthāne bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:9079: atha dakṣiṇāṃ datvā visarjanaṃ nāndīmukhāḥ pitaraḥ prīyantāmiti /
GV06apastgcu:9080: tata udapātrasamīpe madhu maniṣya iti yajurjapitvā visarjanamantrābhyāṃ barhiṣi pātre ninīyya nyubjamiti /
GV06apastgcu:9084: tato mātāmahānāṃ tu vṛddhau śrāddhatrayaṃ viduḥ //
GV06apastgcu:9098: etāvadatra nānā yugmā brāhmaṇāḥ pradakṣiṇamupacāro yajñopavītaṃ yavāstilārta iti //12//
GV06apastgcu:9099: tasyā anvaṣṭakāyāḥ kalpo māsiśrāddhavat kartavya ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9102: athāvaśiṣṭānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ yeṣu viniyogastāni karmāṇi vyācaṣṭe--
GV06apastgcu:9108: sanimitvā uttarānmantrān 'annamiva te dṛśe bhūyāsa'mityādīn sapta japitvā /
GV06apastgcu:9113: yā saniḥ'bhikṣaṇe nimttamācāryo vivāho yajñe mātāpitrorbubhūrṣārhataśca niyamavilopaḥ''tatra guṇān samīkṣya yathāśakti deyam'(āpa.dha.2-10-1,2)
GV06apastgcu:9116: uttarān mantrān 'annamiva te dṛśe bhūyāsaṃ'ityādīn sapta japitvā tamartha prayojanaṃ brūyāt,
GV06apastgcu:9117: yaṃ bhikṣeta taṃ bodhayati 'ācāryārthaṃ bhikṣāmi bhavantam'iti /
GV06apastgcu:9124: rathaṃ labdhvā yojayitvā prāñcamavasthāpyottarayā rathacakre abhimṛśati pakṣasī vā // ĀpGs_22.14 //
GV06apastgcu:9126: yadi ratho labhyate tatastaṃ labdhvā yojayati karmakarairyugadhuroḥ karoti /
GV06apastgcu:9129: pakṣasī rathasyeti śeṣaḥ pārśve phalake ityanye /
GV06apastgcu:9133: tathā cāśvalāyanaḥ--'rathamārokṣyannānā pāṇibhyāṃ cakre abhmṛśet (āśva.gṛ.2-6-1) iti //14//
GV06apastgcu:9134: rathaścellabdhaḥ taṃ karmakarairvāhābhyāṃyojayitvātha taṃ prāñcaṃprāṅamukhamavasthāpya uttarayā 'aṅkau nyaṅkau 'ityetayā rathacakre ubhe pāṇibhyāṃ yugapadabhimṛśati /
GV06apastgcu:9138: uttareṇa yajuṣādhīruhyottarayā prācīmudīcīṃ vā diśamabhiprayāya yathārtha yāyāt // ĀpGs_22.15 //
GV06apastgcu:9143: pracīmudīcīṃ vā diśamabhiprapādya yathārtha yāyāt yatra prayojanaṃ tatra gacchet /
GV06apastgcu:9153: kecit-labdhvetivacanāt krayādilabdhasyāpi rathādeḥ prathamārohaṇe vidhirayaṃ bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:9178: tathāpi 'hastinamuttarayā'rohet'iti vācanikaviniyogasya balavattvāttadanu sāryeva mantro vyākhyātavyaḥ //17//
GV06apastgcu:9189: pramādādbhūmau patitasya reṣaṇe śarīropamarde jāte iti //18//
GV06apastgcu:9191: saṃvādameṣyan savyena pāṇinā chatraṃ daṇḍañcā'datte // ĀpGs_22.19 //
GV06apastgcu:9198: na pātreṇa anyathā muṣṭiśabdasya parimāṇavācitvasyāpi daraśanādasyāprasaṅgaḥ //19//
GV06apastgcu:9202: ṛṇādānādivyavahāraṃ kartumeṣyan vyavahāre jayamicchannityarthaḥ śeṣaṃ vyaktam //19//
GV06apastgcu:9206: dakṣiṇena phalīkaraṇamuṣṭimuttarayā hutvā gatvottarāṃ japet // ĀpGs_23.1 //
GV06apastgcu:9209: chatradaṇḍau savyena pāṇinā dhārayannevadakṣiṇenapāṇinā phalīkaraṇānāṃ muṣṭiṃ juhoti /
GV06apastgcu:9220: dakṣiṇeneti vacanaṃ homakāle chatradaṇḍayoḥ savyena dhāraṇārtham - savyasya vyāpṛtatvāt dakṣiṇenaiva homaḥ iti //1//
GV06apastgcu:9228: iha ca sambudhyā nāmanirdeśaḥ pratyarthina eva //1//
GV06apastgcu:9237: kruddhasya darśane naimittikamidaṃ niyamena kartavyamiti prāpta āha - vikrodho bhavatīti /
GV06apastgcu:9241: yadi kruddhaḥ pratyarthī vā vyavahāradraṣṭā vā,
GV06apastgcu:9249: asaṃbhavepsuḥ pareṣāṃ sthūlāḍhārikājīvacūrṇāni kārayitvottarayā suptāyāssambādha upavapet // ĀpGs_23.3 //
GV06apastgcu:9257: sā ca dvividhā sthūlā tanvī ca /
GV06apastgcu:9261: kārayitvātāni yadā bhāryā svapiti tadā tasyāssambādheupasthe upavapet /
GV06apastgcu:9263: evaṃ kṛte saṃbādha upabhogayogyo na bhavati vyabhicāraśaṅkāyāmidam /
GV06apastgcu:9265: yaḥ pravatsyan gṛhe vā prajātantuṃ rakṣituṃ svabhāryāyāṃ parapuruṣaśuklasyāsambhavamicchati sapareṣāmasambhavepsuḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9276: evaṃ kṛte sambādha upabhogayogyo na bhavati //3//
GV06apastgcu:9279: (itaḥ prabhṛti sūtrapañcakaṃ sūtradvayarūpeṇa parigaṇitaṃ haradattamate iti ka,
GV06apastgcu:9289: atha yadā parapuruṣaśaṅkāpaiti tadā svaśuklasambhavasidhyarthe bhaiṣajyamucyate - kapilāyāḥ gomūtreṇa prakṣālayīta sambādham //4//
GV06apastgcu:9291: siddhyarthe yadasya gṛhe paṇyaṃ syāttata uttarayā juhuyāt // ĀpGs_23.5 //
GV06apastgcu:9293: asyakuṭumbino gṛheyat dravyaṃpaṇyaṃkrayyaṃ tasya sidyarthe ardhāpakarṣādinā siddhissyādityevamartham /
GV06apastgcu:9294: tasmāt dravyāt kiñcidādāya uttarayarcā'yadahaṃ dhanene'tyetayā juhuyāt /
GV06apastgcu:9301: asyeti vacanaṃ asya gṛhe yat paṇyaṃ tasyānyenāpi taddhitaiṣiṇā homo yathā syāditi /
GV06apastgcu:9304: gṛhe paṇyamiti vacanāt kṣetrādiviṣaye na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:9315: yaṃ kāmayeta nāyaṃ macchidyeteti jīvaviṣāṇe svaṃ mūtramānīya suptamuttarābhyāṃ triḥ prasavyaṃ pariṣiñcet // ĀpGs_23.6 //
GV06apastgcu:9317: yaṃbhṛtyaṃ matto 'yaṃ na jhidyetotikāmayetanāpagacchediti yāvajjīvaṃ madadhīna eva
GV06apastgcu:9318: syāditi jīvato gorviṣāṇaṃ svayaṃ patitamādāya svaṃ mūtramānīya tena taṃ bhṛtyaṃ suptaṃuttarābhyāṃ
GV06apastgcu:9322: ānīyeti vacanāt pūrvamanyasmin pātre mūtrayitvā śaucañca kṛtvā tato viṣāṇopanayanam /
GV06apastgcu:9323: pariṣīto 'si iti mantraliṅgāt strīṣvidaṃ na bhavati
GV06apastgcu:9324: yaṃbhartāraṃ sapatnyāmanyasyāṃ vā indriyadaurbalyādanuraktaṃ yā strīkāmayetaayaṃ
GV06apastgcu:9325: bhartāmat matto na cchidyetaasya mayyavicchedena snehassyāditi sā strījīvaviṣāṇe
GV06apastgcu:9326: jīvantyā gorviṣāṇe balātpātite svaṃmūtramānīyatena bhartāraṃsuptaṃ uttarābhyāṃ 'pari tvā gireramihaṃ';
GV06apastgcu:9328: atra cīnīyeti vacanātapūrvamanyasminpātre mūtrayitvā śaucaṃ ca kṛtvā tato viṣāṇe 'vanayanam //6//
GV06apastgcu:9332: yena pathā dāsakarmakarāḥ palāyeran tasminniṇvānyupasamādhāyottarā āhutījuhuyāt // ĀpGs_23.7 //
GV06apastgcu:9334: atha bhṛtyānāṃ palāyitānāṃ nivṛttimicchataḥ karma ye kurvanti dāsā anye vā te dāsakarmakārāḥyena
GV06apastgcu:9335: yathā palāyerantasmin pathi iṇvānidārumayāni nigalāniupasamādhāyaprajvālya tasminnagnāvuttarāścatasra
GV06apastgcu:9340: ekasya dvayośca palāyane 'pi bhavatyevāyaṃ homo na bahūnāmeva /
GV06apastgcu:9341: ekaśoṣanirdeśāt dāsakarmakaraśca dāsakarmakarau ca dāsakarmarāśca dāsakarmakarā iti /
GV06apastgcu:9352: te yena pathā palayeran tasminpathi bhūmāvevaiṇvānilekaprasiddhāni dārumayānyupasamādhāyanidhāya
GV06apastgcu:9360: yadyenaṃ vṛkṣāt phalamabhinipatedvayo vābhivikṣipedavarṣatarkye vā bindurabhinipatettaduttarairyathāliṅgaṃ prakṣālayīta // ĀpGs_23.8 //
GV06apastgcu:9363: vayaḥpakṣī kākādiḥ enamabhivikṣipet śirasi pradeśāntare vā /
GV06apastgcu:9364: yadi vā avarṣatarkye varṣa yatra na tarkyeta tasmin kāle deśe vābinduḥapāṃ stekaḥ abhinipatet tadaṅgaṃuttaraiḥ 'yadi vṛkṣādi'tyādibhiḥ yathāliṅgaṃ adbhiḥ prakṣālayet /
GV06apastgcu:9368: yathāliṅgavacanaṃ traye 'pi mantrāḥ ekasminnimitte mā bhūvanniti /
GV06apastgcu:9372: yadi vā vayaḥ pakṣī pakṣābhyāmenamabhivikṣipetupari pakṣavātena dhunuyāt,
GV06apastgcu:9373: yadivā avarṣatarkye abhraśūnye nabhasi tasmāddindurapāṃ stokaḥ abhinipatot,
GV06apastgcu:9379: yathāliṅgamiti tu vacanamekaikasminnimitte tribhistribhiḥ prakṣālanaṃ mā bhūditi //9//
GV06apastgcu:9382: āgārasthūṇāvirohaṇe madhuna upaveśane kuptvāṃ kapotapadadarśane 'mātyānāṃ śarīrareṣaṇe
GV06apastgcu:9399: kapotasya pakṣiṇa āraṇyasyapadadarśane pacanāgāre tasmin praviṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9405: naikasya dvayorvā reṣaṇe kālabhede ca na bhavati /
GV06apastgcu:9406: atra prāyaścittam-amāvāsyāthāṃ niśāyāṃ caturdhāvibhaktāyāṃ rātreḥ dvatīyo bhāgo nśā /
GV06apastgcu:9407: yatra pradeśe apāṃ kumbhairudadhāneṣvānīyamānānāṃ śabdaṃ na śṛṇuyāt tatra pradeśe 'gnerupasamādhānādyuttarā āhutaya ekādaśa imaṃ me varuṇa ityādayaḥ
GV06apastgcu:9411: prajāpate natvaditi cahutvā pradhānahurtārjuhuyāt iti tantraśeṣaṃ pratipadyate /
GV06apastgcu:9412: ājyabhāgānta ityevaṃ tantrasamāptau siddhāyāṃ agnerupamādhānādivacanaṃ agnimātrasyopasamādhānārtham /
GV06apastgcu:9414: evaṃprakārāṇāmeteṣāṃ naimittikānāṃ dṛṣṭaphalānāṃ ca paṇyahomādīnāṃ anyasminnapyagnau pravṛttipradarśanārtha sarvānte agnividhānārtho yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9417: na sūtrāntaradṛśṭā āhutayo 'smin tantre hotavyāḥ iti /
GV06apastgcu:9419: kapotaścedagāramupahanyādanupatedvā devāḥ kapotaḥ iti pratyṛcaṃ juhuyāt japedvā /
GV06apastgcu:9422: tadapi prāyaścittaṃ vikalpena bhavati pṛthaktantra iti /
GV06apastgcu:9426: utpātā iti tu ūrdhva bhavanti anyaktāvasthāyāṃ prāpnunuvanti /
GV06apastgcu:9429: tatra divyā utpātā rātrāvindradhanu rādityakīla ityādayaḥ bhaumāṃstvadbhutānagārasthūṇetyādinā svayamevodāharati /
GV06apastgcu:9442: ekapātrabhojanāḥ putrabhrātrādayaḥ teṣāṃ bahūnāṃ santataṃśarīrareṣaṇeśarīranāśane maraṇa ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9444: anyeṣu cādubhutotpāteṣuuktebhyo 'nyeṣu gṛhamadhye valmīkajananādiṣvadibhuteṣu usāteṣu ca dṛṣeṣu satsu tatsūcitaduritaśāntyādikāmo 'māvāsyāyāṃniśāyāṃ rātryāṃmuhūrtadvayādūrdhvam /
GV06apastgcu:9448: tantravidhānaṃ cāsya ājyahaviṣṭvāt . ājyabāgānte iti tvarthakṛtyapratiṣedhārtham /
GV06apastgcu:9451: atra prajāpati iti pratīkena 'prājāpatyā vyāhṛtīḥ'itivat 'prajāpate na tvadetāni'ityeṣaiva gṛhyate //9//
GV06apastgcu:9452: pariṣecanāntaṃ kṛtvābhimṛtebhya uttarayā dakṣiṇato 'śmānaṃ paridhiṃ dadhāti dadhāti // ĀpGs_23.10 //
GV06apastgcu:9454: ata amātyānāṃ śarīrareṣaṇe ityasminnadbhute kaścidviśeṣaḥ yeṣāṃ pūrvāparā anvañcaḥ
GV06apastgcu:9455: pramīyante te abhimṛtāstebhyastadartha teṣāṃ mṛtyuśamanārtha uttaraṃ karma homamimaṃ
GV06apastgcu:9456: kṛtvā pariṣecanānte 'śmānaṃ paridhi antardhānaṃ mṛttyunivāraṇārtha pratiṣṭhāpayatiuttarayarcā
GV06apastgcu:9459: paridhimiti vacanāt tasyāśmanaḥ pracyāvanaṃ na kāryam,
GV06apastgcu:9471: abhimṛtāabhimukhyena mṛtā yogyatayā jīvanta eva amātyānāṃ santatamaraṇadarśanena svayamapi maraṇādbhītā ityarthaḥ /
GV06apastgcu:9483: iti śrīsudarśanācāryaviracite gṛhyatātparyadarśane trayoviṃśaḥ khamḍaḥ asṭamaśca paṭalassamāptaḥ //
